The Atlanta Hawks ( 46 - 12 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 41 ) 95 - 88 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . Taking their second loss in a row , the Magic were finally eliminated from playoff contention in the East . The Hawks , on the other hand , continued to build their lead as the top overall projected playoff seed . Despite losing five of their last ten games , they 're still seven and a half games ahead of the second place Cleveland Cavaliers . Both teams struggled shooting the ball , as the Hawks went 44 percent from the field and 45 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic finished at just 45 percent from the floor and a meager 35 percent from deep . The Hawks also forced the Magic into 17 turnovers , while committing just 18 of their own . The Hawks were led by the duo of Nikola Vucevic and Victor Oladipo . Vucevic shot 10 - for - 16 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also recording 15 rebounds . It was his second double - double in the last three games , as he continues to excel as a member of the starting lineup . Al Horford had a solid showing , posting 17 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and four assists . Over his last three games he 's averaging 14 points and 12 rebounds , as he 's had the hot hand for the Hawks . Coming just shy of a double - double , Al Harris finished with 15 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The only other Hornet to reach double figures in points was Channing Frye , who posted 10 points ( 3 - 10 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three rebounds off the bench . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host New York Knicks , 95 - 82 , at Madison Square Garden on Wednesday . These are two teams who will battle to sneak into the playoffs , but the Bucks looked like the far superior team in this game . They nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as the Knicks never led by more than one and failed to tie or recapture the lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , as the Bucks doubled up the Knicks in assists , 23 - 23 , while committing two less turnovers . The bench production was huge as well , with Milwaukee winning that battle , 55 - 22 . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the Knicks in scoring , as he tallied 16 points , four rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Brandon Hardaway was second on the team , providing 17 points and three rebounds . Zaza Pachulia recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and 14 rebounds . Brandon Hardaway led the team in scoring , dropping 17 points , three rebounds and four assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Cole Aldrich got the start for Ersan Ilyasova and contributed 12 points , five rebounds and three assists on 6 - of - 10 shooting . Jason Smith was a huge spark off the bench , scoring 15 points on 6 - of - 8 shooting . Milwaukee will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup with the Detroit Pistons . Milwaukee ( 18 - 31 ) is battling for the eight - seed in the west and losses like this are devastating for that pursuit . Tim Hardaway Jr. did the team 's best player though , as he tallied 17 points , three rebounds and five assists . Tim Hardaway Jr. finished with 17 points , three rebounds , four assists and two steals . Kendall Marshall started at power forward , accumulating 15 points , two rebounds and three assists on 6 - of - 8 shooting .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 5 ) ) defeated the Isaiah Thomas ( 15 - 25 ) 102 - 100 on Monday at Talking Stick Resort Arena in Phoenix . The Grizzlies got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 26 - 27 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 50 percent from the field , while the Suns went just 46 percent . The Suns also out - rebounded the Suns 37 - 35 , even furthering their advantage on the boards . The Grizzlies were led by Mike Conley in this one , as he went 9 - for - 12 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points , while adding five assists . After a dissapointing performance in the first half of the season against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday , it was good to see him turn things back around . Starting at point guard , Courtney Lee had a strong showing . He went 9 - for - 14 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding three assists . He 's now averaging 10 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Markieff Morris was the only other starter in double figures , as he tallied 20 points ( 8 - 13 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) in 33 minutes . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Tuesday , while the Suns will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 29 - 15 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 17 - 28 ) 114 - 110 on Monday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 26 - 25 right away in the first quarter . The Raptors shot 53 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 46 percent from the floor and 35 percent from deep . What really made the difference though was turnovers . The Raptors forced the Pistons into 26 turnovers , while committing just eight of their own . The Raptors were led by D.J . Augustin in this one , going 12 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 35 points , while also adding eight assists and four blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 57 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 14 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , eight assists and three steals in 37 minutes . He had had a poor showing in Friday 's game against the Heat , shooting just 26 percent ( 1 - 11 FG ) , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Lou Williams had arguably his best game of the season . He went 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's combined for 0 - of - 31 from the field over his last two games , as his teammates dialed in for the Raptors . Coming just shy of a double - double , Kyle Lowry finished with 11 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and eight assists . It was his second straight night with 12 points , as he 's gone a combined 14 - for - 31 from the field over his last two games . He 's now averaging 25 points and 14 rebounds on the year . Kyle Lowry was able to record a double - double of his own . He shot 4 - for - 8 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from beyond the arc to score 11 points , to go along with eight assists and three steals . The nine rebounds matched a season - high , while it was his second double - double of the year . Lou Williams also had a solid game off the bench , scoring 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) in 22 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Washington to play the Wizards on Saturday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 30 - 29 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 24 - 35 ) 102 - 91 on Tuesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pistons were the superior shooters in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 49 percent from the floor and just 58 percent from beyond the arc . The Pistons also forced the Bucks into 21 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own . The Pistons were led by the duo of Reggie Jackson and Marcus Morris . Middleton shot 11 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 26 points , while also adding two assists . He 's been on a hot stretch of late , averaging 24 points and five assists over his last three games . DeMare Parker was the only other player to score in double figures for the Bucks , as he finished with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and three assists . Despite suffering the loss , the Bucks had six players reach double figures in points . Marcus Morris led the way , going 11 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 20 points , while also adding eight rebounds and two assists . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Jackson on the other hand went 6 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 12 points , while also adding two assists in 35 minutes . The Pistons ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
Giannis Antetokounmpo has been a model of consistency for the Bucks all season long and Tuesday night was his most impressive performance of the season , as he posted 34 points , 12 rebounds , five assists and five steals . The 34 points was a season - high , while the 12 rebounds was his second highest total of the season . Tuesday also marked the second time this year Antetokounmpo recorded 20 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and five steals as he continues to stuff the stat sheet as well as any player in the NBA . However , it was the play of Michael Beasley that may have been just as , if not more , important for Milwaukee 's upset victory . Beasley 's 17 points Tuesday night were his second highest total of the season and the seventh time he has reach double - digit scoring . In those seven games , the Bucks are 6 - 1 , as Beasley 's contributions off the bench have had a positive effect on Milwaukee 's offensive attack . Milwaukee will look to build on their eighth - straight playoff game when they take on the Nets in the second half of a back - to - back on Monday . The Bucks , meanwhile , will hope to bounce back from the loss despite hitting only two of their 32 three - point attempts . Their three - point shooting was contagious , as the Bucks hit 54 percent of their shots from the field . Only one player scored in double figures , as Michael Beasley , Malcolm Brogdon and Malcolm Brogdon combined for 23 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting from the field .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 4 ) 101 - 93 on Monday at the Quicken Loans Arena in Boston . The Celtics had a strong first half where they out - scored the Celtics 29 - 19 . With the strong start , they were able to use that momentum and coast through the rest of the game to finish with an 15 - point victory . The Cavaliers out - rebounded the Celtices 53 - 45 , giving them a huge advantage in that category . That advantage may have given them just enough to steal the win on the road . The Cavaliers were led by their superstar duo of LeBron James and Kyrie Irving . James went an impressive 10 - for - 24 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding 10 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 42 points and 17 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 17 points and 4 rebounds on the season . Avery Bradley was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points , finishing with 16 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 40 minutes . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

The Thunder was the superior shooters in this game , going 50 percent from the field and 19 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 41 percent from the floor and 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder also forced the Bucks into 14 turnovers , while committing just 20 of their own . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 23 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and seven assists . The 23 points were a season - high for Durant , while it was also his third double - double in his last four games . Giannis Antetokounmpo also had a solid showing , posting 17 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) , seven rebounds and eight assists . He 's now pushed his season averages to 14 points and 2 rebounds per game on the year . Also off the bench , Jerryd Bayless added 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) and six assists . Despite the loss , the Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the New York Knicks in quadruple overtime , 142 - 139 , at Phillips Arena on Sunday . A game that started off with very little defense being played over the first two quarters ended up becoming much tighter over the third and fourth periods . After the Knicks ( 21 - 28 ) held a 65 - 61 lead going into halftime , the two teams combined for just 84 points in the second half . With five overtimes , there were plenty of opportunities for heroics , and Carmelo Anthony and Courtney Lee capitalized on three of them . Anthony 's driving layup with two seconds left in regulation and 18 - footer with six ticks in the first overtime helped Atlanta stay alive , while Lee 's 30 - foot three - point jumper with one second on the clock in the second overtime sent matters into a third extra period . Dennis Schroder then turned the tables , draining a driving layup with three seconds remaining in the third overtime . Finally , it was Paul Millsap who put an end to the Knicks ' first five - overtime tilt since 1951 , pouring in a shot with 27 seconds remaining that gave Atlanta ( 28 - 20 ) a 141 - 139 lead they would n't relinquish . In all , four Knicks players , including Anthony , fouled out , while Millsap played a whopping 60 minutes . Anthony led the way for Atlanta with a season - high 45 points , along with six rebounds , four assists and one block over 46 minutes , taking a whopping 36 shots in the process . Brandon Jennings , starting for Derrick Rose ( ankle ) , totaled 18 points , 11 assists , three rebounds and one steal . Lee had a near double - double with 17 points , nine rebounds , two assists , two steals and one block . Kristaps Porzingis managed 15 points , five boards , one assist and three blocks . Justin Holiday stepped up with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with nine rebounds , two assists and one steal . Mindaugas Kuzminskas posted 13 points , four rebounds , four assists , one steal and one block in a reserve role as well . Kyle O'Quinn hauled in 12 boards off the bench , and Joakim Noah had a modest six points but added 14 rebounds , five assists , three steals and two blocks . Millsap paced Atlanta with a 37 - point , 19 - rebound double - double that also included seven assists , one steal and one block . Kent Bazemore managed 24 points and nine rebounds . Schroder posted a 23 - point , 15 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , while Dwight Howard posted a 19 - point , 13 - rebound effort of his own . Tim Hardaway , Jr. matched Howard 's point total while dishing out eight assists , hauling in five rebounds and recording a steal . Mike Lee led the second unit with 17 points , one rebound , two assists , two steals and one block . Joakim Noah went scoreless over 41 minutes , but did have a rebound , five assists , two steals and two blocks . Mindaugas Kuzminskas supplied 13 points in a reserve role as well , along with four rebounds , four assists and a steal . Mike O'Quinn led the bench with 17 points ,
The visiting Golden State Warriors took down the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday , 133 - 120 . The Warriors ( 43 - 7 ) saw stellar top - down play even despite the absence of All-Star Draymond Green . The reigning conference Player of the Month duo , Steph Curry and Kevin Durant , recorded a pair of double - doubles . Curry led the team with 29 points and dished out 11 assists , while Durant scored 26 to go with 10 assists and eight rebounds . It was a typically dominant game for the loaded superteam , as the Warriors shot over 52 percent from the field and poured in 14 three - pointers . Seven players scored in double - digits and the team dished out a whopping 38 assists . Golden State was able to quickly get ahead of the Clippers with a 33 - 22 advantage in the first quarter . The Clippers ( 31 - 19 ) remain without injured superstar Chris Paul , and could have used him in Thursday 's double - digit loss . Star forward Blake Griffin took the reigns on offense in Paul 's stead , scoring a game - high 31 points . Off the bench , sixth man Jamal Crawford scored 21 and hit five three - pointers . However , not even 50 percent shooting as a team and ten three - pointers was enough for LA to best the stacked Warriors ' squad . 15 team turnovers did little to help the Clippers ' case . The Warriors will travel to Sacramento on Saturday , while the Clippers will play in Boston on Sunday .
The New York Knicks ( 28 - 40 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 14 - 53 ) 90 - 87 on Sunday at the Staples Center in New York . The Knicks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 18 - 11 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 24 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 40 percent from the floor and 19 percent from beyond the arc . The Knicks were able to force the Lakers into 9 turnovers , while only committing 1 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Knicks were led by Carmelo Anthony who went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to finish with 26 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and four assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Robin Lopez finished with 16 points ( 6 - 7 FG , 4 - 5 FT ) , eight rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 9 points and 3 rebounds on the year . Both Brandon Bass and Brandon Bass reached double figures in points off the bench . Williams had 12 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt ) and three rebounds in 22 minutes , while Bass had 11 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 3 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds over 26 minutes . The Knicks ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .

The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Washington Wizards , 117 - 80 , at Verizon Center on Wednesday . The Nets ( 37 - 42 ) came into Wednesday 's contest looking to keep their faint playoff hopes alive and to complete a season sweep of the Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) . Given that they 'd blasted Washington by 50 points in their most recent meeting , it appeared the chances for another win were high . The hosts had other plans , though , as they jumped out to a 54 - 48 halftime lead . Their stellar 51 percent shooting helped them stave off a second - half comeback from the Wizards ( 45 - 34 ) , which outscored them by a 58 - 46 margin over the third and fourth quarters . The rebounding battle was also key , as Brooklyn hauled in 44 boards to Washington 's 50 . Bojan Bogdanovic paced Washington with 22 points , three rebounds , two assists and one steal . Marcin Gortat posted a 21 - point , 16 - rebound double - double . Deron Williams supplied nine points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Thaddeus Young registered 10 points , four rebounds , three assists and one steal . Jarrett Jack registered a 14 - point , 9 - assist double - double and added three rebounds and a block . Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points , three rebounds , three assists and one block . Jarrett Jack , who 'd been questionable coming in with a sore Achilles , nevertheless tallied a 24 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included a steal . Deron Williams totaled nine points , nine assists , seven rebounds and one steal . Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points , and Jarrett Jack led the second unit with 14 points .

Hickson was the only other Lakers ' player to finish in double figures . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 53 - 29 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 46 - 36 ) 113 - 108 on Friday . The Cavs haven now clinched the Central Division title , but remain in a dogfight for the top seed in the Eastern Conference with the Toronto Raptors . With only a 0 - 3 lead coming in to the night , Cleveland finds itself in a must - win scenario for the time being every time they take the court . Fortunately , they were back at full health Wednesday , with Kevin Love back after a one - game absence due to an illness . The power forward was outstanding in his return , taking advantage of the Cavaliers ' nototriously vulnerable frontcourt to post a 19 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included three blocks , a steal and a block . Love was next with a near double - double of his own , tallying 19 points , nine dimes and three boards . Ramon Sessions was also productive in a reserve role , tallying 14 points , six assists and a pair of rebounds , while Kris Humphries was also productive in a reserve role , registering 12 points , five rebounds and a pair of assists . The Cavs improved to 53 - 29 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division . They now head to Minnesota for a Saturday showdown versus the Timberwolves . Cleveland 's starting five enjoyed a highly productive night , and were encouragingly led by a resurgent effort from All-Star Kevin Love , who 'd been struggling considerably with his shot in recent games . The small forward exploded for 19 points on the strength of 6 of 12 shooting from the field , including a 5 - for - 8 performance from long distance . After having shot an abysmal 28 percent ( 18 - for - 50 ) over the previous five contests , Thursday 's result was a particularly welcome sight for Love and the Wizards . Rasual Sessions paced Butler with 17 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a pair of steals . Matthew Delladedova was productive in a reserve role , tallying 14 points , six assists and two rebounds . Iman Shumpert provided 12 points , five rebounds and two assists , while DeJuan Blair returned from a one - game absence to post a game - high 28 points , along with eight assists , three rebounds and a pair of steals . The Cavs remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They 're home again against the Magic on Thursday .
The Denver Nuggets ( 11 - 17 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 5 - 23 ) 107 - 111 on Sunday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Lakers 34 - 26 in the first quarter alone . The Nuggets were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 48 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Nuggets also secured a 44 - 40 rebounding advantage . The Lakers had seven players reach double figures in points . Kobe Bryant led the way , going 10 - for - 22 from the field and 2 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding three rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 12 rebounds per game . Coming close to a triple - double , Jordan Clarkson finished with 19 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 9 FT ) , eight rebounds and two assists . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting only three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Lou Williams also had a productive game off the bench , as he scored 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 5 FT ) in 37 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
It was a big night for the Mavericks behind the arc , as the team shot a whopping 17 - of - 31 from three - point range . Nine of these threes came from D-League call - up Yogi Ferrell , who led the team with a career - high 32 points . Sharpshooter Wesley Matthews , meanwhile , scored 27 points and splashed in three three - pointers on the night . The Mavs also shot a respectable 82 percent from the free - throw line and 46 percent from the field in what was a stellar night on the offensive end for the team . For Portland , star point guard Damian Lillard delivered what was possibly his worst statistical night of the season . The All-Star went just 4 - of - 20 from the field and turned the ball over three times . His fellow guards , Evan Turner and C.J . McCollum , picked up the slack , however , as they combined for 52 points on the night . Both teams will enjoy three days of rest before taking the court on Wednesday . The Trail Blazers will visit Utah on Wednesday , while the Trail Blazers will host the Blazers on that of the second half of a back - to - back . Portland will have to play again on Monday , as they face the Golden State Warriors in their next game . Portland ( 22 - 29 ) had not play this season , but a loss to the Blazers is just the second game of a back - to - back set . Portland has now won four of their last five games , with this loss being one of the worst of the season . Evan Matthews led the way for Portland , as he tallied 27 points , six rebounds and three assists . Seth Curry was second on the team , as he scored 19 points and dished out two assists . Harrison Barnes and Seth Curry were the only other players in double figures , as they scored 13 a piece . Portland will look to bounce back on Sunday when they host the Minnesota Timberwolves for their next game .

The Heat did most of their damage in the first half , out - scoring the Celitcs 52 - 28 . They were able to finish the game shooting 50 percent from the field and 38 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors shot 47 percent from the field and only 25 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were led by the duo of DeMar DeRozan and DeMar DeRozan . DeRozan went 11 - for - 22 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 30 points , while also adding three rebounds . He 's now combined for 37 points in his last two outings , as he 's been dialed in with his shot . Luol Deng also had a strong showing and finished with 18 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) , four rebounds and three blocked shots . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points and 2 rebounds over that span . Kyle Lowry chipped in with 22 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 7 - 13 FT ) , two rebounds and three assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . Like Bosh , he 's turned it on offensively of late , scoring 15 or more points in four out of his last five games . Luol Deng was the only other starter in double figures , as he chipped in with 12 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) and two rebounds . The Heat ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans 133 - 105 at Staples Center on Saturday . Both teams were shorthanded in the contest , however . The Pelicans ( 7 - 17 ) were without Anthony Davis ( rest ) , Jrue Holiday ( toe ) and E'Twaun Moore ( toe ) , making the game very one sided from the gate . The New Orleans reserves played physical basketball and found scoring lanes in the first half , falling just six points short of the Clippers ( 17 - 7 ) at the end of the second quarter . The second half was a different story , as Los Angeles outscored the Pelicans by 12 points in the third quarter and 10 points in the fourth quarter . Chris Paul dropped one of the biggest double - doubles of the season , racking up 20 points and 20 assists , with 18 of those assists coming in the first three quarters of action . Paul added five rebounds and three steals on 8 - of - 16 shooting in 30 minutes of action , which was even more helpful given Blake Griffin 's ( knee ) absence . DeAndre Jordan worked the pick and roll with Paul to perfection , and with no Anthony Davis clogging the lane on the other end , Jordan found his way to 19 points and nine rebounds rather easily . Jamal Crawford and Marreese Speights added scoring help from the bench , as they finished with 22 points and 17 points , respectively . Tim Frazier led the Pelicans on the other end , scoring 20 points and adding 11 assists on 6 - of - 13 shooting . Buddy Hield drew 36 minutes and contributed 15 points on 2 - of - 5 shooting from behind the arc . Next up , the Pelicans play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Phoenix Suns , while the Clippers host the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday .

They also elicited a total of 14 turnovers from Orlando while turning the ball over just nine times in their own right . Miles paced the reserves with 16 points , while Aaron Gordon pitched in with 11 points , three rebounds , an assist and a block . The Sacramento Kings ( 3 - 5 ) defeated the Ty Lawson ( 5 - 0 ) 96 - 83 on Sunday evening at Sleep Train Arena in Toronto . The Kings out - scored the Raptors 24 - 25 in the fourth quarter , leading to a 15 - point victory on the road . The Kings were the superior shooters in this one , going 44 percent from the field and 31 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors finished at 36 percent from the floor and just 23 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , DeMarcus Cousins finished with a team - high 22 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 8 - 11 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) , to go along with 14 rebounds and three blocked shots . It marked his second double - double over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaging 38 points and 15 rebounds . Cousins , on the other hand , finished with 22 points ( 7 - 21 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 11 FT ) and 14 rebounds , giving him his fifth double - double in the last six games . He 's now averaging 22 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Kyle Lowry had a relatively quiet night . He went 5 - for - 8 from the field and 1 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 15 points , while also adding 10 assists . The Kings ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Raptors will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Friday .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the Isaiah Whitehead , 126 - 98 , at Staples Center on Monday . The Nets ( 15 - 56 ) improved to 15 - 9 at home as they narrowly escaped with the win , fighting - off a go - ahead and then a tying bucket by the Suns in the last minute . Down four with just over 60 seconds remaining , Brooklyn however , Brook Lopez 's three - point jumper at the buzzer sealed the hard - fought home victory for Phoenix . Brook Lopez led the way for Brooklyn , scoring 19 points on efficient 7 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , in 25 minutes off the bench . Brook Lopez finished with 19 points , six rebounds , two blocks and one steal , in 25 minutes of action . KJ McDaniels was the only other starter with double - digit scoring , as he chipped in 12 points , in 31 minutes off the bench . The Suns will look to turn things around as they play host to the Heat on Monday . The Suns ( 22 - 50 ) shot only 37 percent from the field , but struggled from long range , where they hit only 28 percent . All five starters scored in double digits for Brooklyn , while Marquese Chriss was the high - point man , with 23 points on 8 - of - 15 shooting , in 31 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for Phoenix was Jeremy Lin , who chipped in 13 points , to go along with five assists and three rebounds , in 45 minutes .
The Sacramento Suns defeated the Sacramento Kings , 105 - 103 , at Golden 2 Center on Monday . The Suns ( 19 - 31 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Kings ( 19 - 31 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the fact that they 'd recently lost their second - best playmaker , Rudy Gay , for the season with an Achilles injury . However , the old adage of `` that 's why they play the games '' rang particularly true Wednesday , as Sacramento forced the Cavs into an uncharacteristic 13 turnovers and made the shots when it counted most to emerge as surprising victors . DeMarcus Cousins naturally played a pivotal role , posting a near triple - double with a game - high 22 points , 11 rebounds , a pair of assists and a steal . With the victory , the Suns hold on to fourth place in the Western Conference 's Pacific Division . They also turned the ball over a whopping 13 times , which allowed the Kings to overcome the contests with outstanding defense . DeMarcus Cousins led the way for the Kings with 22 points , 11 rebounds , a steal and two blocks . Eric Collison was next with 19 points , three assists , two rebounds and two steals . Tyson Chandler generated a modest seven points but hauled in 12 boards . Ben McLemore was second on the team in scoring with 18 points , and C.J . McLemore contributed two points , two rebounds , three assists and a block . Devin Booker led the way for the Kings with 33 points , two rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . T.J. Warren registered 21 points , five rebounds , an assist and a steal . Brandon Knight led the bench with 18 points , three assists and a rebound . Ty Lawson compiled 18 points , five assists , five rebounds and two steals . Tyson Chandler mustered a modest seven points but hauled in 12 rebounds . The Kings next head to the Windy City for a Saturday night showdown with the Chicago Bulls , while the Kings remain home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Friday night as well .
The Chicago Bulls ( 8 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 5 - 4 ) 105 - 89 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . The Bulls were down 81 - 78 following the third quarter , but were able to make a run in the final quarter , out - scoring the Clippers 26 - 25 to finish off the 12 - point victory on the road . The Bulls were the superior shooters in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 44 percent from the floor and 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were also able to force the Clippers into 12 turnovers , while committing only eight of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Jamal Crawford had a big day for the Clippers , going 10 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to finish with 24 points , while also adding five assists . He 's now averaging 10 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Taj Mirotic finished with 20 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and 5 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 20 points and 15 rebounds over that span of games . Coming off the bench , Taj Mirotic added 12 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Kirk Hinrich added 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and five assists . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Clippers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 112 - 103 , at Barclays Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) came in to Thursday 's contest hoping to snap a five - game losing streak , but were also running on fumes after two games in the previous three nights . Fatigue may have played a role in the first half , as the Grizzlies ( 34 - 23 ) built a 62 - 51 lead by halftime . The second half was much tighter , but Memphis eventually pulled away on the strength of a highly productive night for their starting five . All first unit members hit double digits in the scoring column , and the Grizzlies managed to shoot 51 percent from the field overall , and an equally impressive 41 percent tally from beyond the arc . Brook Lopez paced the Nets with a game - high 19 points , which he supplemented with 10 rebounds , eight assists , one steal and one block . Mike Conley tallied 32 points , six assists , one rebound and one steal . Lopez posted 19 points , three rebounds , five assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie led the first unit with 14 points , three boards , one assist and one steal . Vince Dinwiddie was productive in a reserve role as well with 11 points , two rebounds , two steals and one assist . Brook Lopez paced Brooklyn with 19 points , 10 rebounds , eight assists and one steal . Spencer Dinwiddie matched Dinwiddie 's point total and added three boards , one assist and one block . Rondae Hollis-Jefferson posted a 13 - point , 3 - rebound double - double that also included two blocks , two steals and one block . Spencer Carter led the second unit with 14 points , three boards and one assist .
The Miami Heat defeated the Eric Gordon , 117 - 100 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . Miami was expected to win this game easily , but it took a monster second half to do so . In fact , Miami outscored Eric Gordon , 69 - 40 after the first quarter and never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Miami , as they held 32 to 32 percent shooting from the field , while committing just 11 turnovers . James Harden carried the load for Eric Harden , as he accumulated 38 points , 12 rebounds and 12 assists . Dion Waiters was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 21 points , two rebounds and seven assists . Tyler Johnson led the bench in scoring , dropping 16 points off the bench . Trevor Ariza also scored 12 points , adding two rebounds and two blocks . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , seven rebounds and four assists . Miami will look to keep rolling on Friday in a home matchup against the Toronto Raptors . Eric Waiters led the way for Houston , as he accrued 23 points , 10 rebounds and seven assists . Ryan Anderson was second among starters , finishing with 17 points , six rebounds and two assists . Clint Capela started and amassed 12 points and nine rebounds on 5 - of - 7 shooting . All five starters scored at least 12 points . Tyler Johnson was the best player off the bench , collecting 17 points , seven rebounds and four assists .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Detroit Pistons , 109 - 86 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . New Orleans was desperate for a win and this dominating victory inches them a little closer to the eight - seed in the west . They did all their damage in the first and fourth quarter , as they outscored Detroit , 62 - 34 . The Pistons had one of the worst shooting games of the season , as they went 40 - of - 103 from the field , 3 - of - 17 from the free - throw line and 8 - of - 23 from three - point range . The Pelicans shot well on their end , hitting 50 percent of their shots , while going 22 - of - 23 from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was decisive as well , with New Orleans winning that battle , 45 - 27 . The Pistons ( 29 - 32 ) had won three of four headed into this matchup , so this 23 - point loss is obviously disappointing . Jon Leuer led Detroit , as he collected 22 points , seven rebounds and three steals . Andre Drummond did get ejected , but still totaled 13 points and 17 rebounds , despite going 1 - of - 10 from the free - throw line . Tobias Harris led the bench with 15 points and six rebounds . The Pelicans ( 24 - 37 ) were 0 - 3 with DeMarcus Cousins and this marks their first win since the trade , despite the fact that Cousins was suspended for this matchup ( technicals ) . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 33 points , 14 rebounds and three assists on 11 - of - 17 shooting . Jrue Holiday finished second on the team with 22 points , four rebounds and five assists . Dante Cunningham was a surprise , providing 16 points and five rebounds .
The Denver Nuggets ( 19 - 27 ) beat the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 32 ) 93 - 85 on Friday . Anthony Davis had another special game , in his absence with 24 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Davis went on to finish with 24 points and 12 rebounds in just 37 minutes . The Pelicans are trying to fend off the San Antonio Spurs , Portland Trail Blazers , Los Angeles Clippers , and Houston Rockets for the second seed in the Western Conference . Their three games left are against the Los Angeles Clippers , Golden State Warriors and Indiana Pacers . Jusuf Faried 's defense has been impeccable this season , but his offense has really come around as of late . He 's increased his scoring average in every month of the season but one . In April he 's shooting 54 percent from the field for 15 points and 12 rebounds in six of his last eight games . Jusuf Faried played well too , with 15 points , nine rebounds , two blocks , and one steal in only 28 minutes of action . Arron Afflalo scored 20 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting in 39 minutes off the bench . Ty Gordon and Eric Gordon each scored 11 points off the bench , buoyed by Faried 's double - double . The Nuggets were led by Jusuf Nurkic , who put up 15 points , nine rebounds , and two blocks in 29 minutes . The Nuggets are now one game behind the New York Knicks for the worst record in the league . Jusuf Faried had his best game of the season Friday and finished with 15 points and nine rebounds . The Nuggets will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday .
The host Los Angeles Lakers handily defeated the Golden State Warriors on Friday , 117 - 97 . It was Lakers ( 3 - 3 ) coach Luke Walton 's first game against the Warriors since leaving the organization over the offseason . Walton coached the Warriors for the beginning of their historic 2015 - 16 regular season in place of an injured Steve Kerr , but later left to pursue the head coaching job in Los Angeles . Walton certainly got the best of his former team , as the Lakers were able to maintain their hefty halftime lead down the stretch . The team successfully capitalized on their size advantage , holding a 51 - 40 advantage in the rebounding column . Third-year forward Julius Randle led the team with 20 points and was a monster on the boards , pulling down 14 rebounds . The Lakers also saw success from the line , hitting over 90 percent of their free - throws . For the Warriors ( 4 - 2 ) , it was a tough night from beyond the arc . After showing dominant offensive flow on Thursday in a rout of the Thunder , the Warriors shot just 5 - for - 32 from three in Friday 's contest . This included 0 - for - 10 for Steph Curry , whose NBA-record streak of 157 games with a three - point make finally came to an end . The results were n't much better for Klay Thompson , who went just 2 - for - 10 . Kevin Durant , meanwhile , continued to perform with his new team , leading the game with 27 points . The Lakers will host the Suns on Sunday , while the Warriors will host the still - winless Pelicans on Monday .
The Houston Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) took care of business against the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 38 ) on Thursday in a 133 - 102 win . The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from long distance , as they shot 49 percent from the field , 80 percent from the free - throw line and 50 percent from three - point range . The scoring differential was huge as well , with Houston recording 27 assists to the Suns 20 . The Suns also dominated the rebounding , as they won that battle 55 - 42 . These teams are going in opposite directions right now and this result is indicative of the two teams recent play . Houston has the second - best defense in the NBA and they did a heck of a job today if slowing down a potent Suns attack . Alex Len was a beast down low , as he totaled 13 points and 9 rebounds in the defeat . The Suns next game wo n't be until Monday , when they host the struggling Memphis Grizzlies . Phoenix played their first game in as many nights and they did n't disappoint against the Suns . They did most of their damage in the first half , as they scored just 25 points in the final 13 minutes . The defense was huge for the Rockets , as they shot just 39 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The Suns have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . James Harden was the lone bright spot in the defeat , as he tallied 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Alex Len also played well off the bench , as he amassed 13 points and nine rebounds in just 13 minutes of action . Houston will look to bounce back on Sunday in a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 20 - 26 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 9 - 37 ) 121 - 103 on Sunday at the Moda Center in Portland . The Trail Blazers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Lakers 37 - 22 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers went 49 percent from the floor and just 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Trail Blazers also secured a 42 - 30 rebounding advantage , further helping to secure an impressive 28 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Trail Blazers used strong rebounding and shot over 52 percent , while the Lakers could n't keep up with the Blazers shooting guard C.J . McCollum . McCollum went 14 - for - 21 from the field and 5 - for - 8 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 25 points and 11 rebounds per game . Newly aquired center Mason Plumlee had a big game as well , going 3 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 13 points . He also had nine rebounds and six assists . The Lakers ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Lakers will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot extremely well tonight , going 48 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line . They were able to out - rebound the Pistons 46 - 45 , giving them an even greater advantage in the victory . Jeff Teague led the charge for the Hawks , finishing with 28 points ( 9 - 15 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 8 - 8 FT ) , four rebounds and six assists . He 's picked up his scoring over his last two outings , combining for 60 points over that span . Millsap on the other hand finished with 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 10 FT ) , 12 rebounds and four assists . It was his second straight night recording 12 points . It was a new season - high in points for him . Kyle Korver finished with 12 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt ) and four assists as well . D.J . Augustin recorded 14 points ( 4 - 17 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) of his own , to go along with five assists . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Milwaukee Bucks on Wednesday , while the Pistons will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The New York Knicks defeated the Portland Trail Blazers , 107 - 103 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . While there were n't many swings in this game , it stayed close throughout . In fact , there were only five lead changes and one tie , as it took some clutch free - throws from the Knicks to close things out . New York actually held the lead for the final three quarters , as the Blazers could never quite crawl back in . Defense was key for New York , as they held the Blazers to 44 percent shooting . The Knicks shot 47 percent from the field and 31 percent from three - point range . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with New York recording 26 assists to 13 turnovers , while Portland matched their assists and turnovers at 18 a piece . Scoring in the paint was extremely lopsided as well , with New York winning that battle , 66 - 0 . Free-throw shooting was key for New York , as they went 21 - of - 36 from the charity stripe , while the Knicks went just 13 - of - 23 . Kristaps Porzingis was the player of the game , as he led the team with 31 points and nine rebounds . Derrick Rose finished second on the team , amassing 18 points , four rebounds , five assists and two steals . Ed Davis was the only other player with more than 11 points , as he collected 15 points , nine rebounds and four blocks off the bench . The Knicks will look to keep rolling on Thursday against the Denver Nuggets .
The New York Knicks defeated the host Chicago Bulls 117 - 106 at United Center on Friday . Recent results from these teams would indicate a different outcome , but the Knicks showed some resiliency here on the road . New York actually led by 16 at times in the first quarter , before allowing the Bulls to take their first lead in the second quarter . The Knicks responded by recapturing the lead in the third and kept it for the entirety of the fourth quarter . New York shot 52 percent from the field and assisted on 31 of their 46 made baskets . They did that dominating the turnover differential as well , committing just five , while forcing 12 from the Bulls . The Knicks ( 2 - 3 ) got some great performance from their starters here , as all five scored at least 15 points . Kristaps Porzingis led the team , scoring 27 points to go along with his five boards . Carmelo Anthony was n't far behind , tallying 25 points , six rebounds and four assists of his own . Joakim Noah and Derrick Rose both played great in their return to Chicago . Noah tallied 16 points , nine rebounds and four assists , while Rose finished with 15 points , seven rebounds and a season - high 11 assists . The Bulls ( 3 - 2 ) had a tough task here against some former Chicago players and they simply did n't play well enough to win . Dwyane Wade did all he could though , scoring a game - high 35 points on 12 - of - 20 shooting . He also provided 10 rebounds and hit five more three - pointers in the loss . Jimmy Butler was the only starter in double figures , dropping 26 points of his own . Nikola Mirotic was a nice spark off the bench , totaling 14 points and six boards . The Knicks return to action on Sunday when they host the Utah Jazz , while Chicago travels to Indiana on Saturday to play the Pacers .
The New York Knicks ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 0 - 1 ) 122 - 97 on Thursday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in New York . The Knicks were the superior shooters in this game , going 45 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went just 35 percent from the floor and a meager 50 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Knicks forced the Bucks into 18 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . The Knicks ' frontcourt did most of the damage in this game . Derrick Williams went 8 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 24 points , while also adding seven rebounds and four assists . He 's on a very strong stretch of four games , averaging 24 points , 6 assists and 3 steals over that span . Williams , on the other hand , finished with 20 points ( 6 - 17 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . Greg Monroe had a double - double with 22 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) and 14 rebounds . It was his first double - double of the season , and he 's now combined for 55 points and 20 rebounds in his last two games . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Washington Wizards on Tuesday , while the Bucks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 20 - 19 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 19 ) 103 - 103 on Sunday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Raptors did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 39 percent compared to the Magic , who went 39 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 15 turnovers , while committing just 10 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Victor Oladipo had a solid showing . He went 10 - for - 20 from the field and 5 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 36 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 11 rebounds on the season . DeMar DeRozan had a relatively quiet game . He went 4 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding 11 rebounds . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . Cory Joseph had the most production of the year , going 9 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 19 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 36 rebounds over his last two games . Cory Joseph was the other player to score in double figures for the Magic . He went 9 - for - 11 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from beyond the arc to score 19 points . He 's scored a total of only 11 points in 11 games so far this season , so it was good to see him get back on track . Also , coming off the bench , Jonas Valanciunas had his third double - double of the season . He had 13 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and nine rebounds , while Joseph recorded 11 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 3 - 5 3Pt ) and seven rebounds off the bench . The Magic 's next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Sunday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Chicago Bulls opened their season Thursday with a 105 - 99 victory against the visiting Boston Celtics . Chicago ( 10 ) jumped out to an early lead , finishing the first quarter with a 30 - 20 lead . The Bulls new - look backcourt of Dwyane Wade and Rajon Rondo quickly made contributions , with Wade scoring 14 points in the first half . The group managed to combat concerns about poor floor - spacing , with Wade and Rondo contributing five combined three - point makes . Chicago was able to keep the Celtics off the glass extremely effectively , winning the rebounding battle 55 - 36 . The Bulls ' edge was particularly pronounced on the offensive end , as they earned 18 offensive rebounds compared to Boston 's three . Boston ( 1 - 1 ) , meanwhile , managed to keep the game close throughout . All-Star point guard Isaiah Thomas led the charge for the Celtics ' offense , scoring 25 points . With bench guard Marcus Smart sidelined by injury , sophomore Terry Rozier saw 22 minutes coming off the bench . He made the most of his time on the floor , scoring eight points and recording four rebounds and four assists while recording no turnovers . Boston had a solid shooting night , converting on half of their shots from the floor overall . However , struggles on the glass ended up weighing the Celtics down despite keeping Chicago to just 43 percent shooting . The Bulls will face the Pacers on Saturday , while the Celtics will take on the Hornets . Meanwhile , the Celtics will take on the Hornets on Sunday , while the Celtics will host the Hornets on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 32 - 14 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 30 - 17 ) 99 - 94 Saturday at the American Airlines Center . Houston ' Monta Ellis was able to get his groove back in the series after being held off the bench for the second game in a row . Harden finished with 33 points , five rebounds and five assists on 14 - of - 23 shooting . Donatas Motiejunas was effective in the backcourt , as he contributed 16 points , five rebounds and an assist in just 31 minutes . James Parsons scored 17 points on 7 - of - 13 shooting to go along with five assists and five rebounds in 28 minutes of action . Corey Brewer was the only other Houston player to score in double figures , scoring 14 points on 4 - of - 13 shooting in 24 minutes off the bench . The Rockets now find themselves as the four - seed in the Western Conference and are just 4 games behind the Grizzlies for the two - seed . They will next travel to Denver on Saturday to take on the Nuggets . Chandler Parsons ( 13 ) and Dirk Nowitzki ( ankle ) sat out for the second straight game . The Rockets will return home to host the Jazz on Saturday . Dallas has lost two straight , and after they were punched in the mouth by the Utah Jazz 99 - 87 on Wednesday , coach Erik Spoelstra decided to make a couple changes in the starting lineup . Patrick Beverley sat out Friday 's game with a hamstring injury , and sophomore Richard Jefferson filled in as the starting power forward and put up 16 points and five rebounds in 31 minutes . Dallas will have two days off to get healthy before returning to action Wednesday against Phoenix .

While there were a lot of stars in this game , it 's some of the undervalued players who had career nights . Both Denver players all played well , as Denver shot 43 percent from the field and 46 percent from three - point range . The rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Nuggets winning that battle , 55 - 48 . The Nuggets also dominated the shooting differential , winning that battle , 55 - 27 . Jimmy Butler led the Bulls in scoring , as he tallied 35 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Dwyane Wade was second on the team , finishing with 22 points , three rebounds and two assists . Rajon Rondo accrued 13 points , 11 rebounds and eight assists . Jamal Murray was a huge spark off the bench , providing 24 points , six rebounds and two assists on 9 - of - 13 shooting . Rajon Rondo was the player of the game , as he accumulated 35 points , seven rebounds and five assists . Jamal Murray was second on the team , providing 24 points and two assists off the bench . Chicago will be off until Wednesday , when they host the Brooklyn Nets for their next game . The Bulls ( 9 - 6 ) got a much needed win here , but it was far from easy . The Charlotte Hornets ( 39 - 29 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 39 - 29 ) 109 - 106 on Sunday . The Heat bounced back from a devastating loss to the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday , where Khris Middleton 's buzzer beating three - pointer stopped them from being down just a half a game to the Bucks in the Eastern Conference standings . With Dwyane Wade ( knee ) and breakout center Spencer Hawes ( hand ) out , the rest of the Hornets struggled mightily , as the bench was able to score a combined 63 points in the Central Division . This was a stark contrast from the duo 's previous outing against OKC , in which the two combined for 53 points . Ultimately , Saturday appears to be nothing more than an off night for the Miami Heat , as the duo was averaging 35 points per game on 50 percent shooting over them . Additionally , the team shot just 53 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . On the defensive end , they got six players score in double digits on the night . Al Jefferson led the way with a team - high 21 points and 10 rebounds in 27 minutes , while Josh Richardson ( 18 ) , Courtney Lee ( 13 ) , and Joe Johnson ( 13 ) round out the four Miami players who scored in double figures . Up next , the Hornets will travel to Indiana Thursday to take on the Pacers , while the Heat will head to Boston Friday to go up against the Celtics .

The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 34 - 20 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 42 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were also able to force the Celtics into 27 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Clippers were led by their superstar backcourt of Chris Paul and Isaiah Redick . Redick went 11 - for - 15 from the field and 5 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding three assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 34 points and 12 rebounds per game .
