The New Orleans Pelicans ( 28 - 41 ) defeated the Eric Gordon ( 32 - 32 ) 128 - 100 on Friday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the 43 - 32 right away in the first quarter . They were the superior shooters as well , going 53 percent from the field and 35 percent from the three - point line , while the 13 - team hit 32 percent from the free - throw line and 35 percent from three - point range . The 2 - point differential was key , as New Orleans went 29 - for - 23 , while the 31 percent picked up double - digit points . Anthony Davis continued his strong start to the season . He went 10 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 24 points , while also adding 15 rebounds and three blocked shots . It was a new season - high in points for him and also a nice bounce back game after posting just three points in Saturday 's game against the Bulls . Jrue Holiday also had a solid all - around game . He finished with 19 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , six assists and three steals , in 28 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in five out of his last five games . Tim Frazier was the other starter to reach double - digit points , as he finished with 14 . The Pelicans ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Thursday , while the Eric Gordon will be at home for the Blazers on Thursday .
The Orlando Magic defeated the Chicago Bulls , 97 - 98 , at Amway Center on Wednesday evening . The Magic ( 16 - 38 ) may sport the worst record in the league , but they may be one of the feistiest cellar dwellers in the history of the NBA . Orlando has kept their competitive spirit thriving despite the disappointing season , and has often played as if they 're capable of beating virtually any team in the NBA on the right night . The Bulls ( 32 - 20 ) were the latest unit to learn that lesson the hard way , as they first saw the Magic storm back from a 16 - 16 first quarter deficit to forge a 63 - 71 halftime with 1:52 to play to tie the game at both 94 and 98 in the closing seconds . Taking the ball for a final possession with two seconds remaining , the Magic saw Pau Gasol drain a jumper off a Tony Snell assist to tie the game at 94 with four seconds remaining . However , Jimmy Butler answered with a flash to the basket for the go - ahead layup , which served to put Orlando in control the rest of the way . The fourth quarter was spearheaded by Butler 's 27 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , five assists and six steals . Victor Oladipo was a distant second behind Butler , managing 18 points , four rebounds , six assists , two steals and a block . Nikola Vucevic was right behind him with a 15 - point , eight - rebound effort that also included two assists and two steals . Evan Fournier was next with 14 points , three assists , three rebound and two steals . Elfrid Payton registered 10 points , nine rebounds , three assists and two steals . Channing Frye led the bench with 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . Jimmy Butler paced Orlando with 27 points , which he supplemented with two rebounds , five assists and six steals . Victor Oladipo was next with 18 points , six assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . Nikola Vucevic posted a 14 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and one block . Channing Frye led the second unit with 12 points , one rebound , two assists and one steal . The Magic head back home to tangle with the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night , while the Magic remain home to tangle with the Toronto Raptors on Friday evening as well .
The Charlotte Hornets defeated the Chicago Bulls , 103 - 91 , at Spectrum Center on Friday night . The Bulls ( 14 - 15 ) checked in to Friday night on a downturn , as they 'd lost four of their last five . They were able to get off to a fast start , however , outscoring the host Hornets ( 17 - 13 ) by a 26 - 22 margin in the first quarter . Charlotte turned the table quickly in the second period , however , almost doubling up the visitors with a 26 - 14 advantage . Although the Bulls bounced back in the third , the Hornets were able to keep pace every step of the way throughout the second half , which resulted in their tenth home win of the season . While Chicago failed to find much scoring from their starting five outside of Jimmy Butler , Charlotte benefited from a balanced effort across their first unit . As customary , the effective backcourt duo of Kemba Walker and Nicolas Batum led the way , as they supplied matching 20 - point contributions . Butler 's 24 points led the Bulls , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and a block . Dwyane Wade was second , registering 12 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two steals . Taj Gibson supplied 10 points , three rebounds and a pair of blocks . Rajon Rondo mustered a modest seven points but also provided 10 assists , nine rebounds and two steals . Doug McDermott led the second unit with 15 points , while Nikola Mirotic managed an 11 - point , 10 - rebound double that also included a steal and a block in just 19 minutes off the bench . Walker added five rebounds , four assists and a steal to his co - leading point total , while Batum 's performance was a triple - double that also consisted of 11 rebounds , 10 assists , a steal and a block . Cody Zeller went for 13 points , seven rebounds , four assists , two blocks and a steal . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist had a near double - double with 12 points , nine rebounds , two assists , a steal and four blocks . Frank Kaminsky III paced the bench with 13 points , five boards , an assist and a block . The Bulls are in San Antonio on Christmas Day to take on the Spurs , while the Hornets visit the Brooklyn Nets on Monday evening .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Phoenix Suns , 103 - 90 , at Philips Arena on Wednesday . Atlanta were in desperate need of a win and they were able to take care of a shorthanded Phoenix team here . Defense was key for Atlanta , as they held Phoenix to 37 percent from the field and 17 percent from three - point range . The Hawks also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 50 - 51 and the points in the paint differential , 48 - 18 . The Suns ( 20 - 58 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Devin Booker led the team in scoring , as he tallied 34 points , five rebounds and two steals . Jeff Teague was second on the team , finishing with 20 points , two rebounds and two assists . Paul Millsap went just 7 - of - 8 from the field , but finished with 13 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Devin Booker was the player of the game , as he scored 34 points to go along with five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Paul Millsap finished with 13 points , 17 rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Mirza Teletovic was second on the team , providing 12 points and seven rebounds off the bench . Phoenix will host the New York Knicks on Saturday for their next game . The Suns ( 46 - 32 ) had lost four - straight headed into this game , so a double - digit home win in just what the doctor ordered . Devin Booker was the player of the game , as he collected 34 points , five rebounds and two assists on 12 - of - 25 shooting . Kent Bazemore accrued 17 points , nine rebounds and five assists . Ronnie Price also scored a season - high 17 points off the bench . The Hawks will return to action on Saturday in a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Isaiah Blazers , 129 - 100 , at Target Center on Sunday . The Timberwolves ( 18 - 29 ) found themselves without star power forward Kristaps Porzingis for a second consecutive game due to his sore Achilles , and his absence seemed to make a considerable difference , particularly in the middle portion of the game . After hanging tough with the Timberwolves ( 18 - 29 ) through the first quarter , Brooklyn saw their hosts outscore them by a whopping 69 - 57 margin over the second and third quarters . Minnesota was particularly dominant coming out of the halftime locker room , as they blasted their visitors by a 33 - 27 margin in the third period . The Wolves were led by Brook Lopez , who posted a 25 - point , 7 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , two steals and a block . Andrew Wiggins supplied 23 points , four rebounds , four assists , a steal and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a 14 - point , 6 - assist double - double that also included three rebounds and a steal . Bojan Bogdanovic led the bench with 10 points , five assists and a rebound . Ricky Rubio was next with 14 points , three rebounds , six assists and a steal . Trevor Booker led the bench with 18 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a block . Ricky Rubio managed a modest seven points but did dish out six assists . Caris Kilpatrick led the bench with 14 points , a rebound and an assist . Towns paced the Timberwolves with a game - high 37 points , which he supplemented with 13 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and one steal . Ricky Rubio followed with 14 points , six assists , three rebounds and a steal . Gorgui Dieng posted a 12 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and two steals . No other Minnesota player managed double - digit scoring , with Justin Foye leading the second unit with 13 points , four rebounds , five assists and one steal . The Nets head back home to take on the Rockets on Saturday night , while the Timberwolves hit the road to take on the Houston Rockets on Monday evening as well .
The Golden State Warriors ( 3 - 1 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 1 - 3 ) , 121 - 94 , in Game 4 on Tuesday at the Oracle Arena in Game 0 of the Western Conference Finals . When Houston 's James Harden corralled a defensive rebound with time dwindling in the fourth , trailing by one , it was another opportunity for the MVP runner - up to hit a buzzer - beater . It was n't to be on Thursday , however , as Houston 's 16 turnovers led to the Rockets ' bench . The Warriors shot 52 percent from the field and 53 percent from beyond the arc to help them secure the win Saturday . Andre Iguodala played a game - high 24 minutes and notched 22 points , five rebounds and four assists . Michael Beasley played 31 minutes off the bench and scored 17 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Golden State shot just 42 percent from the floor , but they shot just 42 percent from the field and 19 percent from beyond the arc . Harrison Beasley played 19 minutes off the bench and finished with 22 points and five rebounds . Andrew Bogut ( knee ) is expected to miss at least another two weeks . The Rockets will continue their road trip in Phoenix on Tuesday against the Suns . Houston saw their three - game winning streak come to an end with the loss . Nearly all of the Rockets ' key players struggled to finish on offense . MVP candidate Draymond Green posted a double - double with 18 points and eight rebounds . The Rockets will return to action Friday when they host the Suns . Houston has been devastated by injuries lately , but it pulled together a complete effort to score a huge win in front of the home crowd . In addition to Iguodala 's seven - game - half shots , Harrison Beasley was the only other Rockets player to score in double figures , finishing with 17 points and three three - pointers in 19 minutes . Houston will look to bounce back when they host the Los Angeles Clippers ( 14 - 24 ) on Tuesday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 3 - 4 ) 101 - 97 on Saturday . Cleveland is on a three - game win streak . Paul George led the way with a game - high 29 points and 11 rebounds . Tristan Thompson had a double - double with 16 points and eight rebounds . The Cavaliers are 18 games out of the final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference . They 'll go on the road to face the Nuggets on Saturday . Indiana has lost seven of their last seven games . They shocked the world Wednesday when they were able to steal a win from the Portland Trail Blazers 90 - 82 . The Pacers continue to try and navigate the season with an injury - depleted roster that is missing three of their starters . Ricky Rubio ( ankle ) , Kevin Martin ( wrist ) and Anderson Cody Zeller ( wrist ) were all sidelined with injuries . Tristan Thompson and Tristan Thompson combined for 30 points off the bench , with the former getting a double - double from the frontcourt . He finished with 16 points , eight rebounds and one assist in 30 minutes . Cleveland will return to action Saturday when they host the Lakers . Cleveland had its three - game winning streak snapped Saturday and currently holds the seventh seed in the Eastern Conference . The Cavaliers will play the Lakers on Tuesday , and the Cavaliers will face the Hawks in Game 4 in order to advance to the second half of a back - to - back .
The Houston Rockets notched their ninth straight win as they defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 122 - 100 , at Toyota Center on Friday night . The Rockets made history in a couple of different ways in this contest , beginning with their nine - game win streak , which is their longest win streak in eight years . They also sank an NBA-record 24 three - pointers , while James Harden passed Hakeem Olajuwon , to become the Rockets ' all time triple - double leader , as he notched his second straight triple - double , for the fifteenth of his career . Harden finished with 29 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , along with 13 assists and 11 rebounds , in 34 minutes . Meanwhile , Eric Gordon notched a season - high 29 points on 10 - of - 17 shooting , including 7 - of - 12 from deep , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Rockets ( 20 - 7 ) shot 24 - of - 61 from long distance and tallied 27 assists in the game . They moved to 10 - 2 at home and will head out to Minnesota to take - on the Timberwolves on Saturday , for their second game in as many nights . The Pelicans ( 9 - 19 ) fell short on the second night of a back - to - back as they struggled shooting , going 41 percent from the field , 33 percent from long range and only 55 percent from the foul line . Anthony Davis scored 19 points before he was forced to leave the game in the third quarter with a leg contusion , and did not return . No player tallied more than 20 points for the Pelicans but five players scored in double figures , including Cheick Diallo who went 4 - of - 5 from the field , for 10 points , along with seven rebounds , in 22 minutes off the bench . The Pelicans fell to 3 - 10 on the road and will look to bounce back as they visit San Antonio on Sunday .
The Sacramento Spurs ( 5 - 4 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 6 - 4 ) 91 - 94 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Kings 47 - 38 , to coast to a nine - point victory on the road . The Kings were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Kings were also able to force the Kings into 9 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Spurs were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who shot 10 - for - 19 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also grabbing 10 rebounds . The nine rebounds matched a season - high for the guard , while the double - double was his third in a row . The Kings were led by Rudy Gay , who went 7 - for - 20 from the field and 0 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 18 points , to go along with three rebounds and six assists . After struggling to only four points and just one assist in Saturday 's matchup with the Jazz , it was good to see him get things turned back around and have a decent performance . Kawhi Leonard also had a strong showing , finishing with 16 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , five rebounds and four assists in 40 minutes . During his last three games , he 's averaging 25 points and 19 assists , as he 's had the hot hand for the Spurs . Coming off the bench , Manu Ginobili shot 7 - for - 9 from the field and 2 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 16 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 14 assists over those two games . Tony Parker was the only other Kings ' player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points in 34 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 55 - 23 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 40 - 32 ) 97 - 90 on Friday . The Spurs found out earlier in the day that superstar forward Blake Griffin will be sidelined for much longer than originally anticipated , but his problematic quadriceps tendon is n't the cause . Instead , it 's a broken right hand allegedly suffered during an altercation with a team employee in Toronto that will apparently keep him out 4 - 7 additional weeks . His continued absence keeps the spotlight squarely on Mike Conley , who has been the first player in the Grizzlies over five games on the bench with a 6 - point , seven - assist outing . The veteran point guard did not disappoint in that role Tuesday , scoring a team - high 22 points and adding six assists and two rebounds over 36 minutes . San Antonio was led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who managed a game - high 23 points , seven rebounds , an assist and three blocks . Kawhi Leonard was next with 19 points , seven rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tony Parker managed 13 points , seven assists and two rebounds . Patty Mills contributed 15 points , five assists , a rebound , a steal and a block in 23 minutes off the bench . Patty Mills was the only other starter in double digits with 15 points , while Patty Mills paced the second unit with 15 points , five assists , a rebound , and a steal . The Spurs are currently in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and they retain a rather tenuous hold on the eighth seed in the conference by one - and - one - half games over the Utah Jazz . They now head to Philadelphia to face off against the Sixers on Wednesday night .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 12 - 21 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 9 - 22 ) 111 - 104 on Tuesday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . The Pelicans really dominated all aspects of this game . To begin with , they were the superior shooters , going 53 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 49 percent from the floor and 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Pelicans also secured a 41 - 32 rebounding advantage , further helping to secure an impressive 24 - point victory on the road . Anthony Davis did all he could to keep the Mavericks in this game . Davis went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 12 - for - 14 from the free throw line to score 28 points , while also chipping in with 16 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was a season - high in points for Davis and a nice surprise for the Mavericks , as he 's averaging only 9 points on the year . Harrison Barnes was able to record a double - double , finishing with 15 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and seven rebounds in 37 minutes . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 57 points and 50 rebounds over his last two games . The only other Maverick to reach double figures in points was Harrison Barnes , who contributed 15 points and seven rebounds . The Pelicans ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Tuesday , while the Mavericks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .
The Miami Heat ( 16 - 21 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 25 - 13 ) 104 - 90 on Wednesday at American Airlines Arena in Los Angeles . The Heat got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Clippers 30 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Clippers shot 48 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Clippers went 45 percent from the floor and only 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat were also able to force the Clippers into 13 turnovers , while only committing 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Heat were led by Hassan Whiteside , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 23 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 3 - 4 FT ) , 16 rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's posted two double - doubles in a row , combining for an impressive 54 points and 22 rebounds over those two matchups . On the season , Whiteside is now averaging 20 points and 16 rebounds . The only other Clipper to reach double figures in points was JJ Redick , who scored 14 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) while adding one assist and one steal . The Clippers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Clippers will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Friday to play the Golden State Warriors .
The Los Angeles Clippers ( 26 - 14 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 11 - 28 ) 98 - 86 in a grinder of a game on Thursday night . Both teams came into this game with a lengthy lay - off and it was evident by their play . The two teams combined for just 76 points in the first half on 29 percent shooting . In fact , the 34 - point first half for the Heat was their lowest - scoring half of the season . It was the rebounding that won the game for the Clippers , as they snatched down 51 boards to the Heat 50 . Los Angeles hasn’t been playing their best ball recently and this may be their worst loss in that stretch . Chris Paul still showed up though , as he tallied 19 points and 18 assists in the defeat . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , amassing 15 points and 13 rebounds in the win . James Bass and Tyler Johnson tied for second on the team with 19 points a piece . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , as he scored 15 points to go along with 13 rebounds . The Heat will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Lakers on Sunday . This is a downright bad loss for the Heat and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . Goran Dragic led the team in scoring , tallying 24 points , five rebounds and five assists in the loss . Marreese Speights , Marreese Speights and Tyler Johnson all scored 19 points a piece . Los Angeles will look to build off this win in a tough matchup , as they play the Golden State Warriors on Saturday .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Denver Nuggets , 119 - 89 , at Verizon Center on Friday . These two teams have now split their season series and there was very little to separate them in this game as well . Despite the Nuggets leading for the majority of the first quarter , Washington took care of business in the second half to cruise to a win . There were actually six ties and eight lead changes in the first half , as the Wizards then outscored the Nuggets , 35 - 20 , in the fourth quarter to cap off their comeback win . There were nine ties and 30 lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 13 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was key , with Washington recording 35 assists to 15 turnovers , while the Nuggets committed 19 turnovers to just 16 assists . Kris Humphries led the Nuggets in scoring , as he tallied 20 points and four rebounds off the bench . Ty Lawson led the starters in scoring , collecting 14 points , four rebounds and 10 assists . Denver ( 9 - 10 ) had a tough task here against a hot Wizards team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . John Wall led the team in scoring , accruing 9 points , eight rebounds and 12 assists in the win . Ty Lawson flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 14 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Kris Humphries was a huge spark off the bench , as he totaled 16 points and three rebounds . The Nuggets will host the Toronto Raptors on Friday for their next game .
The Sacramento Kings ( 30 - 45 ) defeated the Washington Wizards ( 36 - 39 ) 120 - 111 on Sunday at Sleep Train Arena in Washington . The Kings got out to a quick start in this game , out - scoring the Wizards 32 - 34 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 56 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Wizards went 48 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Kings also secured a 40 - 42 rebounding advantage , which may have been the difference in this one . The Kings were led by DeMarcus Cousins , who posted a game - high of 29 points ( 11 - 18 FG , 6 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 9 FT ) , to go along with 10 rebounds , four steals and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 28 points and 16 rebounds . Beal , on the other hand , finished with 24 points ( 10 - 21 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , four rebounds and four assists . It was his second straight night recording 24 points , pushing his season scoring average to 28 points per game . Coming off the bench in his return from an ankle injury , Omri Casspi chipped in with 15 points ( 7 - 8 FG , 1 - 0 3Pt ) , eight rebounds and two blocked shots as well . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Wizards will be at home against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 108 - 94 Tuesday at AT & T Center . The Spurs avoided suffering from their first three - game losing streak in almost a year in pretty dominant fashion , as they opened with a big opening period and adopted a bend - but - don't - break mentality the rest of the way . San Antonio was carried by a pair of stellar performances from their stars in the frontcourt , with Kawhi Leonard and LaMarcus Aldridge shining from start to finish . Leonard finished with a game - high 36 points on top of eight rebounds and four assists , while LaMarcus Aldridge shot 8 - of - 15 from the field en route to scoring 25 points and grabbing six rebounds of his own . With the pair accounting for over half of the Spurs ' points Tuesday night , no other San Antonio players managed to score in double figures , but six managed to score at least six points . For the Thunder , they could n't overcome a slow start to the game and one of their poorest shooting performances of the season . Overall as a team , Oklahoma City shot just 35 percent from the field and 25 percent from beyond the arc . Russell Westbrook managed to lead the way with a team - high 27 points on top of 14 assists and six rebounds , while the starting frontcourt of Steven Adams and Domantas Sabonis each recorded their own double - doubles , combining for 29 points and 22 rebounds . The Thunder have now dropped two straight against two of the NBA 's best teams by a combined 30 points . Up next , the Spurs will remain home Thursday to take on the 76ers , while the Thunder will head home Wednesday and play the Bulls .
The Golden State Warriors ( 11 - 2 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 5 - 21 ) 124 - 121 on Tuesday . Golden State has won five straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 9 - 2 . Klay Thompson led the way for the Warriors in the losing effort , scoring 29 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting from the field and 5 - for - 10 from downtown . Golden State will take on the New Orleans Pelicans ( 45 - 37 ) when the playoffs commence this weekend . The Bucks ended a second straight disappointing season with a loss to the top - seeded Warriors . Draymond Green had an off night , going 3 - of - 7 from the floor en route to reording 28 points , six rebounds , five assists , three steals and one block in 37 minutes . Both teams play the second game of a back - to - back on the road on Wednesday , with the Warriors taking on the Utah Jazz ( 3 - 21 ) , while the Bucks will continue their road trip against the New Orleans Pelicans ( 7 - 57 ) on Wednesday . As well as this game was single - digits in the fourth quarter , it was the Warriors who put up a huge win on the road against the Warriors . Milwaukee has now won five of their last six games , including wins at the Heat and Bucks . Klay Thompson scored a game - high 28 points on 9 - of - 17 shooting in just 38 minutes of action . Stephen Curry added 20 points and five assists , while Andre Green added 10 points and 2 blocks . Draymond Green recorded a double - double of 10 points and 2 assists , including a game - high 2 blocks . Up next , the Warriors return home to host the Magic on Monday . Milwaukee welcomes the Timberwolves to the Staples Center to face the Thunder on Sunday .
The LA Clippers ( 46 - 27 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 43 - 31 ) 114 - 90 on Friday at TD Garden in LA . The Clippers got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Celtics 30 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 52 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 35 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Clippers were able to force the Celtics into 16 turnovers , while committing only 14 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Clippers were led by Isaiah Thomas who went 5 - for - 14 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 24 points . He also got to the free throw line 13 times , converting on a perfect 12 - of - 13 . He 's played well since returning from the All-Star break , combining for 59 points over his last two games . DeAndre Jordan had a double - double of his own , as he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 8 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) and 13 assists . It was his first double - double of the year , setting a season - high for rebounds . Jared Sullinger was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points . He finished with nine points ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , six rebounds and two assists in 29 minutes . The Clippers ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 21 - 10 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 12 - 19 ) 122 - 112 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder came out on fire in this game , out - scoring the Nuggets 32 - 32 in the first quarter alone , while eventually finishing the first half with a 61 - 37 lead . Adding to the strong start , the Thunder shot very well in this game , going 58 percent from the field and 53 percent from the three - point line , while the Nuggets finished at 49 percent from the field and 36 percent from deep . With the win , the Thunder are now just a half game out of the Boston Celtics for the final spot in the West . The Thunder , on the other hand , have now lost four straight , but still comfortably hold a four and a half game lead over the Milwaukee Bucks for the fifth spot in the West . The Thunder were led by Kenneth Faried , who went 12 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 25 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force for the league 's best team . The Thunder also received some solid contributions from their bench though , with both Jameer Nelson and Will Barton reaching double figures in points . Nelson had 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five assists , while Barton chipped in 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and five rebounds of his own . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Phoenix Suns on Friday , while the Nuggets will travel to San Antonio to play the Spurs on Friday .

The Timberwolves got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Timberwolves 57 - 49 in the first half alone . The Nets were the superior shooters in this game , going 58 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Timberwolves went just 47 percent from the floor and 60 percent from beyond the arc . The Nets were also able to force the Timberwolves into 16 turnovers , while only committing 16 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Nets were led by Kevin Martin , who went 7 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while also adding three rebounds . He 's had a decent two - game stretch , combining for 43 points , six assists and three steals . LaVine was a huge factor in the win as well , finishing with 20 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt ) , three assists and two blocked shots . He 's now averaging 20 points and 8 rebounds on the season . The only other Timberwolve to reach double figures in points was Gorgui Dieng , who scored 11 points and grabbed five rebounds . The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 100 - 93 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . More often than not , the trio of LeBron James , Kevin Love and Kyrie Irving are essentially enough to overcome most opponents . It was a different story Sunday , however , as veteran Channing Frye actually led the way with a season - high 20 - point effort in 25 minutes off the bench . The aforementioned starters were n't necessarily underwhelming , as they combined for 55 points , including four total three - pointers from Love and James . Defense was also undeniably a factor , as Cleveland ( 8 - 1 ) held the Hornets ( 6 - 3 ) to 38 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range . The Hornets were led by Kemba Walker , who tallied 21 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal . Marvin Williams posted 16 points , six rebounds and two assists . Nicolas Batum managed a near double - double with 15 points , nine boards , seven assists , two steals and a block . Michael Kidd-Gilchrist did get there , supplying 11 points , 10 rebounds , two assists and a steal . Frye added three rebounds and three blocks to his team - high scoring total . A pair of 19 - point efforts from James and Irving paced the starting five , with the former also filling out the stat sheet with eight rebounds , eight assists , a steal and a block and the latter dishing out four assists , posting three rebounds and recording a steal . Love was strong as well , pouring in 17 points and bringing in 11 rebounds , four assists and a steal . Tristan Thompson mustered a modest four points , but did bring in 12 rebounds . The Hornets move on to Minnesota to take on the Timberwolves on Tuesday night , while the Cavaliers remain home to take on the Raptors on Tuesday evening as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Charlotte Hornets 105 - 90 at Spectrum Center on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 9 - 5 ) pulled out their fifth straight win behind a strong effort from Mike Conley . The floor general for the Grizzlies was an all around force from end - to - end , especially after losing James Ennis ( calf ) . The calf injury flared up after returning to the lineup on Monday , and is another blow to the front court for Memphis given Chandler Parsons ( bruised left knee ) inability to play for roughly two more weeks . Memphis controlled the pace of the game from start to finish and never let the Hornets ( 8 - 5 ) get close enough to make it a game . The game got blow fully open after Conley buried a 27 - foot three point shot to take a 69 - 45 lead with just a few seconds left in the third quarter . The Grizzlies point guard finished with 31 points , four rebounds , two assists and three steals on 11 - of - 21 shooting . JaMychal Green had a great performance in the starting lineup with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist on 4 - of - 4 shooting in 31 minutes . Kemba Walker led the starting lineup in scoring for the Hornets , but failed to provide enough to get his team back in the game after contributing 17 points and two assists . Charlotte got strong productivity from the bench , where Frank Kaminsky dropped 23 points on 11 shots in 20 minutes , while Spencer Hawes added 14 points and 10 rebounds . Both teams play on Saturday , as the Hornets host the San Antonio Spurs , while the Grizzlies head to Philadelphia to take on the 76ers .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 24 - 16 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 23 - 16 ) 88 - 79 on Saturday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Utah , as they shot 39 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Jazz really turned it on , as they outscored the Jazz 40 to 25 . The Grizzlies actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 37 boards to the Jazz 's 43 . The Jazz played this game without a suspended James , and they did n't disappoint . Mike Conley was the player of the game , as he accumulated 19 points , nine assists and two rebounds in the win . Zach Randolph recorded a double - double , amassing 13 points and 11 rebounds . Zach Randolph was the only other player in double figures , as he amassed 13 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . The Jazz have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next matchup . The Grizzlies continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . Marc Gasol had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 17 points , four rebounds and two assists in the win . Mike Conley also had a good game , as he tallied 19 points , nine assists and two steals in the defeat . The only other player in double figures was Zach Randolph , as he totaled 13 points , two rebounds and four assists in the defeat . The Jazz will look to get out of this slide on Saturday against the struggling Phoenix Suns .
The Miami Heat ( 14 - 16 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 17 - 11 ) 101 - 91 on Friday . Miami is on a two - game win streak . They jumped out to a 30 - 27 lead after the first quarter and held the Cavaliers at a distance the rest of the game . The Heat shot 48 percent from the field and 33 percent from beyond the arc , while also giving up 24 easy points on 15 turnovers Tuesday , essentially giving away the game . Kyrie Irving scored a game - high 25 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting in 42 minutes of action . Kyrie Irving posted 25 points on 10 - of - 19 shooting to go along with four rebounds and three assists in 42 minutes . Kevin Love recorded 14 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting , five rebounds , and three assists in 39 minutes . Kevin Love struggled from the field , shooting 5 - of - 13 en route to 14 points , five rebounds , three assists , one steal , one block and four three - pointers in 39 minutes . Luol Deng had a solid outing , putting up 25 points on 11 - of - 16 shooting from the field . Cleveland will stay home to host the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday . Cleveland has dropped two straight games . They shot a woeful 44 percent from the field and 23 percent from beyond the arc Sunday . Dwyane Wade led the team in scoring with 31 points ( 12 - 28 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt ) , to go with five rebounds , five assists and one steal in 37 minutes . Kevin Love had 14 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) , five rebounds , three assists , one steal and one block in 39 minutes . The Heat now head to Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Wednesday night . The Heat the next game will be at home against the Toronto Raptors on Friday .
The Orlando Magic ( 28 - 36 ) defeated the visiting Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 39 ) 107 - 100 , Saturday evening at Amway Center . The Kings came into this game winners of four of their last five games and half a game ahead of the eighth place Dallas Mavericks , while the Kings came in losers of three of their last four , but just a few wins away from clinching a playoff spot . However , each team played as if they came in with the other 's streak , as the struggling Magic trounced the cruising Kings . The Kings managed to pour in 72 first - half points , which is the most points the Kings have given up in a first half all season . The Magic snapped a three - game losing streak and will look to make it three as they host the Lakers on Monday . Sacramento was without big man Tyson Chandler , who sat out with back spasms . The Kings placed seven starters in double figures , led by Aaron Gordon , who finished with 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 10 FT ) , 11 rebounds and one assist , in 27 minutes . Evan Fournier added 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , seven rebounds and six assists , in 38 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , while holding the Kings to 40 percent shooting . Aaron Gordon was a bright spot as well . He scored 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) , along with 11 rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 27 minutes . Jason Smith chipped in 16 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 6 FT ) , seven rebounds , two steals and three blocks , in 23 minutes off the bench , while Marco Belinelli added 17 points , three rebounds and one assist , in 28 minutes off the bench . The Kings shot 52 percent from the field , while holding the Kings to 40 percent shooting . Aaron Gordon was a bright spot as well . He scored 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG ) , along with 11 rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 27 minutes off the bench . Evan Fournier tallied 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) , six rebounds and six assists , in 38 minutes , while Darren Collison chipped in 10 points ( 4 - 9 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and five assists , in 14 minutes . DeMarcus Cousins sat this one out with a sore back . The Kings had seven players score in double digits but could not come up clutch to get the win . Aaron Gordon led the way for the Kings with 20 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 4 - 10 FT ) , along with 11 rebounds , one assist and one steal , in 27 minutes . Evan Fournier tallied 16 points ( 6 - 15 FG , 4 - 4 3Pt ) , six assists , seven rebounds and one steal , in 38 minutes . Rudy Gay finished with 12 points ( 2 - 9 FG )
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 44 - 17 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 38 - 26 ) 120 - 103 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got out to an extremely quick start , out - scoring the Celtics 22 - 35 in the first quarter , while grabbing a 61 - 33 lead by half . They did n't slow down coming out of the half either , out - scoring the Celtics 36 - 29 in the third quarter , therefore setting them up to pull off an impressive 33 - point win in front of their home crowd . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this one , going 51 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 46 percent from the floor and just 44 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 28 points ( 11 - 20 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 5 - 9 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , eight assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Thomas had a relatively quiet night . He went 9 - for - 15 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 27 points , while also adding four assists . He 's now averaging 12 points and 1 rebounds on the year . The other two starters to reach double figures in points was Jae Crowder , who chipped in 12 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) and four rebounds in 37 minutes . The double - double marked his second over his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaged 17 points and 12 rebounds . Coming off the bench , Iman Shumpert added 12 points ( 4 - 8 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds in 37 minutes . The only other Cavalier to reach double figures in points was Jae Crowder , who came off the bench to score 12 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) in 37 minutes . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Chicago Bulls on Friday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 7 - 5 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 9 ) 88 - 86 on Friday . Phoenix has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Suns right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Brandon Jennings returned to action after missing the previous three games with a hip injury . He led the team in scoring with 19 points in 35 minutes . Detroit has lost three straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Pistons will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Pistons have the right guys to build a winning team around . Eric Bledsoe put together one of his best games of the season , scoring 19 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting and dishing out four assists in 36 minutes . Andre Drummond had just four points and 13 rebounds against his former team . Detroit will go on the road to play the Dallas Mavericks on Wednesday . Detroit saw their two - game win streak come to an end with the loss . Nearly all of the Pistons ' key players struggled to finish on offense . MVP candidate Andre Drummond posted just four points and 13 rebounds in 25 minutes . The Pistons will return to action Friday against the Magic .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 48 - 25 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 38 - 37 ) 109 - 86 on Friday . Portland was able to secure a win for the 16th time in the last 26 games on the strength of a typically stellar effort from offensive linchpin Damian Lillard , along with strong performances from two of their best bench players . After a dead - even first period , Portland forged ahead in the second quarter to build a 14 - point lead by halftime . Both teams played relatively mistake - free basketball , with only 16 turnovers between them , but the Trail Blazers managed to stay a step ahead of the Suns on the night to secure the relatively comfortable victory . Lillard 's 19 points paced Portland , and he added seven rebounds , seven assists and a steal . LaMarcus Aldridge followed with 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Arron Warren contributed 16 points , two boards and a steal . Chris Kaman turned in a near double - double with 12 points , nine assists , seven rebounds and a steal . Marcus Morris paced the reserves with 13 points , a rebound and an assist . The Suns remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are 11 games behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night . Portland was paced by Damian Lillard , who tallied 19 points , seven assists , four rebounds and a steal . Arron Afflalo was next in line with 16 points , a pair of rebounds and a block . Markieff Morris contributed 11 points , six rebounds , two assists and a block . T.J. Morris rounded out a forgettable night for the starting five with 12 points , seven rebounds , a steal and a block . The Suns remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division , and are just a game behind the eighth - seeded Dallas Mavericks . They head to Sacramento to take on the Kings on Sunday night .

The Boston Celtics ( 2 - 2 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 2 - 2 ) 104 - 95 on Wednesday at Philips Arena in Atlanta . The Hawks were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks went 37 percent from the floor and a meager 29 percent from beyond the arc . To put the icing on the cake , the Celtics forced the Hawks into 14 turnovers , while committing just 14 of their own . The Celtics ' frontcourt was dominant in this matchup . Paul Millsap went 19 - for - 31 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 45 points , while also adding 13 rebounds to go along with four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 10 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Jeff Turner was the other player to score a double - double of his own . He went 7 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while also adding seven rebounds and six assists . He 's now averaging 14 points and 4 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Jonas Jerebko finished with 12 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Hawks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 56 - 6 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 35 ) 119 - 113 on Wednesday at the Oracle Arena in Oakland . The Warriors came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Magic 31 - 18 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Warriors shot the ball well , going 50 percent from the field and 46 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 44 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Magic into 15 turnovers , while committing only 24 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Stephen Curry had his way the game . He went 14 - for - 24 from the field and 7 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 41 points , while also adding three assists and four steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Oladipo on the other hand finished with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , nine rebounds and eight assists . It was his second straight night recording 20 points , pushing his season scoring average to 20 points per game . Jason Smith chipped in with 13 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , two rebounds and two steals as well . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Thursday , while the Magic will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .
The Detroit Pistons ( 26 - 23 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 12 - 37 ) 105 - 100 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 28 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 43 percent from the field , while the Nets shot just 49 percent . The Pistons also out - rebounded the Nets 49 - 39 , giving them even more of an advantage . In just his third game of the season , Brook Lopez led the way for the Nets . He went 13 - for - 19 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding five rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's really turned it on over his last four games , posting three double - doubles during that span . Over that five game stretch , he 's averaged 31 points , 11 rebounds and 3 blocks . Andre Drummond did his best to keep the Nets in position , posting 21 points ( 10 - 15 FG , 1 - 3 FT ) and 18 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 68 points and 12 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Stanley Johnson , who came off the bench for 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt ) and one rebound . The Nets ' next game will be on the road against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Nets will travel to New York to play the Knicks on Sunday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 15 - 2 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 9 - 8 ) 97 - 85 on Monday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . Memphis ended the third quarter riding a close 94 - 90 lead , but were able to out - score the Kings 23 - 20 in the final quarter to secure the nine - point win on the road . The Grizzlies were the superior shooting team in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 23 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 47 percent from the floor and just 9 percent from beyond the arc . The Grizzlies also secured a 35 - 42 rebounding advantage , further helping to secure an impressive 17 - point victory on the road . Zach Randolph was a force in this game , going 8 - for - 16 from the field and 6 - for - 10 from the free throw line for a game - high of 22 points , while also adding 12 rebounds and three steals . It was a season - high in points for Randolph , who also posted his second double - double in as many games . Reggie Evans was n't too far behind him , putting up 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 7 FT ) and seven assists in 31 minutes . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in four out of his last five games . Tony Allen was the other big contributor for the Kings . He went 6 - for - 7 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while grabbing two rebounds . It was his second strong showing in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 22 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 17 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Mike Collison was the only other Kings ' player to reach double figures in points , as he finished with 16 points . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .

The Denver Nuggets defeated the host New York Knicks , 131 - 123 , at Madison Square Garden on Friday . Defense has been optional for these teams all season and the 254 combined points in this game show just where their priorities are . Denver really took control in the third quarter , outscoring New York , 36 - 22 , and never relinquishing the lead from there . Both offenses were scoring at ease , with both teams shooting over 55 percent from the field . The Nuggets feasted down low , as they won the rebounding differential , 44 - 33 , and outscored the Knicks , 68 - 52 , in the paint . The Nuggets ( 24 - 29 ) have been one of the best offenses in the league this season and this 131 - point outing shows just how efficient they can be . Nikola Jokic was the player of the game , as he dropped a career - high 40 points on 17 - of - 23 shooting , adding nine rebounds , five assists and two rebounds to his tally . Wilson Chandler finished second on the team , collecting 19 points , four rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . Jameer Nelson started for Emmanuel Mudiay and accrued 16 points , four rebounds and 12 assists . Will Barton was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 15 points , 10 rebounds and four assists . The Knicks ( 22 - 33 ) have had a ton of drama surrounding their team and losses like this show just why . Carmelo Anthony did all he could to carry New York , as he accumulated 33 points , six rebounds , four assists and two steals on 13 - of - 20 from the field . Kristaps Porzingis was second on the team , finishing with 17 points , four rebounds and two assists . Brandon Jennings got a rare start and led the team with 13 assists , despite going just 2 - of - 10 from the field . Kyle O'Quinn led the bench , providing 16 points , six rebounds , three assists and four blocks .

The Nuggets ( 21 - 27 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Nuggets ( 22 - 27 ) , managing a 45 percent success rate from the floor and 32 percent mark from three - point range . They also elicited 14 turnovers from the Nuggets , while holding Denver to a 45 percent success rate from the field . Jamal Murray led the bench with 18 points , three rebounds , one assist and one steal . Will Barton led the second unit with nine points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals . Murray 's 16 points paved the way for Denver , and Kenneth Faried led the way with a 19 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included an assist , a block and a block . They head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Monday .
The Houston Rockets ( 17 - 7 ) defeated the Dallas Mavericks ( 5 - 18 ) 109 - 87 on Monday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets were the superior shooters in this one , going 50 percent from the field and 51 percent from the three - point line , while the Mavericks went 41 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets were able to force the Mavericks into 9 turnovers , while committing just 15 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Wesley Matthews led the way , going 8 - for - 22 from the field and 5 - for - 13 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 26 points , while also adding two assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to be , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 12 points and 14 rebounds on the year . James Harden was able to get his shot going into the game and finished with 18 points ( 4 - 12 FG , 2 - 8 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , nine rebounds and two steals . It marked his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 13 points and 7 rebounds on the season . Deron Williams really struggled with his shot , going 3 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from beyond the arc to score nine points . He also added nine rebounds and 17 assists , as he did a little bit of everything Tuesday . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Mavericks will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Saturday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves , 93 - 91 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday night . The Sixers ( 9 - 24 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Timberwolves ( 11 - 24 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing LaVine 's ridiculous output . The Sixers ( 11 - 24 ) , on the other hand , managed to have an even worse night shooting than Philadelphia en route to their eighth straight victory , as Philadelphia shot just 39 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range in the game . Minnesota was led by a pair of 19 - point efforts from Ersan Ilyasova and Ersan Ilyasova , with the former adding five rebounds , an assist , and a block , and the latter providing five rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Ersan Ilyasova went for 19 points , five rebounds , an assist and a block . Gorgui Dieng had a near double - double with 10 points , eight boards , two assists , four steals and a block . Andrew Wiggins paced the Sixers with 19 points , five boards and an assist . Ersan Ilyasova was next with 19 points , five rebounds and an assist . Robert Covington totaled 13 points , 10 rebounds , two assists , four steals and a block . Gorgui Dieng posted a 13 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also included two assists , four steals and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins supplied eight points , four rebounds , three assists and a steal . Rubio led the second unit with 5 points , five assists , three rebounds and two steals . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Monday night .

It was a nice surprise for the Nets , as he 's averaging only 6 points per game so far this season . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 30 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 17 points and 26 rebounds on the season . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 9 - for - 26 from the field and 3 - for - 10 from the three - point line to score 23 points , while adding six assists . He was able to get to the free throw line at will , converting on nine of those attempts . He 's now averaging 15 points and 14 rebounds on the season . Jeff Green was the other starter to reach double - digit points , as he went 6 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from beyond the arc to score 17 points . The Grizzlies ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

It was also his second game in a row with three steals , as he keeps getting it done on the defensive side of the ball as well . The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the Dallas Mavericks 92 - 91 Monday at American Airlines Center . With just over three minutes remaining in Monday 's contest , the Thunder ( 42 - 31 ) looked dead in the water , as they were down 13 and the Mavericks ( 31 - 42 ) had control for majority of the game . Russell Westbrook , however , had other plans , as he led the team on a 140 run to end the game that was topped off by a game - winning jumper from the free throw line . Westbrook finished with yet another triple - double of 37 points ( 16 of which came in the final quarter ) , 13 rebounds and 10 assists in 36 minutes , and he did so while shooting an efficient 15 - of - 30 from the field . And the MVP-candidate carried the load for Oklahoma City , as Victor Oladipo ( 15 ) and Taj Gibson ( 13 ) were the only other players to score in double figures for the Thunder . As for Dallas , they played a strong 45 minutes before collapsing down the stretch and missing their final six shots from the field . Six different Thunder players managed to score in double figures , but overall , it ended up being a subpar offensive performance from the team , as they shot just 41 percent from the field . It was , however , one of the better performances from Nerlens Noel since he was traded to Dallas , as he recorded 15 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting and eight rebounds - - both of which were team - highs - - in 28 minutes . Up next , the Thunder will head to Orlando on Friday to take on the Magic , while the Mavericks will look to avoid dropping their third straight game in New Orleans on Wednesday .

LA ( 32 - 16 ) has been dominant this season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . DeAndre Jordan did all he could for Chicago , as he led the team with 17 points and 20 rebounds . JJ Paul was n't far behind , as he accumulated 23 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Pau Gasol finished with 15 points and 14 rebounds en route to a double - double .
The Miami Heat ( 25 - 33 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 25 - 12 ) 91 - 93 on Friday . Miami 's defense was lacking for the first three quarters , but they really turned it on in the fourth . In fact , they held the Hawks to just 29 points in the final 26 minutes and held the Hawks to just 40 points in the second half . They also shot 40 percent from the field and 40 percent from three - point range in their win . The turnovers were a huge factor as well , with the Heat snatching down 47 boards to the Hawks 47 . The Heat had to play this game in the second half of a back - to - back set and they were clearly tired in this loss . Paul Millsap played great in his return though , as he tallied 14 points , seven rebounds and two assists . Hassan Whiteside dominated the stat sheet , as he totaled 14 points , 24 rebounds and two blocks in the victory . Dennis Schroeder was the only other player in double figures , accruing 16 points , four assists and five steals in the win . Henry Walker and John Jenkins both scored 10 points and seven rebounds off the bench . The Hawks will look to keep things rolling on Saturday against the Washington Wizards in their next game . Atlanta hasn’t been playing their best ball as of late either , but they looked great here . It was their annual Martin Luther King game and this game means as much to Atlanta as anyone in the NBA , considering MLK 's hometown is Atlanta . This was an all - around team effort , as the bench scored 49 points of their own with six players scoring in double - figures . In fact , 24 players scored for the Heat , but nobody who scored more than 10 . They 'll look to build off this win in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets on Monday .
The Portland Trail Blazers ( 7 - 3 ) beat the Brooklyn Nets ( 4 - 5 ) 97 - 87 on Sunday . This game was much closer than most people would have anticipated , as the Trail Blazers had their worst shooting night of the season . The still ended up prevailing with the victory despite shooting 8 - for - 38 from three - point range . The most notable stat line was a triple - double from Brook Lopez , as he accumulated 21 points , four rebounds , four assists and two steals in the win . Deron Williams also had a nice all - around game , as he contributed 19 points , six rebounds and six assists . The godsend for this team all year has been Bojan Bogdanovic , but he really struggled with his shot and finished with 12 points and six assists . Kevin Garnett had his best game of the season though , as he tallied 12 points , 12 rebounds and three blocks . Meyers Leonard also played well off the bench , as he amassed 7 points and 12 rebounds . The only other player in double figures was Kevin Garnett , who totaled 12 points and 12 rebounds . No other player scored in double figures for the Nets , as the other three starters combined for just 10 points . The bench did combine for 23 points and 18 rebounds , but most of that came in garbage time . Damian Lillard continued his torrid start as well , as he scored 28 points , five rebounds and six assists . Kevin Garnett turned back the clock , as he totaled 12 points and 12 rebounds . Joe Johnson gave the team a nice spark off the bench as well , as he tallied 10 points , three rebounds and two assists . The Trail Blazers will look to build off this win on Wednesday against the Atlanta Hawks .
The New Orleans Pelicans ( 4 - 3 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 1 - 7 ) 109 - 102 on Tuesday at the Staples Center in Los Angeles . Despite being down 51 - 46 at halftime , the Pelicans were able to out - score the Lakers 34 - 24 in the third quarter , giving them enough of an edge to get the victory on the road in Los Angeles . The Pelicans were the superior shooters in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Lakers finished at 42 percent from the floor and 33 percent from deep . This marked the fifth straight loss for the Lakers , as they look to improve their draft positioning for the 2015 NBA Draft . The Pelicans got a huge contribution off the bench , as Carlos Anderson finished with 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) and eight rebounds . It was a new season - high in points for him and a nice bounce back outing , after posting only six points in Sunday 's loss to the Grizzlies . Tyreke Evans also had a solid showing , finishing with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 assists . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on eight of those attempts . He 's combined for 43 points in the last two games , pushing his season averages to 15 points and 6 rebounds per game . Holiday on the other hand had 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) of his own . He was able to get to the free throw line eight times and converted on eight of those attempts . He 's combined for 43 points in the last two games , pushing his season averages to 15 points and 6 rebounds per game . Holiday on the other hand had 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) of his own , to go along with 11 assists and three rebounds . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 9 points and 3 assists per game . Tyreke Evans also had a big showing and finished with 19 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and 11 assists . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 36 points and seven assists over his last two games . He 's now averaging 16 points and 12 rebounds on the year . Jrue Holiday was able to record a double - double of his own . He added 17 points ( 8 - 17 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt ) and five assists , while Anderson had 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 3 - 7 3Pt ) and eight rebounds . The Pelicans ' next game will be on the road against the Dallas Mavericks on Friday , while the Lakers will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 111 - 103 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . The Spurs ( 40 - 12 ) came in to Wednesday 's contest looking to right some of the ills that had plagued them over their previous seven games , a stretch in which they 'd suffered five defeats . The Spurs ( 18 - 12 ) may have initially looked like easy prey , considering their losing record and the Sixers ( 18 - 34 ) , that is just the way for their long lives . San Antonio ( 18 - 34 ) were able to pierce San Antonio 's armor Wednesday , touching up Gregg Popovich 's crew for a season - high 103 points . Philadelphia had eight players hit double digits in the scoring column and tallied 53 and 38 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . They also battled back from a 54 - 37 halftime deficit to score 70 points in the second half . However , two clutch free throws by Nik Stauskas with six seconds remaining was the final margin of victory for the Spurs . The Sixers were led by Dario Saric , who tallied 20 points , four assists , two rebounds and a block . Tony Parker tallied 18 points , five assists and one rebound . No other member of the starting five was able to tally double - digit scoring , but Tony McConnell paced the Sixers with a 18 - point , 1 - assist double - double that also included a rebound and a steal . Nik Stauskas led the bench with 16 points , seven rebounds and seven assists . The Spurs head back home to take on the Los Angeles Clippers on Saturday night , while the 76ers head to the Big Apple to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Tuesday evening .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 47 - 13 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 24 - 38 ) 101 - 98 on Sunday at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans . Fighting to get back into the playoff hunt in the stacked Western Conference , the Pelicans have started to hit their stride , notching their third straight victory in a row . They used their superior shooting in this game , going 42 percent from the field and 22 percent from the three - point line , while the Pelicans went just 39 percent from the floor and a meager 32 percent from beyond the arc . While they may have had the shooting advantage , the Spurs did it elsewhere , as they out - rebounded the Pelicans 53 - 48 and forced them into 16 turnovers . The Spurs were led by the duo of Anthony Davis and Jrue Holiday . Leonard went 11 - for - 26 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 31 points , while also adding seven rebounds and six assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 16 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 21 points and 27 rebounds on the year . Jrue Holiday was able to record a double - double of his own . He finished with 26 points ( 12 - 27 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , five assists and seven rebounds , while LaMarcus Aldridge posted a double - double of 21 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 43 points and 18 rebounds over his last two games . Pau Gasol had a big game as well , finishing with 13 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 8 FT ) , nine rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now pushed his season averages to 11 points and 2 rebounds on the year . Both Pau Gasol and Patty Mills reached double figures as well , with 15 and 15 points respectively . Holiday had seven assists , while also recording seven rebounds . Patty Mills was the only other player to score double digits for the Pelicans , as he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 9 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) , to go along with two assists and two steals in 37 minutes . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Pelicans will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
