The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host Orlando Magic , 111 - 92 , at Amway Center on Wednesday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 23 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as Orlando 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 54 percent from the field and 53 percent from three - point range , while Orlando went 43 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range on their end . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive as well , as the Hawks recorded more assists than the Magic , while committing less turnovers . The Hawks ( 19 - 16 ) are starting to rebound after a terrible December and dominant road wins like this show just how good they can be . Dennis Schroeder ran the offense at ease , accumulating 18 points , six rebounds and seven assists in the win . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , totaling 13 points and 12 rebounds . Paul Millsap tallied 16 points , six rebounds , four assists and four steals . Kent Bazmore was second in scoring , dropping 17 points and handing out four assists . The Hawks will play again on Thursday in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans . The Magic ( 16 - 21 ) have been plying better with their recent lineup change , but that was n't the case here . Elfrid Payton was moved back to the starting - five for this game and led the team with 15 points , four rebounds , six assists and three steals . Aaron Gordon tied the team lead in scoring , amassing 15 points and 10 rebounds . No other starter scored in double figures , as Serge Ibaka was ejected with nine points and 11 rebounds in the final minute . Nikola Vucevic came off the bench to provide 10 points , six rebounds and six assists . Evan Fournier returned from a five - game absence to contribute 14 points off the bench . Orlando will host the Houston Rockets on Friday for their next game .
The Charlotte Hornets ( 36 - 28 ) took care of business against the Detroit Pistons ( 33 - 32 ) on Tuesday , winning 118 - 103 . The Pistons have now won eight of their last 13 games , quickly rising up the Eastern Conference standings . A large part of Charlotte 's push has been due to the play of point guard Kemba Walker , who is averaging 24 points and 4 assists over the team 's last 9 contests . Walker made another big contribution on Wednesday , scoring 16 and pulling down a surprising five rebounds . He was upstaged , however , by forwards Marvin Williams and Nic Batum , who posted 17 points apiece . Batum also facilitated the offense nicely , dishing out a team - high five assists . For the Pistons , meanwhile , any playoff hopes are beginning to slip away , as the team now sits nine games below .500 . Guard Reggie Jackson led the team with 20 points , while rookie Tobias Harris scored 20 and added five rebounds in an efficient shots . The Pistons , meanwhile , saw struggles from their own star . Andre Drummond shot just 1 - of - 1 from the field and had just five points on 1 - for - 1 shooting . The team will face off against the Washington Wizards on Wednesday , but the Pistons will look to make their way back in the right direction . The Hornets , meanwhile , will hope to continue their hot streak as they travel to Washington to take on the Wizards .
The New York Knicks defeated the Indiana Pacers 87 - 81 Tuesday at Madison Square Garden . It was a rough start for the Knicks ( 27 - 41 ) , who scored just 18 points in the first quarter . Those struggles carried into the second quarter , and the team found themselves down by 10 at the half and they appeared ready to earn their fourth straight loss . A big second half , however , helped turn this around , and they managed to outscore the Pacers ( 34 - 33 ) by 16 in the second half en route to the victory . Carmelo Anthony led the way for New York , recording a double - double of 22 points and 13 rebounds in 41 minutes . Kristaps Porzingis struggled in the outing , shooting just 5 - of - 17 from the field en route to scoring 11 points , and to make matters worse , he left the game early in the fourth quarter and did not return due to a thigh bruise . As for Indiana , it was a forgettable shooting night for them in every aspect of the game . As a team , the Pacers shot just 37 percent from the field , 28 percent from behind the arc and 60 percent from the free throw line - - although they only attempted 15 shots at the charity stripe . Paul George led the way with over a quarter of the team 's points , finishing with 22 points on a rough 9 - of - 22 shooting performance from the field . Myles Turner was the only other Indiana player to score in double figures , with the big man notching a double - double of 13 points and 16 rebounds in 31 minutes . Up next , the Knicks will have a rematch with the Nets on Thursday , while the Pacers will head home Wednesday to play the Hornets .
The Houston Rockets ( 45 - 21 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 31 - 34 ) 115 - 94 on Monday . The Rockets came in to the game with a simple mission ; prevail over a significantly undermanned Bulls squad and by doing so , clinch the final Western Conference playoff spot . The outcome was seemingly never in question , as Houston jumped out to a 23 - 33 lead after one quarter . The veteran trio of James Harden , Jimmy Butler and Clint Capela led the way as usual , and each posted double - doubles . Harden led the way with 21 points , two assists , three rebounds and two steals , while Anderson added 21 points , three boards and an assist . Lou Williams was next with a bench - leading 18 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , an assist and a pair of steals . Trevor Ariza and Trevor Ariza followed with a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former also supplying 11 rebounds , an assist and two steals , and the latter pitching in 11 boards , two assists , a steal and a block . Clint Capela followed with a 17 - point , seven - rebound double - double that also included an assist and a block . Cameron Payne contributed 11 points , two rebounds and two assists in a reserve role as well . The Bulls remain in second place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They now head to Indiana for a Sunday showdown with the Pacers .

The Atlanta Hawks ( 59 - 19 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 36 - 42 ) 114 - 111 on Sunday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Nets 33 - 26 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Nets went just 47 percent . The Nets also out - rebounded the Nets 40 - 47 , even furthering their advantage in this one . The Hawks were led by the duo of Al Horford and Brook Lopez . Horford was outstanding in this one , going 11 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 24 points , while also adding seven rebounds and two steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 12 rebounds per game . The Utah Jazz ( 9 - 8 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 10 - 6 ) Monday 95 - 68 at the Vivint Smart Home Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz maintained control of the game from the very start , opening up a 16 - point lead at the end of the first quarter and never looking back . They were led by Gordon Hayward’s game - high 24 points , and the small forward has now recorded at least 27 points in three straight games . Rudy Gobert was the only other Utah starter to score in double figures , recording 10 points on 2 - of - 14 shooting in 29 minutes . As a team , the Jazz shot 44 percent from the field and knocked down 14 three - pointers as a team . The Hawks were led by George Hill , who put up 23 points on 8 - of - 14 shooting and grabbing five rebounds in 28 minutes . In his last two games , Gobert has recorded 17 double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 24 points and 2 rebounds . Notching a double - double of his own , Gobert posted 10 points , 10 rebounds and five blocks . The Hawks were led by Rudy Gobert , who started at center and posted 10 points , 10 rebounds , five blocks , and one steal in 29 minutes . Both Trey Lyles and Trey Lyles scored 13 points in defeat off the bench . Up next , the Jazz will travel to Indiana Thursday to take on the Pacers , while the Hawks will head home Wednesday to play the Raptors .
The Dallas Mavericks ( 48 - 31 ) defeated the visiting Denver Nuggets ( 29 - 50 ) 144 - 143 , Wednesday night at Pepsi Center . The Nuggets came into this game winners of four of their last five games and half a game ahead of the eighth place Dallas Mavericks , while the Nuggets came in losers of three of their last four , but just a few wins away from clinching a playoff spot . However , each team played as if they came in with the other 's streak , as the struggling Nuggets trounced the cruising Nuggets . The Nuggets managed to force 29 turnovers in the second half and held the Nuggets to only 32 points in the fourth quarter . The Nuggets shot 42 percent from the field and 38 percent from long range , as they cruised to victory . Richard Jefferson was the high - point man for the Nuggets , with 24 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , along with two assists , four rebounds and one block , in 31 minutes . Wilson Chandler was solid as well , with 20 points ( 9 - 22 FG , 2 - 9 3Pt ) , 11 rebounds , two assists and one steal , in 49 minutes . Randy Hickson chipped in 14 points , while Al-Farouq Stoudemire added 15 points , four rebounds , four steals , two assists and one block , in 30 minutes off the bench . Next , the Nuggets will host the Grizzlies on Sunday , in what will be their last home game of the season .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 23 - 20 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 14 - 28 ) 106 - 92 on Sunday at Quicken Loans Arena in Cleveland . The Cavaliers got out to an extremely quick start , out - scoring the Jazz 31 - 20 in the first quarter , while grabbing a 61 - 21 lead by half . They came into the third quarter playing just as well and were able to use that momentum to coast to the 13 - point victory on the road in Utah . The Cavaliers were the superior shooting team in this one , going 52 percent from the field and 21 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 42 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were able to force the Jazz into 17 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this one . The Cavaliers were led by LeBron James , who nearly recorded his triple - double . He finished with 26 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 10 - 14 FT ) , seven rebounds and nine assists , as he did a little bit of everything well . He shot 8 - for - 13 from the floor and 0 - for - 3 from beyond the arc . Love finished with 19 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 4 - 4 FT ) , 13 rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's now averaging 11 points and 6 rebounds on the year . The only other Raptor to reach double figures in points was Elliot he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 16 FG , 2 - 11 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and seven rebounds . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will be at home against the Denver Nuggets on Monday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Cleveland Rockets , 128 - 60 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Houston leading for the majority of the first quarter , Cleveland led for nearly every minute of this game . Cleveland actually led for the majority of the game , with the Cavaliers never leading by more than two points . All the statistics favor the Rockets , as they won the shooting percentage , rebounding battle , fastbreak points , points in the paint and assist - to - turnover ratio . A big factor for Cleveland was their ability to keep things hanging on , as they shot just 52 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding was a glaring difference as well , with Cleveland winning that battle , 46 - 18 . The Cavaliers ( 4 - 0 ) had a tough task here without LeBron Love and Devin Booker , as they did n't have enough ammunition to match with the Cavaliers . Kyrie Irving led the team in scoring , as he dropped 32 points , two rebounds and four assists . LeBron James was n't far behind , as he accumulated 19 points , 13 rebounds and eight assists . Kevin Love recorded another double - double , totaling 24 points and five rebounds on 9 - of - 16 shooting . Eric Gordon went just 6 - of - 13 from the field , but finished with 16 points , two rebounds and three assists . Cleveland will host the Denver Nuggets on Saturday for their next game .
The Indiana Pacers ( 28 - 22 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 23 - 28 ) 105 - 84 on Wednesday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . Despite being down 41 - 30 after the first quarter , the Pistons had a monster second half , out - scoring the Pistons 26 - 12 to finish off the game and pull off the 11 - point victory on the road in Detroit . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 48 percent from the field and 29 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 41 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Paul George backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) , to go along with three rebounds , four assists and one steal . George went 9 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from beyond the arc to score 21 points , while adding three assists as well . He came two rebounds shy of a double - double , ending his streak at seven in a row . Coming off the bench , C.J . Miles had 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and three rebounds . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .
The Indiana Pacers ( 13 - 21 ) defeated the Milwaukee Bucks ( 17 - 17 ) 94 - 91 on Wednesday at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . The Pacers were the superior shooters in this game , going 43 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Bucks went 43 percent from the floor and just 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Bucks also committed 12 turnovers , forcing the Bucks into 12 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own . The Pacers ' frontcourt was huge for the Pacers in this one . Brandon Knight went 9 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 20 points , while also handing out seven assists . It was a nice bounce back game for him after scoring only six points on Friday against the Cavaliers . C.J . Miles chipped in with 22 points ( 8 - 14 FG , 6 - 9 3Pt , 0 - 1 FT ) and four rebounds as well . Doing his best to keep the Bucks in the game was CJ Miles . Miles went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a season - high of 22 points . Considering he 's averaging 10 points on the year , it was a nice surprise for the Bucks to get some extra offensive production out of Miles . Zaza Pachulia posted a double - double of 12 points ( 4 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 14 rebounds , while John Henson recorded 14 points ( 6 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and 10 rebounds . The Bucks got most of their production from both CJ Miles . Miles went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 6 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score a career - high of 22 points , while also adding four rebounds and four steals . The Bucks ' next game will be at home against the Boston Celtics on Friday , while the Bucks will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Indiana Pacers , 113 - 95 , at American Airlines Arena on Monday . The recent form of these teams would indicate a Miami blowout , but that simply was n't the case in this close - fought battle . A 18 - 1 run spanning between the second and third quarter was the decisive stretch , as that swung a double - digit lead for the Pacers into a 13 - point lead for the Heat . Despite there being just one ties and three lead changes , neither team led by more than 15 points , as it was a single - digit margin for well over 40 minutes . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with Miami going 14 - of - 24 from long range , while Indiana went just 5 - of - 24 . The Heat did dominate the rebounding though , winning that battle , 43 - 43 . It was a near wire - to - wire win for Miami , as they led for the final 50 - plus minutes . The Pacers ( 30 - 29 ) have now won three - straight games , as they continue to show how dangerous they can be . Goran Dragic was the player of the game , as he collected 21 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . Myles Turner finished second on the team , totaling 18 points , seven rebounds , two steals and two blocks . Jeff Johnson accrued 15 points , seven rebounds , eight assists and two steals . Glenn Robinson III played well off the bench , providing 13 points , five rebounds and two assists . Indiana will look to keep rolling on Friday against the Cleveland Cavaliers .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Chicago Bulls , 101 - 99 , at United Center on Wednesday . The normally porous Wizards ( 19 - 18 ) , they of the lone road victory on the season , did n't give an inch Wednesday , holding the Wizards ( 19 - 20 ) to 51 and 37 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . The Bulls were led by a pair of 19 - point efforts from Markieff Morris and Bradley Beal , with the former adding five rebounds , two assists and two steals and the latter supplying four rebounds and three assists . Denzel Valentine led the bench with 19 points , two rebounds , two assists and two steals . Rajon Rondo tallied 12 points , six assists , four rebounds and three steals . Doug McDermott was productive in a reserve role as well with 19 points , two assists , two rebounds and two steals . Taj Gibson tallied 11 points , two rebounds , two assists and one block . Bobby Portis led the bench with 13 points and seven rebounds . The Bulls were led by Markieff Morris 's 19 points , which he supplemented with five rebounds , two assists and three steals . Denzel Valentine was right behind him with a full stat line of 19 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Robin Lopez registered 14 points , six boards , one assist and one steal . Rajon Rondo submitted a 12 - point , 6 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds , three steals and one block . Michael Carter-Williams led the bench with 14 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals , while Rondo dished out six assists , hauled in four boards and recorded three steals . Bobby Portis stepped up with 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and two steals . Rajon Rondo filled out the stat sheet with 12 points , six rebounds , six assists and three steals . Bobby Portis led the second unit with 13 points , seven rebounds and a steal .

Utah has lost two straight , and while they 've tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Jazz will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Hawks have the right guys to build a winning team around . San Antonio has won two of their last four as they seem to be finally adapating to playing without Kawhi Leonard ( hand ) and Tony Parker ( hamstring ) who remain sidelined indefinitely . The return of Patty Mills from shoulder surgery three games ago has given them more help off the bench and more scoring . He put up just eight points in 16 minutes Wednesday , but he was in the starting lineup to begin overtime , showing how highly coach Gregg Popovich thinks of Mills . D.J. was the lone bright spot for Detroit on Tuesday , scoring 22 points off the bench . Detroit will go on the road to face the Houston Rockets on Wednesday . Detroit has lost their last two games , as they were navigating a murder 's row of the Clippers , Mavericks and Spurs . Kentavious Caldwell-Pope scored a game - high 20 points , and Tony Green backed his play with a double - double of 19 points and 3 rebounds . The Pistons have two days off before beginning a four - game homestand Wednesday against the New Orleans Pelicans . The Pistons will finish off their back - to - back set Wednesday when they host the Brooklyn Nets . Detroit had their five - game win streak snapped with the loss . Playing on the second night of a back - to - back , the Pistons did n't seem to have enough spring left in their legs , as they shot just 41 percent from the field and were out - rebounded 36 - 17 , giving the Spurs a chance to win the game .
The Golden State Warriors ( 36 - 7 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 30 - 7 ) 111 - 111 on Sunday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Warriors played with some serious desperation . The big difference in the game were the benches , as Golden State got 0 - for - 28 from long distance and just 9 - for - 23 from the charity stripe . Both teams really struggled shooting , as they both failed to crack 31 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . The second quarter is where the Warriors won the game , as they outscored the Warriors 26 - 26 in that 21 - minute stretch . Golden State has been playing the best defense in the NBA over recent weeks and continued that form here . Derrick Rose scored a game - high 30 points in the loss , while also collecting seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . David Lee also played well in the loss , as he tallied 24 points , nine rebounds and six assists in the defeat . The Warriors will look to get out of this rut on Saturday in a much better matchup against the Orlando Magic . The Splash brothers really took it to the Bulls here in what was definitely a revenge game . Derrick Rose led the team with 30 points and also snatched down seven rebounds . Steph Curry accumulated 21 points , four rebounds and nine assists in the defeat . The Bulls will look to exact revenge on Thursday in a rematch with the Warriors for their next game .

The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 3 ) defeated the Memphis Grizzlies ( 3 - 3 ) 104 - 84 on Tuesday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis . Despite out - scoring the Grizzlies 22 - 15 in the final quarter , the Thunder were able to hold off the late comeback , and secure a victory in front of their home fans . The Thunder were the superior shooters in this one , going 49 percent from the field and 33 percent from the three - point line , while the Grizzlies went 37 percent from the floor and just 21 percent from deep . The Thunder also did a solid job of the ball though , as they forced the Grizzlies into 10 turnovers , while committing just 13 of their own . The Thunder were led by Kevin Durant , who nearly recorded a triple - double with 36 points ( 11 - 23 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 14 - 15 FT ) , 10 rebounds and two blocked shots . The double - double marked his ninth of the season thus far . The only other Hawk to reach double figures in points was Tony Allen , who had 13 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) in 29 minutes . Coming off the bench , James Johnson continued his strong play with 15 points ( 4 - 11 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 8 FT ) , five rebounds and two steals in 18 minutes . The Thunder 's next game will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Wednesday , while the Grizzlies will be at home against the Los Angeles Clippers on Wednesday .

The Trail Blazers ( 9 - 12 ) checked in to Monday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They heated up significantly from the field against the Timberwolves ( 8 - 11 ) , managing a 51 percent success rate from the floor and 33 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Timberwolves ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 33 percent shooting from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . Minnesota 's cause was significantly undermined by an atypically poor shooting night from Ricky Rubio , who posted only nine points on a 1 - of - 5 tally from the floor . Minnesota was led by Karl-Anthony Towns , who totaled a game - high 27 points , 12 rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Andrew Wiggins was next with 17 points , five rebounds and one block . Andrew Wiggins was next with 17 points and five boards . Kevin Garnett supplied a 11 - point , 1 - rebound double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Allen Crabbe paced the second unit with 11 points , three rebounds and one assist . Allen Crabbe was productive in a reserve role as well with 11 points . The Timberwolves continue on the road and head south to Atlanta , where they 'll face off with the Hawks on Friday night , while the Timberwolves remain home and await the Sacramento Kings for a showdown on Friday evening as well .

Anderson Varejao sat out the game with a rib contusion . Tristan Thompson filled in as a spot starter at center and put up two points and 12 rebounds in 28 minutes . The Pacers seem to be going away from force feeding Love in the post , and they 're simply letting him clean up all of his teammates ' mistakes , a role that he excelled in last season . They 'll host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday . Cleveland has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 41 percent from the field and 37 percent from beyond the arc . Miles , who goes down to Sunday 's loss . He had seven points and four assists in 35 minutes of action . The Cavaliers will face the Cavs on Tuesday in Indiana .
The Utah Jazz ( 3 - 4 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 2 - 4 ) 97 - 96 on Tuesday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Collectively as a team , the Pistons shot just 34 percent from the field and limped to a brutal 26 percent clip from deep . The Jazz , on the other hand , stayed hot all game long , going 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons finished at 39 percent from the floor and a meager 26 percent from deep . The Jazz also forced the Pistons into 11 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own . The Jazz were led by the duo of Greg Monroe and Gordon Jennings . Monroe went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 19 points , while also adding 11 rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 53 points and 13 rebounds over his last two games . He 's now averaging 16 points and 13 rebounds on the season . He 's now averaging 17 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming one rebound short of a double - double , Enes Kanter finished with 14 points and 11 rebounds . It was his fifth double - double of the season . This marked the fourth straight loss for the Timberwolves , as they look to end their losing streak on the season . Redick was solid in 27 minutes off the bench , finishing with 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) and four assists . The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Philadelphia 76ers 113 - 95 Wednesday at American Airlines Center . The Mavericks ( 19 - 30 ) steamrolled their way to a fourth straight victory as they continue to be much - improved since the start of the new year . They have now won five of their last six games and boast a 9 - 6 record in 2017 . A major part of this run has been the play of Seth Curry , who scored a game - high 22 points Wednesday on top of six assists , four steals and three rebounds . It was his ninth game since the start of the new year with at least 15 points . The surprise performance of the night , however , came off the bench from Salah Mejri , who played just 21 minutes as a reserve but recorded 16 points and a game - high 17 rebounds in that time . Devin Harris also had a solid day off the bench , scoring 14 points in just 19 minutes . As for the 76ers ( 18 - 30 ) , they 've cooled off a bit since their hot start to January , as they have now lost three of their last four games after Wednesday 's defeat . Jahlil Okafor put together a solid offensive performance in the loss , scoring 16 points in 24 minutes , but it 's clear that Philadelphia is missing the inside presence of Joel Embiid , who has now missed five of the last six games with a knee contusion . Ersan Ilyasova added a double - double of 13 points and 10 rebounds , but overall for the 76ers , it was a forgettable night offensively . The team ended up shooting just 46 percent from the field and 27 percent from behind the arc while committing 21 total turnovers . Up next , the Mavericks will look to continue their winning ways against Portland on Friday , while the 76ers will travel Thursday to San Antonio .
The Phoenix Suns ( 27 - 20 ) beat the Washington Wizards ( 31 - 16 ) 106 - 98 on Friday . Washington found out before the game that starting shooting guard Bradley Beal will miss a minimum of two weeks with what is being termed as an initial - stage stress reaction in his lower right fibula . The development thrust Marcus Morris into the starting lineup in Beal 's stead , a situation that the six - year pro had played well in earlier this season . It also figured to add more offensive responsibility to Beal 's backcourt mate John Wall and small forward Markieff Morris . Washington has now dropped two straight games in a row with four of their previous seven . Washington managed to extend their record to 27 - 20 and currently resides in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division . They head to Charlotte to take on the Hornets on Monday . Phoenix was spearheaded by Goran Dragic 's 20 points , which he supplemented with five assists , three rebounds and two steals . Goran Thomas was next with 18 points , four assists , a rebound and a steal . Marcin Gortat managed 14 points , eight rebounds and a block in 34 minutes . The outing was a glimpse of the significant potential the Wizards ' offense possesses , even with Bradley Beal out of the lineup and a growing reserve frontcourt . Alex Humphries followed with 11 points , a rebound and an assist . Bradley Beal celebrated his return to the starting lineup with a modest eight points , five assists and three rebounds . Seraphin and Tucker paced the reserves with 12 points , a rebound and an assist . The Suns fell to 31 - 16 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit to take on the Pistons on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 2 - 1 ) 106 - 106 on Wednesday at Sleep Train Arena in Sacramento . The Kings continue to struggle and have now lost four of their last five games , after starting the season 2 - 4 . The Kings , on the other hand , have now lost four straight , but still comfortably hold a four and a half game lead over the Oklahoma City Thunder in the Southwest Division . Meanwhile , Andrew Wiggins did everything he could to keep the Kings in this game , going 10 - for - 20 from the field and 1 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score 29 points in 37 minutes . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Sacramento , 44 - 48 , in the fourth quarter . The Warriors shot 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from long range . Rebounding was also decisive , with the Warriors winning that battle , 44 - 37 . Sacramento ( 27 - 45 ) are trying to keep their playoffs hope alive and this win can only help that pursuit . The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder 110 - 108 Monday at Chesapeake Energy Arena . Monday 's game came with no shortage of drama , as after plenty of back and forth in the final period , Paul Millsap sit a short jumper that put the Hawks ( 16 - 12 ) up by two with just 12 seconds remaining . The Thunder ( 16 - 12 ) , with one last opportunity remaining went to their star guard Russell Westbrook , who missed a jumper , got the rebound and got his shot blocked before Oklahoma City was able to call one last timeout . The Thunder inbounded it to Westbrook again , who missed a potential game - winning 3 - pointer , and while Steven Adams was able to get the rebound for Oklahoma City , his dunk at buzzer was ruled no good . In the end , it was a battle between the team 's two starting point guards , with Dennis Schroder and Westbrook putting together two of their very best performances of the season . Schroder scored 31 points on 10 - of - 16 shooting from the field - - his second 30 - point game of the season - - on top of eight assists and five rebounds . Meanwhile , Westbrook posted 46 points - - his second highest total this season - - seven assists and 11 rebounds in 35 minutes . Ultimately , the deciding factor Monday was that Schroder got help from his teammates , while the rest of the Thunder players struggled . Atlanta 's Millsap recorded 30 points and 11 rebounds in 39 minutes , while the next highest scorer for Oklahoma City was Jerami Grant with 15 off the bench . Up next , the Hawks will head home Thursday to take on the Timberwolves , while the Thunder , who have now lost three of their last four , will head to New Orleans on Thursday to play the Pelicans .

The Houston Rockets defeated the Dallas Mavericks 93 - 92 at Toyota Center on Sunday . The Rockets ( 2 - 1 ) maintained a lead throughout most of the Western Conference clash with the Mavericks ( 0 - 3 ) , which included a 10 point lead at the half . Drama ensued down the stretch , started by Wesley Matthews , who was able to cap of a 70 run with back - to - back baskets , which cut the Rockets ' lead to two points with 3:2 remaining in the fourth quarter . Matthews ' heads up defense forced a turnover on Harden and transitioned the impressive scoring effort to give Dallas a chance to grab its first win of the season . Matthews continued to put the team on his shoulders after draining a 27 - foot three pointer to tie the game at 92 with four seconds left in the game , but he also committed a shooting foul on James Harden’s ensuing drive to the hoop with just one - tenth of a second left to play . Harden missed the first free throw but sank the second and that was all that needed to ice the game for Houston . Harden went on to put up star numbers again , scoring 28 points to go along with seven rebounds and seven assists . Eric Gordon and Ryan Anderson joined Harden in double figures with 14 points each , while Clint Capela was strong on the glass , totaling 10 rebounds . Wes Matthews struggled from behind - the - arc , but not when it mattered most for Dallas . Matthews finished with 25 points , five boards and three assists on 9 - of - 25 shooting ( 3 - of - 15 from three ) . Harrison Barnes started 3 - of - 5 from the field but ended up missing his next six attempts on his way to a lowly 10 points in 38 minutes of action . The Rockets will head to Cleveland to visit the reigning champion Cavaliers on Tuesday , while the Mavericks will visit the Utah Jazz on Wednesday .

The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Charlotte Hornets in overtime , 125 - 120 , at Spectrum Center on Saturday . The Timberwolves ( 6 - 14 ) may have looked like somewhat easy prey to the hometown Hornets , considering they came in with a 5 - 14 record despite their solid talent . The first quarter did nothing to dissuade those beliefs , as Charlotte ( 11 - 9 ) jumped out to a 29 - 19 lead after the first 12 minutes . However , Minnesota clawed back to trail by only three , 52 - 49 by intermission . The second half was a continuous see - saw battle that appeared like it might go the Hornets ' way in the closing seconds , until an Andrew Wiggins 31 - foot three - point jumper with eight seconds remaining knotted the score at 106 . He then sunk a pair of clutch free throws with 11 seconds remaining in overtime to give Minnesota some crucial breathing room at 123 - 118 . That five - point margin was the final separation between the two teams , as the Timberwolves secured only their third road win of the season . Wiggins totaled 29 points overall while leading the visitors , and he added four assists , a rebound and three steals . Karl-Anthony Towns was right behind him with 27 points , 15 rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . Zach LaVine supplied 17 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and a block . Nicolas Batum matched his point total and made it a double - double with 12 assists , while also hauling in eight rebounds , recording three steals and posting a block . Marco Belinelli led the second unit with 15 points . The Timberwolves head back home to face the San Antonio Spurs on Tuesday evening , while the Timberwolves travel to Chicago to take on the Bulls on Monday evening as well .

The Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 6 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 6 - 9 ) 102 - 84 on Friday . Chicago has won four straight and seven of their last eight . Everything is looking good for the Bulls right now . They 're winning , and they were finally able to play back - to - back games with a fully healthy roster after struggling to have everyone available on the same night most of this season . Derrick Rose returned to action Monday against the Raptors , and in his two games back , he 's put up 26 points and 5 assists . The Nets will finish up their five - game road trip against the Detroit Pistons on Sunday . Brooklyn has dropped two straight and seven of their last eight games . Injuries can be blamed for the depth of the Nets ' struggles this season , but they were never considered a team with much of a shot at a playoff spot in the stacked Western Conference . An argument could be made that the injuries the Nets continue to suffer are a blessing in disguise considering that it 's forcing the team to give their young talent run against top - flight teams . Jimmy Butler scored a first triple - double in the last two games , scoring 26 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 11 - 13 FT ) with four rebounds , five assists and one steal in 39 minutes . Pau Gasol nearly posted a double - double , posting 11 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , 13 rebounds , nine assists , and one steal in 22 minutes . Nikola Mirotic also contributed a double - double of 12 points ( 3 - 5 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt ) , 12 rebounds , one assist and one steal in 27 minutes . With the win , the Nets completed the season series sweep of the Nets 30 .
The Houston Rockets ( 40 - 17 ) took care of business against the Phoenix Suns ( 17 - 38 ) on Thursday in a 133 - 102 win . The Suns have now won five - straight games , as they are reeling headed into the All-Star break . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Rockets , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 35 minutes . The Rockets were unconscious from long distance , as they shot 49 percent from the field , 80 percent from the free - throw line and 50 percent from three - point range . The scoring differential was huge as well , with Houston recording 27 assists to the Suns 20 . The Suns also dominated the rebounding , as they won that battle 55 - 42 . These teams are going in opposite directions right now and this result is indicative of the two teams recent play . Houston has the second - best defense in the NBA and they did a heck of a job today if slowing down a potent Suns attack . Alex Len was a beast down low , as he totaled 13 points and 9 rebounds in the defeat . The Suns next game wo n't be until Monday , when they host the struggling Memphis Grizzlies . Phoenix played their first game in as many nights and they did n't disappoint against the Suns . They did most of their damage in the first half , as they scored just 25 points in the final 13 minutes . The defense was huge for the Rockets , as they shot just 39 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . The Suns have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . James Harden was the lone bright spot in the defeat , as he tallied 40 points , six rebounds and eight assists in the loss . Alex Len also played well off the bench , as he amassed 13 points and nine rebounds in just 13 minutes of action . Houston will look to bounce back on Sunday in a home matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks .
The Brooklyn Nets defeated the host Memphis Grizzlies , 122 - 109 , at FedEx Forum on Monday . This looked like an easy win for Memphis on paper , but Brooklyn had other ideas with this shocking win . The Nets really took it to the Grizzlies in the fourth quarter , winning it , 34 - 18 . Shooting was key , with Brooklyn hitting 53 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range . Memphis only shot 44 percent from the field and 40 percent from three . The 12 steals and five blocks from Brooklyn was huge as well , as Memphis could only muster up seven steals and two blocks . The Nets ( 11 - 51 ) have easily turned into the worst team in the league and this win over a gritty Grizzlies bunch is a shocking one to say the least . Sean Kilpatrick led Brooklyn , as he provided 23 points , five rebounds and three assists off the bench . Jeremy Lin led the starters with 18 points and four rebounds . Caris LeVert and Randy Foye scored 14 points apiece in starting roles , while Brook Lopez totaled just eight points and four rebounds . On deck for the Nets is a road matchup with the Atlanta Hawks on Wednesday . The Grizzlies ( 36 - 28 ) are now below .500 across their last 11 games , with this loss being the worst of the season . Mike Conley did all he could for Memphis , as he accumulated 32 points , three rebounds and six assists . Marc Gasol finished second on the team , collecting 18 points , six rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Zach Randolph was the only bench player in double figures , accruing 10 points , seven rebounds and three assists . Memphis will look to play better in their next game on Thursday against the Los Angeles Clippers .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Los Angeles Lakers 137 - 101 Wednesday at Talking Stick Resort Arena . It did n't take long for the Suns to grab ahold of this game , as they managed to open the game on a 27 - 8 run and never looked back . After winning the opening quarter by 17 points , Phoenix continued to pile it on and effectively ended the game by halftime . The Suns ' backcourt was efficient and dominant offensively in the victory , with Eric Bledsoe leading the way with a triple - double of 25 points , 13 assists and 10 rebounds . Devin Booker added 23 points of his own on 9 - of - 14 shooting from the field and 4 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc . In the end , all 13 Phoenix players managed to score against a struggling Lakers ( 19 - 39 ) defense . Those Lakers have now dropped two games in a row and three of their last four following Wednesday 's embarrassing defeat that ended with the team shooting just 38 percent from the field . Lou Williams was one of the lone bright spots for Los Angeles , as he increased his trade value yet again with 21 points off the bench on 7 - of - 13 shooting from the field . D'Angelo Russell added 21 points of his own , but he shot a subpar 7 - of - 20 from the field Wednesday . With the loss , the Lakers sit just a half - game behind the Suns for the worst record in the West but remain nine games behind the Nets for the worst record in the NBA . The teams will now both head into the All-Star break , with both resuming play on Friday , Feb. 24 .
The Boston Celtics ( 21 - 19 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 13 - 28 ) 117 - 103 on Monday at the TD Garden in Phoenix . The Celtics got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Suns 57 - 49 in the first half alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 47 percent from the three - point line , while the Suns went 39 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . Starting at point guard , Avery Bradley led the way , going 5 - for - 11 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 19 points , while also adding two rebounds and five assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 32 points and 10 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 13 points and 5 rebounds on the year . Avery Knight was the only other starter in double figures for points , recording 16 points ( 7 - 15 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt ) , four assists and two steals . He now boasts season averages of 12 ponts , 5 rebounds and 12 assists per game . Coming off the bench , Kelly Olynyk had 21 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 4 - 6 3Pt , 1 - 2 FT ) and nine rebounds in 27 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Suns will travel to Philadelphia to play the Sixers on Friday .
The Miami Heat defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 115 - 107 , at American Airlines Arena on Thursday . Even though Miami trailed by 19 at times in the second quarter , they rallied to pull out a much needed win . The third and fourth quarters is when Miami did their damage , as they outscored Los Angeles . 62 - 47 in that stretch . The Heat 's offense was efficient as ever , as they shot 54 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range . Rebounding and assists were lopsided as well , as Miami won the rebounding , 47 - 40 and the assist differential , 25 - 18 . The Heat 's first lead did not come until there was a minute left in the third quarter . Los Angeles ( 11 - 21 ) is in their worst stretch of the season right now and they continue to falter against bad teams . Lou Williams was once again the best player for the Lakers , as he dropped 27 points off the bench . Nick Young led the starters in scoring , as he scored 20 points on 7 - of - 14 shooting . D'Angelo Russell had his bets game in weeks , accumulating 17 points , four rebounds and seven assists . On deck for Los Angeles is a road matchup against the Orlando Magic on Friday . Miami ( 10 - 20 ) have been playing better than results would show , so a win here is just what the doctor ordered . Justise Winslow was the Heat 's most valuable player , as he accrued 23 points , 13 rebounds and four steals in 42 minutes of action . Hassan Whiteside matched Winslow , as he provided 23 points and 13 rebounds of his own . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , as he collected 21 points and seven assists . James Johnson continued his great form , leading the bench with 19 points , eight rebounds and six assists . The Heat return to action on Friday , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on the road .

That set up a nip - and - tuck fourth quarter that was decided in the final minute . The Pacers posted a 49 percent success rate from the field , as well as a 36 percent from three - point range . They also suffocated the Pacers ' long - range attack , limiting them to just 44 percent shooting from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Indiana was led by John Teague 's 19 points , which he supplemented with nine assists , a rebound and a pair of steals . Bradley Beal was right behind with 19 points , 11 assists , two rebounds and a steal . Marcin Gortat contributed a 13 - point , 16 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and a steal . CJ Miles provided 15 points in a reserve role as well . George George was the only other member of the starting five with double - digit scoring , collecting 12 points .

Though they are traversing one of the rougher parts of their schedule , the depths to which the Lakers have struggled is surprising . Taj Gibson returned from a one - game absence to put up 15 points and seven rebounds in 28 minutes . The Lakers will host the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday , as the Chicago Lakers will welcome the Denver Nuggets to town on Friday .

The Warriors ( 16 - 2 ) checked in to Wednesday 's contest having experienced their share of shooting struggles this season , although they 'd shown signs of improvement in having won three of the prior four games . They also forced 18 turnovers from the Hawks , and held their dangerous long - range shooters to a collective 24 percent success rate from beyond the arc . Paul Millsap was right behind him with 14 points , 14 boards , three assists and a steal . Paul Millsap had a near double - double with 14 points , nine rebounds , three assists and a steal . The Detroit Pistons ( 3 - 6 ) defeated the Oklahoma City Thunder ( 3 - 7 ) 96 - 89 on Sunday . The Thunder were letting the Thunder hang around in the first half , but pulled away after that , out - scoring the Thunder 64 - 49 in the second half . This was a domination in every fashion for the Pistons , as they recorded more assists , rebounds , steals and blocks than the Thunder in the victory . The Thunder dominated from the free - throw line , going 33 percent as a team , while committing 14 turnovers . The Thunder were once again led by Brandon Jennings , who scored 29 points on 10 - of - 18 shooting . Serge Ibaka was the only other Thunder player to score in double figures , as he finished with 19 points and 10 rebounds in the loss . This is a trend that is becoming all too common for the Thunder and they simply need more from these two , especially against teams like the Pistons . Josh Smith was fantastic in this victory , as he tallied 18 points , four rebounds , and four assists in the loss . Andre Drummond had another great game as well , as he tallied nine points , 15 rebounds and two blocks . As a team , the Bucks shot 49 percent from the field and 44 percent from the three - point line , while the Sixers finished at 40 percent from the floor and a meager 21 percent from deep . The Bucks out - rebounded the 76ers 39 - 40 , even furthering their advantage Tuesday . Already the two scoring leaders for the Bucks this season , both Robert Covington and Hollis Thompson were the only players to reach double figures in points . Covington finished with 25 points ( 6 - 13 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 12 - 13 FT ) and seven rebounds , while Covington added 25 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 3 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and four rebounds . Covington had a poor showing shooting Friday , going 6 - for - 9 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line , but he still finished with a team - high of 25 points . The Sixers ' next game will be on the road against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the 76ers will travel to Sacramento to play the Kings on Friday .

The Hornets came out firing in this game early , out - scoring the Raptors 58 - 0 in the first half , while taking a 26 - point lead into halftime . The Hornets were the superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field and 25 percent from the three - point line , while the Raptors went 41 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from deep . He 's been a force over his last two games , combining for 54 points , 11 assists and 8 steals over that span . He 's had a nice impact on the defensive side of the ball lately as well , recording two or more steals in five out of his last five games . He 's scored 13 points or less in each of his last five games , so it was good to see him get back on track . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The offensive proficiency led to a 52 percent success rate from the field , and their defense managed to elicit 20 turnovers from the Bucks . Nick Young paced Milwaukee with 26 points , while Julius Randle pitched in 15 points , seven rebounds and two assists . D'Angelo Russell and Julius Randle provided matching 14 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds , five assists and one steal , and the latter dishing out 17 dimes , hauling in seven boards and recording one steal . Julius Randle went for 15 points , seven rebounds , two assists and a steal . Malcolm Brogdon posted 14 points , five assists , three rebounds and a steal . Khris Middleton paced the bench with 14 points , three rebounds , five assists and one steal . Ivica Zubac played only nine minutes due to foul trouble , posting seven points , four rebounds , three assists and two blocks . Lou Williams paced the second unit with 18 points , one rebound and three assists . Nick Young was productive as a reserve as well with 11 points , five rebounds and one block . Nick Young paced the Bucks with 26 points , two rebounds , four assists and two steals . D'Angelo Russell tallied 14 points , five assists , three boards and one steal . Michael Beasley contributed 15 points , four rebounds , two assists and one block . Julius Randle submitted a 15 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included two assists and a steal . Jordan Clarkson led the second unit with 11 points , four assists and a rebound . The Bucks remain on the road and head to the Big Apple to tangle with the Brooklyn Nets on Sunday afternoon , while the Lakers visit the Miami Heat on Friday evening as well .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the Minnesota Timberwolves by a 112 - 100 score at Moda Center on Saturday night . The Trail Blazers ( 34 - 38 ) came into Saturday 's contest trying to keep the pressure on eighth - seeded Denver , which they could come within one game of catching with a win against the Timberwolves ( 28 - 44 ) . Portland was able to take advantage of what was likely a tired Minnesota squad that had just given up 130 points on Friday night in an overtime loss to the Lakers . The dynamic duo of Damian Lillard and C.J . McCollum once again led the way for the Blazers , which collectively shot an outstanding 63 percent from the floor and 50 percent from three - point range . Their offensive proficiency and 35 - 27 rebounding advantage helped them overcome 14 turnovers to cruise to a relatively comfortable home victory . The Timberwolves were led by Andrew Wiggins , who supplied 20 points , two assists and one steal . Kris Dunn led the bench with 17 points , four rebounds , one assist and two steals . Karl-Anthony Towns and Ricky Rubio followed with matching 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds and a block , and the latter registering four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Gorgui Dieng totaled 13 points , seven rebounds , two assists , four steals and two blocks . Shabazz Muhammad matched Dieng 's scoring total and added two rebounds off the bench . McCollum 's 32 points led the Blazers , a total he supplemented with four rebounds , four assists and one steal . Damian Lillard tallied 21 points , eight assists , six rebounds and three steals . Jusuf Nurkic provided a near double - double with 14 points , nine rebounds , four assists and a block . Allen Crabbe paced the second unit with 10 points , three boards and two blocks . Evan Turner and Al-Farouq Aminu were productive as reserves as well with matching eight - point efforts . The Timberwolves head to Indiana to tangle with the Pacers on Tuesday night , while the Trail Blazers head to Los Angeles to take on the Lakers on Sunday evening .
The Utah Jazz defeated the New York Knicks , 114 - 109 , at Madison Square Garden on Sunday . The Jazz ( 4 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hayward to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 28 points , along with five rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 14 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . George Hill , who 's helped pick up a good bit of the offensive slack in Hayward 's absence , continued to thrive despite the latter 's return to the court , totaling 23 points , six rebounds , four assists and a steal . Rodney Hood was right behind with 18 points , six rebounds , five assists and a steal . Rudy Gobert and Derrick Favors turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts from the frontcourt , with the former also contributing eight rebounds , an assist , three blocks and a steal , and the latter supplying six boards . Joe Johnson , who headed to the bench with Hayward 's return , tallied 10 points to pace the bench . The Knicks ( 2 - 4 ) were co - led by a pair of 28 - point outputs for Carmelo Anthony and Kristaps Porzingis . Anthony also registered nine rebounds and three assists , while Porzingis supplied eight boards , an assist and two blocks . Derrick Rose continued his strong stretch of play to open his tenure in the Big Apple , totaling 18 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Courtney Lee was the fourth member of the starting five to hit double digits in the scoring column , posting 10 points , six boards and three steals . The Jazz continue their trek through the Northeast with a Monday night visit to Philadelphia to face the Sixers , while the Knicks remain home to tangle with the inter - city rival Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday evening .
The Golden State Warriors defeated the Detroit Pistons , 127 - 107 , at Oracle Arena on Thursday . The Warriors were heavy favorites headed into this matchup and they left no doubt who the better team was . It was n't lopsided throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 21 lead changes in the first half . That 's when Golden State turned it on though , outscoring Detroit , 67 - 49 , in the second half . The Warriors offense was on point , shooting 56 percent from the field , 51 percent from three - point range and recording 39 assists . Three-point shooting really killed Detroit , as they went just 6 - of - 28 from long distance . The Pistons ( 18 - 23 ) have struggled on the road all season and a matchup against Golden State is the last thing they wanted to see . Marcus Morris was Detroit 's best player , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Andre Drummond recorded another double - double , totaling 12 points and 10 rebounds . Tobias Harris got the start and amassed 18 points and four rebounds . Boban Marjanovic was the only bench player in double figures , amassing 13 points and 11 rebounds on 5 - of - 7 from the field . The Warriors ( 34 - 6 ) have been taking it to teams all season and this blowout win was no different . Kevin Durant led the team in scoring , accruing 25 points , six rebounds and nine assists on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Steph Curry was just as good , collecting 24 points , six assists and five steals . Klay Thompson dropped 23 points of his own . Draymond Green failed to hit a shot , but he provided nine rebounds and 13 assists . Ian Clark and Shaun Livingston each scored in double figures off the bench .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Isaiah Whitehead , 108 - 75 , at Wells Fargo Center on Saturday evening . The Sixers already looked stronger in the first half of their season , starting forward Joel Noel ( knee ) out of the first spot in the Eastern Conference standings . With Dwyane Wade ( knee ) and breakout center Nerlens Noel ( hand ) out for the Sixers ( 7 - 20 ) , the Sixers were held to just eight points in the second half and just two points from the free throw line . Joel Embiid was the man for the team , however , as he posted a game - high 33 points on 12 - of - 17 shooting from the field , and with seven rebounds , one assist , one block and two steals . Meanwhile , Ersan Ilyasova went off for 22 points and four rebounds on 7 - of - 12 shooting , while Joe Harris added 19 points of his own . The only other player to score in double digits for the 76ers was Robert Okafor , who chipped in 3 points on 5 - of - 9 shooting , to go along with five rebounds and two assists in 35 minutes off the bench . Isaiah Rodriguez led the way for Brooklyn , scoring 14 points on 5 - of - 13 shooting in 25 minutes , while Isaiah Bogdanovic finished with 14 points , six rebounds and two assists . Brook Lopez led the way for Brooklyn , with 22 points on 6 - of - 14 shooting , to go along with nine rebounds , eight assists , four blocks and one steal , in 31 minutes .
The New Orleans Pelicans defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 121 - 118 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . These are two of the hottest teams in the Western Conference right now and New Orleans showed that their season is still alive with this crucial win . It was a tale of two halves , as New Orleans took a seven - point lead into the locker room , while New Orleans responded by winning the second half , 61 - 37 . Rebounding was key for the Pelicans , as they won that battle , 44 - 23 . The big men of New Orleans dominated in the paint , outscoring the Pelicans , 46 - 26 . The Pelicans ( 31 - 19 ) had a tough task here against one of the best home teams in the league and they fell just shy in this close loss . Anthony Davis carried the load , as he tallied 30 points , 13 rebounds and two blocks on 11 - of - 21 shooting . Dirk Nowitzki finished second on the team , totaling 23 points and seven rebounds . Wesley Matthews was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 10 points , three rebounds and four assists . Dante Crawford led the bench in scoring , as he dropped 15 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting . Yogi Ferrell and Dorian Cunningham were the only bench players in double figures , as they scored 15 points a piece . The Pelicans will look to keep rolling on Friday in a road matchup against the Milwaukee Bucks . New Orleans ( 32 - 43 ) has now lost five - straight games , as they continue to look forward to the offseason . Harrison Barnes was the player of the game , as he accumulated 19 points , eight rebounds and three assists . Harrison Barnes was second on the team , tallying 19 points and eight rebounds . Wesley Matthews and Jrue Holiday each scored 18 points a piece . New Orleans will look to bounce back on Sunday in a home matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the San Antonio Spurs 101 - 101 at AT & T Center on Sunday . The Spurs ( 17 - 11 ) got off to a strong start on both sides of the ball , as they opened up a 11 - point lead in the first quarter . From that point , however , it was all Mavericks ( 36 - 11 ) . Over the course of the next three quarters , San Antonio outscored San Antonio by 27 points and never looked back . The key for the Spurs was their defense , as they held the Spurs to 47 percent from the field and 36 percent from three - point range . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Spurs , as it was a double - digit margin for the majority of the second half . Kawhi Leonard had one of his best games of the season , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds and two assists on 7 - of - 17 shooting . Seth Parker was the only other starter in double figures , tallying 16 points and four assists . David Lee was the only other player with more than 14 points , as he accrued 14 points , three rebounds and four assists off the bench . The Spurs will look to get out of this slide on Thursday against the Phoenix Suns . The Spurs ( 36 - 11 ) have been dominant at home this season and a win like this shows just how scary of a team they can be . Kawhi Leonard was once again the catalyst , as he led the team with 24 points , seven rebounds , two assists and three blocks . Wesley Matthews finished second on the team with 17 points , seven rebounds and three assists . LaMarcus Nowitzki was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 15 points and 6 rebounds . David Lee led the bench with 14 points and three rebounds .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Toronto Raptors , 125 - 109 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Sunday . Phoenix appeared to be the heavy favorite on paper , but Phoenix has been a much better team over recent weeks . The fourth quarter was especially tight , as there were six ties and eight lead changes alone in the fourth quarter . It was a hectic last 16 seconds , as Phoenix hit a lay - up with 6 seconds left to tie and then recorded a steal to eventually win on a game - winning three at the buzzer by James Lowry . Defense was key for Phoenix , as they held Toronto to 46 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . Phoenix also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording nine more assists than Toronto , while committing four less turnovers . The Suns ( 24 - 10 ) have been playing terribly recently , but a road win against the Raptors is just what the doctor ordered . Jonas Valanciunas was the player of the game , as he led the Suns with 21 points , adding 10 rebounds and five blocks on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Goran Dragic finished with 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . James Johnson was huge off the bench , as he provided 17 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks . On deck for Phoenix is a home matchup against the San Antonio Spurs on Monday . The Raptors ( 24 - 10 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 14 tries . Eric Bledsoe led the way for Toronto , as he collected 20 points , three rebounds , eight assists and three steals . Jonas Valanciunas finished second on the team , totaling 21 points and 10 rebounds on 9 - of - 14 shooting . Goran Dragic finished with 18 points , six rebounds and three assists . James Johnson was huge off the bench , as he provided 17 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and two blocks .

The Indiana Pacers ( 6 - 6 ) defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers ( 9 - 2 ) 103 - 93 on Friday . Indiana is on a three - game win streak , the first time they 've won back - to - back games this season . Kevin Love has struggled to find his place the Cavaliers ' offense so far this season , but he was the key cog for them Saturday as he put up 27 points and 16 rebounds in 33 minutes . Anderson Varejao sat out the game with a rib contusion . Tristan Thompson filled in as a spot starter at center and put up two points and 12 rebounds in 28 minutes . The Pacers seem to be going away from force feeding Love in the post , and they 're simply letting him clean up all of his teammates ' mistakes , a role that he excelled in last season . They 'll host the Milwaukee Bucks on Friday . Cleveland has lost two straight games . They shot a woeful 41 percent from the field and 37 percent from beyond the arc . Kyrie Irving scored a game - high 24 points , and Jeff Teague backed his play with 20 points . The Cavaliers have won three of their last five games , and more importantly , they 've been more competitive over the last week against elite teams thanks to the addition of C.J . Miles , who goes down to Sunday 's loss . He had seven points and four assists in 35 minutes of action . The Cavaliers will face the Cavs on Tuesday in Indiana .

The dynamic duo of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Jabari Parker were at it again for the Bucks ( 16 - 16 ) , as they posted over half of the team 's scoring total while each played at least 40 minutes . Their combined 23 - of - 34 effort from the field spearheaded a red - hot Milwaukee offense that drained their buckets at a 57 percent clip , and that also was successful on 60 percent of their 15 attempts from behind the arc . Meanwhile , the Bulls ( 16 - 18 ) could only get one such standout effort , which came from Jimmy Butler . The offensive imbalance ultimately left them unable to keep pace as the game wore on , and accordingly , the Bucks outscored their hosts by a 67 - 45 margin in the second half . Parker followed with 27 points , five rebounds , three assists , a steal and a block . Paul George added another triple - double to his tally , leading the team with 31 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Goran Dragic flirted with a triple - double , accumulating 16 points , five rebounds and three assists . Hassan Whiteside recorded another double - double , totaling 19 points , 18 rebounds and six blocks . Dwyane McRoberts came off the bench to provide 10 points and six rebounds . Goran Dragic was the only other starter in double figures , collecting 16 points , three rebounds and three assists . Paul George carried the load for Indiana , as he totaled 31 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . Dwyane Wade was the only other starter with more than five points , as he provided 16 points and five rebounds . Josh McRoberts made his return from a one - game absence to post a 16 - point , 3 - rebound double - double .
The Minnesota Timberwolves defeated the Dallas Mavericks , 101 - 92 , at Target Center on Monday . The Timberwolves ( 12 - 26 ) put an end to a four - game losing streak with Monday 's victory , and it was thanks in large part to the monster performance put on by Karl-Anthony Towns . After scoring 20 points in the first quarter and outscoring the entire Mavericks ( 11 - 27 ) team by himself , Towns finished with a game - high 34 points , 11 rebounds , four assists and three blocks in 37 minutes . The big man 's night was made even easier with Ricky Rubio shining as a facilitator , notching a double - double of his own with 13 points and 15 assists on top of five rebounds and five steals . The two helped the Timberwolves lead wire - to - wire Thursday , as the team overall shot a very impressive 56 percent from the field . As for the Mavericks , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . Harrison Barnes led the way with a team - high 30 points , while veteran Dirk Nowtizki posted 26 points , five rebounds and four assists in 31 minutes . Unfortunately for Dallas , they failed to get any other significant contributions elsewhere , with the other 10 Mavericks players who played combining to score just 36 points . And while Dallas managed to shoot an impressive 56 percent from behind the arc , their inability to get to the free throw line ended up hurting them , as they shot just 2 - of - 11 from the charity stripe . Up next , the Timberwolves will stay home Wednesday to play the Rockets , while the Mavericks will head home to take on the Suns on Thursday .
The Washington Wizards ( 28 - 13 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 17 - 24 ) 99 - 90 on Saturday . The game featured a showdown between two of the more offensive - minded centers in the NBA , Brook Lopez and Brook Lopez . Jack led the way with 22 points , eight assists , four rebounds and a steal over 41 minutes . He added four rebounds and a steal . Nene Hilario was right behind him with 20 points , six rebounds , two assists and two steals . Joe Johnson was next with a bench - leading 15 points , which he supplemented with three rebounds , five assists and three steals . John Wall pitched in with 11 points , six assists , six rebounds and three steals . The Wizards were led by Bradley Jack 's 17 points , which he complemented with eight assists , four rebounds and a steal . Brook Lopez was next with a near double - double , totaling 15 points , nine rebounds , an assist and a block . Bojan Bogdanovic and Paul Pierce were next with a pair of 15 - point efforts . The former added three rebounds , five assists and three steals , while the latter dished out five dimes and hauled in five boards , in addition to his production . Kris Humphries led the bench with 13 points , four rebounds and a block . The Nets remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again on Friday night to face off with the New York Knicks .
The Boston Celtics ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the New Orleans Pelicans ( 5 - 16 ) 111 - 93 on Sunday . Boston has won four of their last five games . Isaiah Thomas sat out a second straight game with an ankle bruise . They had just one starter finish in double digits , but four bench players were able to crack the threshold . They 'll return home to host the Orlando Magic on Sunday . New Orleans has been trading wins and losses like coin flips over their last eight games , going 4 - 2 in that stretch . Both teams struggled from the field Wednesday , but the Pelicans failed with flair on offense , shooting just 41 percent from the field and 31 percent from beyond the arc while giving up 19 easy points off of 17 turnovers . Anthony Davis did his best to carry the team , finishing with 16 points , six rebounds and three steals , but it was n't enough . The Pelicans will return home to host the Houston Rockets on Friday . New Orleans has been trading wins for loses from game to game , going 9 - 9 over their last 13 games . It was to a good win for the Pelicans , who have lost three straight , a game ahead of the eighth - place Nets . The Pelicans are now just 3 games behind the Grizzlies for the third seed in the Eastern Conference . They’re just a half - game behind the Brooklyn Nets , but the Trail Blazers have crept within three games of the regular season . However , the loss comes in spite of a career night from starting center Jared Sullinger , who put up 11 points and 20 rebounds in 34 minutes . The Pelicans will return to action Friday when they host the Celtics .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 39 - 7 ) defeated the Houston Rockets ( 25 - 23 ) 130 - 99 on Sunday at the Toyota Center in San Antonio . The Spurs came out firing in this game , out - scoring the Rockets 35 - 29 right away in the first quarter . The Spurs were the superior shooters , going 56 percent from the field and 52 percent from the three - point line , while the Rockets went 38 percent from the floor and just 27 percent from beyond the arc . The Spurs were able to force the Rockets into 15 turnovers , which may have been the difference in this game . The Spurs were led by LaMarcus Aldridge , who posted his fourth double - double of the season . He finished with 25 points ( 9 - 13 FG , 7 - 7 FT ) and 10 rebounds , giving the Blazers the spark needed to secure the victory . James Harden did everything he could to keep the Rockets in this game , going 5 - for - 10 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score 20 points . He also got to the free throw line nine times , converting on nine of those attempts . He 's now averaging 20 points and 5 rebounds on the season . Tony Parker was able to record 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) and seven assists as well . Coming off the bench , Danny Terry added 10 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 1 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) and two steals before fouling out . The Spurs ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Friday , while the Rockets will travel to Houston to play the Rockets on Wednesday .

Detroit has won five straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 10 - 98 . Mayo scored 13 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 5 3Pt ) to go with eight rebounds . Stanley Johnson , who was solid off the bench , finished with 10 points ( 4 - 10 FG ) and seven assists in 23 minutes . The Bucks jumped out to a five - point first quarter lead , extended the lead to 33 points by the end of the third quarter . Marcus Morris posted a double - double with 23 points ( 7 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 8 - 9 FT ) , four rebounds , three assists and one steal in 39 minutes . The San Antonio Spurs ( 2 - 1 ) defeated the Isaiah Thomas ( 15 - 20 ) , 95 - 100 , at the AT & T Center on Friday . The Spurs have shown us moments of brilliance in the 2014 season , but they 're simply looking to pick up some momentum at this point . This was a solid win , as six players scored at least seven points . LaMarcus Aldridge led the Spurs in scoring , putting up 24 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 8 - 10 FT ) and grabbing 14 rebounds in 35 minutes . Avery Bradley was close behind , scoring 18 points ( 7 - 18 FG , 1 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) , with three assists , two rebounds and four steals . The Spurs were able to overcome a whopping 18 turnovers , including a few of them in the paint , which is too much for their opponents to overcome . They shot just 36 percent from the field and an even more poor 13 percent from behind the arc . For the Celtics , it was LaMarcus Aldridge who led the way , finishing with a team - high 24 points ( 8 - 18 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 8 - 10 FT ) , to go along with 14 rebounds , one assist and one steal . Meanwhile , Marcus Smart scored 17 points ( 7 - 12 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 2 - 4 FT ) to go with three assists and two steals in 39 minutes .
