The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Minnesota Timberwolves 119 - 105 at Target Center on Saturday . These are two teams headed in opposite directions and this result shows just where they 're headed . The Clippers were in control for the majority of the game , as there were only four ties and six lead changes . Los Angeles actually led for the entirety of the second half , as Minnesota never led by more than two points in the first half . The Clippers shot lights - out hitting 53 percent fro the field and 46 percent from three - point range . Los Angeles also took advantage of the whistle , going 28 - of - 37 from the free - throw line , with Minnesota taking just 21 free - throw attempts . The Clippers ( 9 - 1 ) are the hottest team in the NBA right now and they used a different recipe to win this one . All five starters were great , as they each scored 15 or more points in the win . Blake Griffin led the team , totaling 20 points , 11 rebounds and four assists . JJ Redick was n't far behind , as he tallied 19 points , four rebounds and eight assists . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 18 points , 16 rebounds and two blocks . Zach LaVine led the starters with 15 points , while Zach LaVine dropped 15 points . Minnesota will look to build off this win in a road matchup against the New Orleans Pelicans on Tuesday . The Timberwolves ( 2 - 6 ) have been one of the biggest disappointments this season and it 's a wonder when they 'll pull out of this hole . Ricky Rubio did return from an elbow injury in this game , as he accumulated seven points , six rebounds and six assists in the loss . Karl-Anthony Towns led the team in scoring , totaling 24 points , 10 rebounds , two blocks and two steals . Andrew Wiggins went just 8 - of - 24 from the field , but still scored 22 points . Zach LaVine was the only other player in double figures , accruing 15 points , three rebounds and four assists . The Timberwolves will look to get their third win on Sunday , when they host the Los Angeles Lakers for their next game .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Washington Wizards , 120 - 112 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Sixers ' first game after the All-Star break featured Dario Saric 's debut as the permanent starting power forward , and the 2014 first - round pick did not disappoint . Saric contributed a 20 - point , 11 - rebound double - double that also included four assists and one steal . All five members of the Sixers ( 22 - 35 ) starting five posted double - digit scoring , and Philadelphia managed a 49 percent success rate from the floor in an explosive offensive showing overall . The impressive effort helped the home team overcome a spectacular 40 - point effort from the Wizards ' Bradley Beal . Beal added four rebounds , two assists and two steals to his game - high scoring total . John Wall was right behind with a 29 - point , 14 - assist double - double that also included eight boards and a pair of blocks . Markieff Morris was a distant third for the Wizards ( 34 - 22 ) , generating 14 points , seven rebounds and one steal . Marcin Gortat compiled an 11 - point , 11 - rebound double - double which also included one assist and one block . Robert Covington paced the Sixers with 25 points , 11 rebounds , three assists and four steals . Gerald Henderson tallied 20 points and five boards . Richaun Holmes , seeing an expanded role off the bench with the departures of Nerlens Noel and Ersan Ilyasova at the trade deadline , supplied 12 points , 10 rebounds , one assist , five blocks and two steals . Jahlik Okafor and Nik Stauskas produced matching 11 - point efforts , with the former adding two rebounds and two assists , and the latter registering three boards , one assist and one block . T.J. McConnell amassed 10 points , eight assists , four rebounds , two steals and one block . The Wizards head back home to tangle with the Utah Jazz on Sunday afternoon , while the Sixers head to New York to take on the Knicks on Saturday evening .

He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the season . In fact , neither team grabbed a double - digit lead , as it came down to the final seconds . Three-point shooting was the difference in the game , with the Magic going 15 - of - 42 from long range , while the Magic hit just 6 - of - 22 . Defense was key as well , as Orlando held the Magic to 37 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range . Orlando also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 54 - 54 and the points in the paint differential , 42 - 20 . The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 26 - 11 ) defeated the Los Angeles Lakers ( 8 - 30 ) 117 - 113 on Friday night . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially Los Angeles , as they shot 48 percent from the field and 35 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Thunder really turned it on , as they outscored the Lakers 27 to 28 . The Thunder actually dominated the rebounding , as they snatched down 45 boards to the Lakers 34 . Los Angeles came into this game winning two of four , but couldn’t muster up enough to beat a talented Thunder team . Kevin Durant was the player of the game , as he tallied 24 points , seven rebounds and two assists in the win . Kobe Bryant also had a nice game , as he totaled 19 points , four rebounds and six assists in the defeat . The 6 - 30 record looks horrendous , but they are a much better team than that unsightly record would indicate . On deck for the Lakers is the Portland Trail Blazers on Monday . The Thunder got down by eight after the first quarter , but fought back hard to grab a win . They outscored Oklahoma City 27 - 28 in the final 17 minutes and made some clutch baskets late to close it out . The bench was the key tonight though , as they had four of the five bench players reach double - digits . The frontcourt was especially good , as Enes Kanter , Enes Kanter and Enes Kanter combined for 45 points and 10 rebounds . Kevin Durant led the team with 24 points , but no other player scored more than 17 in the loss . On deck for Los Angeles is a date with the Brooklyn Nets on Wednesday .
The Sacramento Kings ( 17 - 23 ) defeated the LA Clippers ( 26 - 14 ) in overtime for a 110 - 103 win on Wednesday . In a battle between two bad defenses , the offenses really struggled . Especially LA , as they shot 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The fourth quarter is where the Kings really turned it on , as they outscored the Clippers 28 to 24 . The Kings actually dominated the rebounding , as they brought down 46 boards to the Clippers 46 . The Clippers have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of win exemplifies which directions these franchises are going right now and we should give more credit to Sacramento rather than belittling the Clippers . The biggest difference in the game was the passing , as the Kings accumulated 28 assists compared to the Clippers 24 . The Clippers came into this game as a double - digit favorite , but couldn’t muster up enough late to pull out the road win . The bench was the only reason they played so well , as they scored 41 bench points to go along with an impressive 46 rebounds . The Clippers have been playing better ball recently , but this loss guaranteed that they 'd miss the playoffs yet again . DeMarcus Cousins did all he could to keep the Clippers in this game though , as he totaled 19 points , 13 rebounds and three blocks in the defeat . The bench was spectacular as well , as Omri Casspi , Omri Casspi and Jamal Crawford combined for 41 points , while McLemore finished with 17 . The Clippers will look to bounce - back against the Denver Nuggets on Sunday .

The Kings , on the other hand , have now lost four in a row and currently remain just two and a half games ahead of the Miami Heat for the eighth spot in the West . The Blazers were the superior shooters in this one , going 48 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings finished at 42 percent from the floor and 47 percent from deep . The Trail Blazers had four players reach double figures in points . Seth Curry led the way , going 9 - for - 17 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 21 points . It was a nice surprise for the Kings , as he 's averaging only 4 points per game so far this season . McCollum did everything they could to keep the Trail Blazers in this game . He was able to get to the free throw line nine times and converted on all six attempts . It was a season - high in points for the guard , who 's averaging only 3 points per game so far this season . The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 11 - 40 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 20 - 32 ) 112 - 101 on Sunday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Despite securing the victory , the Cavliers were out - shot in this matchup . The Pistons went 51 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 51 percent from the floor and just 32 percent from beyond the arc . Despite out - rebounding the Pistons 35 - 40 , the Timberwolves were forced into 15 turnovers , which may have been the difference in an otherwise evenly played game . The Timberwolves received a huge contribution from their bench , as Kevin Martin led the team . He went 9 - for - 21 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 24 points , while also adding nine rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 15 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 18 points and 16 rebounds on the year . Andrew Wiggins also had a solid showing , posting 18 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 5 - 7 FT ) and eight rebounds . He 's played well of late , averaging 43 points over his last four games , so this was far - and - away his most productive showing . The point , rebound and assist numbers were all season - highs , while the double - double was his first of the year as well . Posting a double - double of his own , Greg Monroe was very efficient with 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 5 - 6 FT ) and nine rebounds . The Pistons ' next game will be on the road against the Toronto Raptors on Friday , while the Pistons will travel to Chicago to play the Bulls on Wednesday .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Brooklyn Nets , 106 - 97 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Thursday . Indiana got out to a hot start early and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers led by 18 after the first quarter , as they never relinquished the lead from there . Defense was key for Indiana , as they held Brooklyn to 37 percent from the field and 39 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Brooklyn as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Nets hanging around , as they committed 15 turnovers to 20 assists , while the Nets committed 19 turnovers to just 20 assists . The Nets ( 9 - 41 ) had a tough task here against a hot Pacers team , as they simply did n't have enough in the arsenal to win this game . Paul George led the team , as he tallied 24 points , 11 rebounds and three steals . Brook Lopez was the only other starter with more than 10 points , accruing 11 points , four rebounds and three blocks . Sean Kilpatrick was demoted to the bench , but collected 18 points , five rebounds and four assists in a motivated performance . Joe Kilpatrick led the Nets in scoring , dropping 18 points , five rebounds and four assists off the bench . Sean Kilpatrick led the starters in scoring , collecting 18 points , five rebounds and four assists . Myles Turner amassed 11 points , four rebounds and three blocks .
The Indiana Pacers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 102 - 92 , at FedEx Forum on Friday . Despite this game being close throughout the first quarter , the Pacers dominated the rest of the way . The second and third quarters were especially decisive , outscoring the Grizzlies 64 - 42 in that 24 - minute stretch . Free-throw shooting really killed Memphis , as they went just 13 - of - 23 , while the Pacers went a perfect 11 - of - 11 . Indiana also dominated the shooting , hitting 51 percent of their shots , while holding Memphis to 41 percent . The Pacers also won the rebounding differential , 50 - 39 . The Grizzlies ( 34 - 25 ) have now lost three of their last four games , as this was not how they wanted to start their stretch run . Despite playing just 15 minutes off the bench , Troy Daniels led the team with 13 points . Marc Gasol led the starters , as he accumulated 12 points , four rebounds and four assists . Mike Conley finished with 10 points , five rebounds and seven assists . Tony Allen accrued 11 points , seven rebounds and five steals . On deck for the Grizzlies is a road matchup with the Denver Nuggets on Sunday . The Pacers ( 30 - 28 ) had lost six - straight headed into this matchup , so a blowout win is just what the doctor ordered . C.J . Miles led Indiana in scoring , as he dropped 17 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting . Jeff Teague went just 2 - of - 8 from the field , but totaled 11 points and 10 assists en route to a double - double . Monta Ellis was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points and three assists . The Pacers will be in action again on Saturday against the Miami Heat .

This appeared like an easy Atlanta win on paper , but Miami had other ideas with this impressive performance . A 80 - 33 lead in the fourth quarter was the decisive stretch for the Heat , as that gave Miami their largest lead of the game . It was tight throughout though , as there were 11 ties and 15 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 10 points . Rebounding was the difference in the game , with Miami winning that battle , 47 - 43 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 14 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Goran Dragic led the Hawks in scoring , as he tallied 27 points and five assists . Dion Waiters was second on the team , with 20 points , seven rebounds and three assists . James Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , two rebounds , three assists , three blocks and two steals . The Hawks ( 28 - 21 ) have been dominant at home all season , but this was a devastating loss in a game they were supposed to win . Goran Dragic led the way for Atlanta , as he collected 27 points , five rebounds , five assists and two steals . Dion Waiters finished second on the team with 12 points off the bench . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , totaling 18 points and 18 rebounds . James Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , seven assists , two steals and three blocks . The Miami Heat defeated the host Utah Jazz on Thursday , 111 - 110 . It was a much - needed and narrow win for Miami ( 7 - 12 ) , as the team had been sitting at 13th in the Eastern Conference . Thursday 's win came in dramatic fashion , with the game remaining a matter of single digits until the very end . It was an off night for center Hassan Whiteside , who shot just 4 - of - 11 for nine points , but it was a strong showing for recently - returned point guard Goran Dragic . Dragic led the team with 27 points and had six assists on the night . The Heat have seen strong bench play recently , as was the case on Thursday . Bench forward James Johnson delivered 24 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting , while bench guard Wayne Ellington had 17 points on 6 - of - 9 . The Heat ( 11 - 9 ) , meanwhile , had won four straight contests heading into Thursday , but have been decimated by injuries . Star forward Justise Winslow was sidelined again with an illness . The Jazz were able to hold on to a 22 - point lead by halftime , but was able to maintain the lead for the whole second half . Forward James Hayward led the team with 27 points on 10 - of - 21 shooting while also recording seven assists and two steals . The Jazz as a whole shot 51 percent from the field but hit just 77 percent of their free - throws attempts .
The Boston Celtics defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 110 - 106 , at TD Garden on Friday . Facing a Sixers ( 9 - 25 ) squad that had only tallied three road wins in 13 tries coming in , it may have been hard to blame the Celtics ( 22 - 14 ) if they were guilty of a little overconfidence Friday . A 39 - point second period by Philadelphia was therefore likely a rather sobering wake - up call , as was the 62 - 51 halftime deficit Boston found itself in . The Celtics were mostly a different team in the second half , as they outscored their visitors by a 59 - 44 margin over the final 24 minutes . However , the game was n't truly decided until the closing seconds , with Al Horford 's go - ahead three - pointer with 17 remaining and two key free throws by Isaiah Thomas with two seconds on the clock finally sealing the hard - fought home win . Philadelphia was led by Joel Embiid 's 23 points , which he supplemented with eight rebounds , three assists and two blocks . However , he battled foul trouble in the second half , and ultimately was charged with his sixth infraction with six seconds remaining . Ersan Ilyasova went for 20 points , three assists , two rebounds , two steals and two blocks , but missed a couple of key three - point attempts late with the Sixers trailing . T.J. McConnell was outstanding setting up his teammates for scoring opportunities , compiling 17 assists and supplementing them with nine points , four boards and a pair of steals . The Chicago Bulls ( 34 - 38 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 34 - 38 ) 117 - 95 on Monday at the Palace of Auburn Hills . Despite securing the victory , the Cavliers were out - shot in this matchup . The Pistons went 59 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Pistons went 44 percent from the floor and just 35 percent from beyond the arc . The Bulls were able to force the Pistons into 15 turnovers , while committing only 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Bulls were led by Nikola Mirotic , who went 12 - for - 15 from the field and 0 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding five rebounds and three steals . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 27 points and 11 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 22 points and 6 assists on the season . Jimmy Butler was the other player to score in double figures for the Pistons . He went 6 - for - 6 from the field and 0 - for - 0 from the three - point line to score 16 points . He added five rebounds and 12 assists , but he did n't have to do much else with the production lately . The only other starter to reach double - digit points was Paul Zipser , who chipped in 14 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and three rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Pistons will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

It was a nice surprise for the Nets , as he 's averaging only 6 points per game so far this season . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Magic did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 36 percent compared to the Knicks , who went 33 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Magic did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Sixers into 12 turnovers , while committing just 16 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 17 points and 12 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 11 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 4 - 11 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 11 - 11 FT ) , but he still finished with 19 points , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . He 's been filling up the stat sheet lately , combining for 20 points , 13 rebounds and 18 assists over his last two games . Jason Smith and Willie Green were the other two players to reach double - digit points , as they each finished with 11 points . The Magic 's next game will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Knicks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

This was tight throughout , as there were eight ties and 11 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . They also dominated the assists differential , winning that , 22 - 14 . Portland is without their top - three scorers and two point guards and have now lost their fourth - straight game . The Jazz dominated from start to finish , as they held the Trail Blazers to just 19 points in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Trail Blazers recorded 18 assists and 13 turnovers , while the Jazz committed just eight turnovers to their 8 - point victory . Portland has been struggling mightily recently and they were walking into a buzz saw here . This game was decided early , as no starter played more than 27 minutes to spare some minutes for a game on Thursday . Sacramento got the free - throw shooting just great for the Kings tonight , as they went 5 - for - 14 from long distance in the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Mavericks recorded 22 assists to just 19 turnovers , while the Kings got just 19 . The Mavericks are now 17 - 17 at home this season . Dallas has been playing some incredible offense as of late , as they are averaging 120 points a game across their last seven games . In a battle between two Western Conference contenders , the Clippers were able to escape with a huge road win . It was a dominating showing from both teams , as there were nine ties and seven lead changes in total , with neither team leading by more than 36 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as the Clippers recorded 27 assists to nine turnovers , while the Hornets committed 16 turnovers to just 16 assists . Blake Batum led the way for LA , as he dropped 31 points , eight rebounds and four assists . JJ Redick was n't far behind , as he accrued 15 points , two rebounds and 2 assists . Frank Kaminsky was second on the team , as he provided 16 points and five rebounds off the bench . Chris Paul recorded a double - double , totaling 15 points , nine rebounds and 17 assists . DeAndre Jordan scored just eight points , but grabbed 19 rebounds and recorded two blocks . Frank Kaminsky was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and five rebounds . The Clippers ( 36 - 23 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Blake Griffin was the player of the game though , as he accumulated 43 points , 10 rebounds , five assists and two steals . DeAndre Jordan finished second on the team with 20 points and 19 rebounds . Jeremy Lamb was huge off the bench , providing 19 points and six rebounds . The Clippers will be in Denver on Saturday for their next game .

The defense was solid as well , as the Wizards were held to 44 percent shooting from the field . The Wizards also made three of their five three - point attempts on the night . The bench was huge for Atlanta as well , as they outscored the Wizards bench 52 - 34 . He 's now combined for 37 points in the last two games , as he 's been a big part in the Kings ' six - game win streak . Hayward on the other hand finished with 19 points ( 6 - 16 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 10 FT ) , four rebounds and seven assists . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 16 - for - 15 from the field and 6 - for - 12 from deep to score 29 points . Dwyane Wade led the team with 21 points and Aaron Brooks matched Brooks off the bench . It 's a good thing the starters got some rest as their next game is on Thursday in the second half of a back - to - back against the Houston Rockets . The Bulls just continue their ridiculous form at home , as they are now 210 at AT & T Center . The defense has been dominating all season , but the offense was on display here . They now rank in the top - five in offensive and defensive efficiency and this looks like one of few teams in the league who can compete with the Golden State Warriors . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 10 - 2 ) defeated the Detroit Pistons ( 6 - 7 ) 104 - 81 on Friday . Cleveland has won three straight games , and they 've vaulted themselves out of the early - season hole they were in , at one time standing with a sub - .500 record of 9 - 2 . Kyrie Irving led the attack on offense , putting up a season - high 25 points in 29 minutes . The other legs of the big three finished with double - doubles . LeBron James facilitated and finished with 21 points and 3 assists in 28 minutes , while Kevin Love cleaned up the glass to finish with 12 ponts and 10 rebounds in 27 minutes . Coach David Blatt certainly has n't shied from playing his key guys big minutes . James , Irving and Love are all averaging at least 33 minutes per game this season . The Cavaliers will try to make it six straight wins when they continue their road trip in Toronto on Friday against the Raptors . As the Cavaliers shift into a higher gear and continue their march up the standings in the East , Detroit continues to coast downhill , losing their sixth straight game . The Pistons have only reached the 100 - point threshold once in their last eight games as their offense continues to sputter . They shot 31 percent from the field and 32 percent from beyond the arc in Friday 's loss , with LeBron James finshing with a game - high 25 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting in 29 minutes . Jon Leuer was the only other Detroit player in double figures with 15 points . The Cavaliers shot 48 percent from the field and 44 percent from beyond the arc . Detroit will finish off their current four - game road trip Monday against the Los Angeles Lakers .
The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host Phoenix Suns , 137 - 112 , at Talking Stick Resort Arena on Saturday evening . The Bucks turned in their highest point total of the season , as they ran past the struggling Suns . The Bucks ( 22 - 28 ) shot a blistering 63 percent from the field , as they scorched the Suns ' defense . Giannis Antetokounmpo led the way for Milwaukee with 30 points , 12 rebounds , six assists and four blocks to stuff the stat sheet . Mirza Teletovic followed up with 19 points on 6 - of - 10 shooting , to burn his former team . Jabari Parker added 18 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting , and nine rebounds , as he was solid in 31 minutes . The Bucks are still stuck outside the top eight in the East but will look to continue to claw their way back , as they play host to the Heat on Wednesday . The Suns ( 16 - 35 ) shot only 42 percent from the field , and were dominated in the paint , where they were outscored 74 - 42 . However , Phoenix saw some great performances from some of it 's youngsters , as Marquese Chriss tallied a career - high 27 points on 9 - of - 16 shooting , to go along with six rebounds , in only 24 minutes . Devin Booker went off for 27 points in the second quarter alone , but cooled down , as he finished with 31 points in the contest . Tyson Chandler grabbed 13 rebounds , while Eric Bledsoe and P.J . Tucker chipped in 13 points each . The Suns remain last place in the West but will continue to fight , as they go on to visit New Orleans on Monday .
The Oklahoma City Thunder ( 25 - 17 ) defeated the Sacramento Kings ( 16 - 24 ) 122 - 118 on Sunday at Chesapeake Energy Arena in Oklahoma City . The Thunder came out on fire in this game , out - scoring the Kings 28 - 23 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Thunder shot the ball well , going 44 percent from the field and 32 percent from the three - point line , while the Kings went 46 percent from the floor and just 36 percent from beyond the arc . The Thunder did secure a 44 - 44 rebounding advantage , but it was just enough to pull off the victory . Darren Collison was the biggest starter in this one , as he went 7 - for - 14 from the field and 1 - for - 7 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 23 points , while also adding two assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 31 points and 19 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 18 points and 14 rebounds on the year . Victor Oladipo was another player with a solid showing . He did n't have his best shooting performance on the season ( 11 points , 7 - 8 FT ) , 14 assists and four steals , so it was good to see him get back on track Wednesday . Coming off the bench , Alex Abrines had 10 points ( 4 - 6 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) of his own . The Kings ' next game will be on the road against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday , while the Kings will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 103 - 86 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Tuesday . The two teams square off again Wednesday night in Memphis in the second game of a home - and - home series , so the Grizzlies ( 17 - 9 ) opted to rest Marc Gasol on Tuesday . That left them even more short - handed than usual , given that star point guard Mike Conley is also out for the foreseeable future . That played right into the Cavs ' hands , as they were able to put together a relatively comfortable home win despite sitting Kyrie Irving for rest purposes themselves . LeBron James and Kevin Love turned in their typical quality of performance , but the story was J.R. Smith , who 'd essentially been mired in a month - long slump . The veteran guard posted a season - high 23 points on 8 - of - 17 shooting , including a stellar 6 - of - 10 tally from beyond the arc . Cleveland ( 18 - 5 ) shot 46 percent from the field overall , which helped them overcome 17 turnovers . The Grizzlies were led by Zach Randolph , who started at center for Gasol . He posted 18 points , five rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Troy Williams and Andrew Harrison turned in a pair of 13 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and an assist , and the latter posting four assists , three rebounds , three blocks and a steal . Tony Allen contributed eight points , a rebound , an assist and three steals , while JaMychal Green only poured in two points but brought down eight boards . Jarell Martin supplied eight points , 10 rebounds and an assist . Love led the way for Cleveland with 29 points , 13 rebounds , three assists and two steals . James registered 23 points , eight assists , six rebounds and three steals . DeAndre Liggins compiled three points , five rebounds , four assists , two steals and a block while drawing the start for Irving , while Channing Frye led the second unit with eight points , a rebound and an assist . The Grizzlies and Cavs meet again on Wednesday evening at FedEx Forum in Memphis .
The Houston Rockets took down the host Phoenix Suns on Wednesday , 125 - 111 . Houston ( 22 - 8 ) has won 11 of its last 12 contests , bouncing back with the win over the Suns after having lost to the Spurs on Tuesday night . Point guard James Harden continued his ridiculous stretch of play , posting a team - high 27 points to go along with 14 assists . Guard Eric Gordon , meanwhile , scored 24 points off the bench and passed Steph Curry for the league lead in three pointers made thanks to a whopping seven shots from beyond the arc on Wednesday . Seven Rockets scored in double digits in the win , including every member of the Houston starting five . Phoenix ( 8 - 21 ) is in the opposite position of Houston , having now lost four straight . The Suns sit near the bottom of the Western Conference despite having seen strong play from star point guard Eric Bledsoe recently . On Wednesday , Bledsoe scored 16 , but took a back seat to sophomore guard Devin Booker . Booker poured in a team - high 28 points in addition to six rebounds and seven assists . Bench players TJ Warren and Brandon Knight scored 19 and 17 , respectively . The Rockets will visit Memphis on Friday , while the Suns will host the 76ers . The Suns ( 8 - 21 ) had to play this game without Devin Booker and Blake Griffin , as they simply did n't have enough bullets to win the fight . Eric Bledsoe led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 16 points , two rebounds and six assists . T.J. Beverley was second on the team , as he accrued 17 points , five rebounds and two assists . Ryan Anderson went just 5 - of - 10 from the field , but finished with 15 points , five rebounds and two assists . Montrezl Harrell was a lone bright spot off the bench , totaling 17 points and three assists .
The Sacramento Kings ( 25 - 45 ) defeated the Isaiah Canaan ( 19 - 33 ) 107 - 100 on Sunday at the Staples Center . It was another night of improbabilities , with the Kings coming into the contest looking to snap a five - game losing streak . The Kings took an early 16 - 0 lead and never relinquished the lead after that , as they were able to coast to the 10 - point victory in front of their home crowd in the game . The Kings , who shot 36 percent from the field , were led by a huge performance from DeMarcus Cousins , who shot 8 - for - 27 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from beyond the arc en route to a game - high of 33 points . Cousins also got to the free throw line 19 times , and converted on 17 of those attempts . He also recorded four steals . DeMarcus Cousins had 33 points ( 8 - 27 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 17 - 19 FT ) , 17 rebounds , four assists , four steals and four blocks in 36 minutes . Robert Covington had 21 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 5 - 6 3Pt ) , three rebounds , one assist , one steal and one block in 21 minutes . The Kings are now two games out of the final playoff spot in the West , while they head back home to take on the Nets on Wednesday night . The Kings ( 33 - 13 ) were led by a big performance from DeMarcus Cousins , who had 33 points ( 8 - 27 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 17 - 19 FT ) , 17 rebounds , three assists , four steals and four blocks . The Kings will try to get their first win of the season at home against the Bucks on Friday .
The Dallas Mavericks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 104 - 97 , at American Airlines Center on Sunday . The Cavaliers ( 32 - 30 ) learned earlier in the day that they would n't have Kevin Love at their disposal to attempt to help them stop a rare slide that had seen them lose three of their last four , as the star forward would be sidelined with his lower back ailment . However , the other two members of the Big Three , along with some help from trusty veteran Channing Frye , helped insure that the starting five was able to put together a relatively comfortable home win . Irving 's 18 points led Cleveland , and he added five assists , four rebounds and four steals . Wesley Matthews was the only other member of the first unit to reach double digits in the scoring column , collecting 21 points and adding four rebounds . Dirk Nowitzki and Dirk Nowitzki were next with a pair of eight - point efforts , with the former adding five rebounds and two assists , and the latter posting five rebounds , four assists and a block . Seth Curry supplied 16 points , four rebounds and four assists . Richard Shumpert and Iman Shumpert led the second unit with a pair of eight - point efforts . Harrison Barnes paced Cleveland with 24 points , nine rebounds , three assists and one steal . Yogi Ferrell tallied 19 points , three assists , five rebounds and four steals . Dwight Powell provided 14 points , eight boards , two steals and two blocks . Dirk Nowitzki supplied eight points , six boards , one assist and one steal . Nowitzki paced Cleveland with a 23 - point , 9 - rebound double - double that also included nine assists , one steal and one block . Matthews supplied a 21 - point , 2 - assist double - double that also included nine rebounds and one steal . Seth Curry paced the Cavs with 18 points , five rebounds , three assists and four steals . Yogi Ferrell totaled 19 points , three assists , five rebounds and four steals . Dwight Powell provided 14 points as a reserve . Seth Curry paced the bench with 16 points , five rebounds and four assists . The Cavaliers return home to face the New Orleans Pelicans on Monday evening , while the Cavaliers are home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday evening as well .
The Phoenix Suns ( 19 - 42 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 26 - 35 ) 120 - 103 on Wednesday at Time Warner Cable Arena in Charlotte . The Suns came out firing in this one , out - scoring the Hornets 28 - 32 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Suns shot the ball well , going 60 percent from the field and 37 percent from the three - point line , while the Hornets went 39 percent from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns saw all five starters reach double figures in points . Kemba Walker led the way , going 10 - for - 24 from the floor and 3 - for - 11 from the three - point line to score a team - high of 26 points , while also adding eight assists and two steals . He 's combined for 59 points over his last two games , as he continues to have the hot hand . Booker on the other hand went 3 - for - 12 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . He had three steals and five assists , as he was able to get to the free throw line at a high rate . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 42 points , 15 rebounds and five assists . He 's now averaging 16 points and 8 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Marquese Chriss had an impressive showing . He went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 3 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 17 points , while adding one assist in 23 minutes . The Hornets ' next game will be at home against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Hornets will travel to Brooklyn to play the Nets on Wednesday .
The Golden State Warriors ( 40 - 7 ) defeated the Los Angeles Clippers ( 30 - 18 ) 144 - 98 on Wednesday . The Warriors continued to pursue perfection on their home court and keep the NBA record for most wins in the regular season alive and well after holding off the Clippers . A series of strong runs to end each of the second , third and fourth quarters made up for a motivated LA team . Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson managed to drain two key free throws before outscoring Golden State 27 - 41 in the final period . Curry went on to finish with 43 points , nine rebounds and six assists on 15 - of - 23 shooting , while Durant led the way in scoring with 23 points , to go along with four rebounds and seven assists . Next up , the Warriors play the second game of a back - to - back when they visit the Los Angeles Lakers on Thursday , while the Warriors host the Los Angeles Clippers on Thursday . The Clippers visit Charlotte on Monday , while the Clippers host the Los Angeles Clippers in their next contest while Los Angeles ( 44 - 48 ) on Wednesday , as the Clippers travel to Oakland to take on the Golden State Warriors on Monday . Doc Clippers ( 30 - 7 ) will be without Cousins yet again on Friday as they host the Lakers and the Clippers . Los Angeles will play the Lakers on Sunday , as the Clippers will have a couple days off before hosting the Lakers on Tuesday .
The Washington Wizards ( 45 - 33 ) defeated the Philadelphia 76ers ( 18 - 61 ) 119 - 90 on Friday . The Wizards were unsuccessful in their bid to garner a playoff spot , but entered Sunday trying to finish the season off on a positive note . With the postseason out of reach , John Wall sat out a third consecutive game with his knee injury . Ramon Sessions was in the starting five again in Wall 's stead , and acquitted himself well once more . He contributed a 19 - point , seven - assist double - double , and added four rebounds and a block . The bench was also highly productive , contributing 65 points on the night . The Sixers were led by Ramon Sessions 's 17 points off the bench , which he supplemented with seven rebounds , seven assists and a block . Ramon Sessions put together one of his typically productive efforts off the bench to pace the Philadelphia reserves , pouring in 12 points and adding seven rebounds , two assists , a steal and a block . The Wizards improved to 45 - 33 and remain in second place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Miami to take on the Heat in a Saturday night matchup . Bradley Beal led the way for the Sixers with 21 points , four assists , three rebounds and a steal . Ramon Sessions put in a 19 - point , 12 - rebound double - double off the bench , and also recorded two assists , two steals and a block . The Sixers remain in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They 're home again Sunday to face the Milwaukee Bucks .
The LA Clippers ( 34 - 17 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 29 - 23 ) 100 - 93 on Sunday at the American Airlines Center in Miami . Despite being down 19 - 15 after the first quarter , the Heat went off in the second , out - scoring the Heat 44 - 35 to finish the game and pull off the 11 - point victory in front of their home crowd . The Clippers were the superior shooters in this game , going 46 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Heat went 40 percent from the floor and a meager 41 percent from beyond the arc . The Heat was led by the duo of Chris Paul and Jamal Crawford . Paul went an impressive 8 - for - 23 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 22 points , while also adding seven assists . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 6 - for - 19 from the field and 4 - for - 7 from deep in that game . Luol Deng also had a strong showing , finishing with 15 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and eight rebounds . He 's now averaging 15 points and 9 rebounds on the year . J.J. Redick was able to contribute 14 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) of his own , but did n't do much else with only one rebound and one assist . The Heat ' next game will be at home against the Atlanta Hawks on Friday , while the Heat will travel to Los Angeles to play the Clippers on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 12 - 9 ) defeated the Phoenix Suns ( 8 - 13 ) 95 - 93 on Monday . Memphis came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Grizzlies team . The key for Memphis was their shooting , as they shot 40 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range against a tough Suns defense . The assist - to - turnover ratios were a huge difference in this game , as the Suns recorded 23 assists and 12 turnovers , while the Grizzlies committed 12 turnovers to their 12 assists . The Suns had to play this game without Paul Millsap and it 's obvious with this result how important he is to this team . Memphis struggled mightily on the offensive end of the floor , as the post players for the Grizzlies dominated this game . Marc Gasol was spectacular , as he tallied 22 points , eight rebounds and four blocks in the loss . Brandon Knight also had a nice game , as he totaled 17 points , four rebounds and five assists in the defeat . The problem with this team all year has been their defense and a 95 - point outing certainly wo n't help those numbers . The Grizzlies will look to bounce - back when they take on the Oklahoma City Thunder on Sunday . Memphis finally seems to be finding some rhythm after a terrible start to the season . They have now won five of their last six games and the offense is playing as fans hoped at the beginning of the season . The defense is still poor , but when you average 110 - plus points in a stretch like that , it 's hard to lose . This team was built with Eric Bledsoe and Marc Gasol who carried the load . Gasol totaled 22 points , eight rebounds and two blocks in the loss . Brandon Knight also had a nice game , as he totaled 17 points , four rebounds and five assists in the defeat . The bench played well though , as Alex Leuer , Mario Chalmers and Mario Chalmers all scored 11 points a piece . Memphis will look to bounce back on Sunday when they host the Dallas Mavericks .
The Denver Nuggets ( 25 - 30 ) defeated the Golden State Warriors ( 46 - 9 ) 132 - 110 on Monday at the Pepsi Center in Denver . The Nuggets got off to a quick start Wednesday , out - scoring the Nuggets 42 - 42 right away in the first quarter . The Nuggets made a run in the fourth quarter though , out - scoring the Nuggets 25 - 25 , but their comeback came up just short and the Nuggets were able to secure a surprising victory in front of their home crowd . Denver shot very well in this game , going 55 percent from the field and 59 percent from the three - point line , while the Warriors shot 49 percent from the floor and just 25 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , Kevin Durant backed his words up , as he finished with a game - high of 25 points ( 10 - 16 FG , 2 - 5 3Pt , 3 - 3 FT ) , to go along with four rebounds and five assists . It marked his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 47 points and 16 rebounds . Nikola Jokic was the only member of the Nuggets starting five to record double - digit points , as Iguodala went 6 - for - 9 from the field and 1 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score 15 points . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday , while the Warriors will be at home against the Utah Jazz on Friday .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the Cleveland Cavaliers , 110 - 106 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Sunday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Cleveland leading for well over 51 minutes of this game , it was close throughout the first three quarters . In fact , there were eight ties and 5 lead changes , as neither team led by more than 13 points . Defense was key for the Hawks , as they held the Cavaliers to 37 percent from the field and 26 percent from three - point range . Atlanta also dominated in the lane , scoring 33 paint points to the Cavaliers ' 24 . Kent Bazemore led the way for the Cavs , as he dropped 25 points on 8 - of - 13 shooting . Paul Millsap was second on the team , finishing with 21 points , five rebounds and three assists . Dwight Howard recorded a double - double , amassing 7 points , 17 rebounds and three blocks . Channing Frye was the only other Cleveland player in double figures , dropping 13 points to go along with seven rebounds and three assists . Cleveland will host the Boston Celtics for their next game on Saturday . The Cavaliers ( 6 - 1 ) were undefeated in their home building coming into this , but folded late in the fourth quarter . Kent Bazemore led Cleveland , as he tallied 25 points and six rebounds . Paul Millsap was just as good , collecting 21 points , five rebounds and six assists . Dwight Howard had one of his best games of the season , totaling seven points , 17 rebounds and two assists .
The Detroit Pistons defeated the Los Angeles Lakers , 121 - 102 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Saturday . Detroit was expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run for them to prevail . In fact , the Pistons went on a 29 - 14 run in a 19 - minute span between the third and fourth quarters to overcome a 14 - point deficit and eventually pull away . The game was relatively close up to that point though , as there were six lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 14 points until the final six minutes . Los Angeles really struggled with their shots , as they went just 43 percent from the field , 26 percent from three - point range and 85 percent from the free - throw line . Detroit also dominated the rebounding , winning that battle , 52 - 41 . Jon Leuer led the team in scoring , as he dropped 19 points on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Lou Williams was the only bench player in double figures , as he totaled 17 points , two rebounds and two assists on 4 - of - 14 shooting . Jordan Clarkson was the lone bright spot for the Lakers , leading the team with 20 points , three rebounds and three assists off the bench . Tarik Black provided a double - double off the bench , totaling 8 points and 10 rebounds . The Lakers will be on the road for their next game , as they face the Toronto Raptors on Friday . The Lakers ( 18 - 37 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 17 tries . Andre Drummond led the team in scoring , as he totaled 24 points and 17 rebounds on 12 - of - 19 shooting . Jon Leuer was the only starter in double figures , as he totaled 19 points and five rebounds . Tarik Black had a nice game off the bench , totaling eight points and 10 rebounds .
The Los Angeles Clippers defeated the host Philadelphia 76ers , 112 - 100 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday . While there were only two ties and six lead changes in total , this game was close throughout . In fact , neither team led by more than nine points , as it came down to the finals seconds . Rebounding was decisive for LA , as they won that battle , 41 - 41 . The third quarter is when the Clippers put a bit of distance between them and the Sixers , as they won that quarter , 19 - 16 . Chris Paul was the player of the game , as he accumulated 30 points , three rebounds and seven assists . DeAndre Jordan finished with 19 points and 20 rebounds on 6 - of - 7 shooting . Blake Griffin finished second on the team , totaling 15 points , 10 rebounds , six assists and three steals . T.J. McConnell accumulated nine points , three rebounds , 10 assists and two steals . On deck for the 76ers is a road matchup with the Los Angeles Lakers on Saturday . The Sixers ( 23 - 42 ) are now below .500 across their last 7 games , with this loss being the worst of the season . Chris Paul did all he could for Philadelphia , as he led the team with 30 points , three rebounds and seven assists . Dario Saric was second on the team , as he accrued 16 points , five rebounds and two assists . T.J. McConnell amassed 9 points , three rebounds and 10 assists .
The San Antonio Spurs ( 43 - 8 ) defeated the D'Angelo Russell ( 23 - 50 ) 106 - 100 on Tuesday at the AT & T Center . San Antonio has now won five of their last six games , and they 'll look to keep it going against the Detroit Pistons on Friday night . The Lakers were led by Jordan Clarkson , who scored a game - high 21 points on 9 - 14 shooting , including a perfect 1 - 2 from three - point land . Julius Randle was the only other starter to score in double digits , as he finished with 15 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) . Off the bench , Lou Williams had 14 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) with four assists and three rebounds in 37 minutes . Kawhi Leonard led the charge for the Spurs , scoring 20 points ( 4 - 13 FG , 0 - 3 3Pt , 12 - 15 FT ) . D'Angelo Bryant contributed a double - double of his own , finishing with 14 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt ) and nine assists . The Lakers were led by a strong performance from Jordan Clarkson , who scored 21 points ( 9 - 14 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) to go with four rebounds , four assists and one steal , in 37 minutes . Lou Williams scored 14 points ( 3 - 9 FG , 2 - 7 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) in 37 minutes off the bench . The Lakers will turn things around Friday at home against the Miami Heat .
The Washington Wizards defeated the Toronto Raptors , 105 - 96 , at Air Canada Centre on Wednesday evening . The Raptors ( 36 - 25 ) have put up valiant efforts thus far in the absence of All-Star point guard Kyle Lowry , with DeMar DeRozan particularly taking on an elevated role . However , when quality opponents come calling , the void felt by the absence of a player of Lowry 's caliber eventually rears its ugly head . Such was the case Wednesday , as the Wizards ( 36 - 23 ) leveraged superb efforts from trade - deadline acquisition Bojan Bogdanovic and trusted shooting guard Bradley Beal to pull out the tough road win . The pair combined for nearly half of Toronto 's point total , and the visitors made a game - changing statement in the second quarter by outscoring their hosts by a whopping 26 - 8 in the first 5:54 of the period . On the defensive end , the Wizards stymied Toronto to the tune of sub - 40 percent success rates from both the field and three - point range overall . Bogdanovic paced the Raptors overall with 27 points , his best scoring haul since donning his new team 's uniform . His effort included a sensational 6 - for - 7 tally from behind the arc . Beal followed with 23 points , three assists , one rebound , two steals and one block . Markieff Morris was next with a productive stat line of 13 points , eight rebounds and five assists . John Wall generated a 12 - point , 13 - assist double - double that also included four rebounds and one block . Marcin Gortat matched Wall 's scoring total and added eight boards and one assist . Otto Porter , Jr. surprisingly went scoreless over 19 minutes , contributing only three rebounds and one steal . Bogdanovic 's aforementioned hot hand combined with Porter 's struggles allowed the former ample playing time . As customary , DeMar DeRozan led Toronto , totaling 24 points , three rebounds and two assists . Serge Ibaka , whose offensive presence has been especially valued in the wake of Lowry 's injury , provided 22 points , 12 rebounds , two blocks and one steal . Norman Powell was next with a bench - leading 17 points , which he supplemented two boards and two assists . Cory Joseph provided 11 points , four rebounds , one assist and one steal . Jonas Valanciunas mustered a modest seven points but did haul in 11 boards and dish out one assist . The two teams now head back to the Nation 's Capital for the second game of the home - and - home series , which unfolds on Friday night .
The Boston Celtics ( 1 - 0 ) defeated the Brooklyn Nets ( 0 - 1 ) 121 - 105 on Wednesday at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn . The Nets were able to use a strong second half , where they out - scored the Nets 32 - 18 to seal the victory on the road . The Celtics were the superior shooters in this one , going 56 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Nets went 49 percent from the floor and just 37 percent from beyond the arc . The Celtics were also able to force the Nets into 20 turnovers , while committing only 12 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Celtics were led by Mirza Teletovic , who went 8 - for - 11 from the field and 4 - for - 0 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 20 points , to go along with six rebounds and two blocked shots . He 's had three double - doubles over his last four games , combining for 1 - of - 13 from the field and 0 - for - 9 from behind the three - point line . Jared Sullinger was the only other Celtic to reach double figures in points . He finished with 10 points ( 5 - 8 FG ) and six rebounds in 23 minutes . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Nets will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The Toronto Raptors defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 123 - 114 , at Wells Fargo Center on Wednesday . The Raptors ( 18 - 7 ) came in to Wednesday hoping to extend their recent stellar run in rather comfortable fashion against what would have seemed like an overmatched Sixers squad . However , Philadelphia ( 6 - 19 ) came ready to defend their home court , and rolled out Joel Embiid and Jahlil Okafor together as starters for the first time this season . While both big men played relatively well , it was Robert Covington who exploded for a season - high 26 points , which he complemented with 12 rebounds and two assists . However , the dynamic duo of Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan put on their usual impressive show for the Raptors , helping them overcome one of the Sixers ' stronger offensive performances to date on the season . Philadelphia actually outpaced their visitors from the field by a 50 percent to 47 percent margin , and saw four of the five members of their first unit hit double digits in the scoring column . DeRozan led the way for Toronto with 31 points , five boards and three assists . Lowry was next with 20 points , seven assists and four rebounds . Jonas Valanciunas contributed a 17 - point , 10 - rebound double - double that also featured an assist , two steals and a block . DeMarre Carroll supplied 10 points , three boards , an assist and a steal , while Terrence Ross and Cory Joseph tallied a pair of 13 - point efforts to lead the bench . Okafor was second behind Covington with 17 points , four rebounds , three assists and a pair of blocks . Sergio Rodriguez and Gerald Henderson put forth a pair of 16 - point efforts , with the former adding five assists and a rebound and the latter also posting two assists and a steal . Embiid had a quiet night by his standards , registering nine points , six rebounds , five assists , two blocks and a steal . Ersan Ilyasova , who moved back to the bench with Okafor 's insertion into the starting lineup at power forward , went for 12 points , seven rebounds and an assist to lead the bench . The Raptors head back home to face off with the Atlanta Hawks on Friday night , while the Sixers remain home to face the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday evening as well .
The Milwaukee Bucks ( 6 - 7 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 6 - 8 ) Monday 93 - 89 at the BMO Harris Bradley Center in Milwaukee . After losing the first quarter , the Bucks bounced back in a big way , winning the next two periods 46 - 50 . They eventually pulled out what is their more impressive win in what has been a rather slow start to the regular season . Going against his former team , Serge Ibaka shined , scoring 21 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 3 - 4 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) to go with nine rebounds , three blocks and one assist . The Bucks are now just a half - game behind the Heat for the fourth seed in the Eastern Conference , but just three games behind the eighth - place Nets . The Bucks , on the other hand , are currently in the eighth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . The Bucks were the superior shooters in this one , going 41 percent from the field and 28 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic finished at 42 percent from the floor and a meager 28 percent from deep . Indiana 's defense is nothing to write home about , but the Hornets shot just 33 percent from the field and were out - rebounded 42 - 46 , the Hornets were able to out - rebound the Hornets 42 - 46 . The Pacers are currently on the outside looking in at the Eastern Conference playoff picture . They 're playing better than any expert expected , and that 's why Friday 's drubbing at the hands of the Pacers was more of a surprise than it would have been in the past . They 'll host the Toronto Raptors on Saturday . Charlotte has lost six of their last eight games , and the bleakness will be hard for them to overcome anytime soon as they 're currently trudging through a difficult part of their schedule . The Lakers only managed two points over a three minute stretch , while Los Angeles closed out the game . Williams finished with 38 points , six rebounds and seven assists on 13 - of - 27 shooting to lead all scorers in his 34 minutes off the bench . Worth noting was the Lakers starting lineup , which consisted of Brandon Ingram , Luol Deng , Metta World Peace , Julius Randle and Timofey Mozgov . Head coach Luke Walton was experimental with the lineup , and it seemed to funnel the Lakers into more isolation style basketball , which was the game plan as discussed in the post - game press conference . The Detroit Pistons ( 12 - 11 ) defeated the Chicago Bulls ( 11 - 10 ) by a score of 102 - 91 , Wednesday night in Chicago . Detroit has now won three straight games and are solidly positioned in the second seed in the East . Jimmy Butler was the high - point man for Detroit in Sunday 's win , as he finished with a game - high 32 points ( 11 - 21 FG , 0 - 4 3Pt , 10 - 10 FT ) , along with four rebounds and four assists , in 43 minutes . Five other players scored in double digits for the Pistons , including Tobias Harris , who had 22 points ( 9 - 16 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , along with seven rebounds , two assists , one steal and one block , in 40 minutes off the bench . Andre Drummond finished with 15 points ( 7 - 13 FG , 1 - 4 FT ) , 10 rebounds , three blocks and one steal , in 25 minutes . Marcus Morris chipped in 13 points and three assists , in 31 minutes , while Marcus Morris chipped in 13 points and three rebounds , in 31 minutes . The Pistons shot 46 percent from the field , while they held the Bulls to only 44 percent shooting . All five starters scored in double figures for Detroit , while Dwyane Wade led the way with 19 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , three rebounds and eight assists , in 34 minutes . Dwyane Wade finished with 19 points ( 5 - 13 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 9 - 10 FT ) , eight assists and three rebounds , in 44 minutes .
The Phoenix Suns defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 122 - 96 , at Wells Fargo Center on Tuesday . The Suns ( 8 - 5 ) checked in to Friday night on a downturn , as they 'd lost four of their last five . They were able to get off to a fast start , however , outscoring the Sixers ( 0 - 12 ) by a 27 - 27 margin in the first quarter . However , Phoenix came roaring back in the second period , which helped propel them to the eventual mark . They blasted their hosts 41 - 17 leading into halftime , building a lead that they 'd sustain the rest of the way . As has become the norm , it was Isaiah Thomas who led the way for the visitors , tallying 23 points , eight assists , three rebounds and three steals . Michael Carter-Williams was next with 18 points , six rebounds , six assists and a steal . Tony Wroten followed with a near double - double of 13 points , nine rebounds , seven assists and a steal . Nerlens Noel and Nerlens Noel were next with a pair of 3 - point efforts , with the former adding six rebounds and a assist and the latter supplying four rebounds and an assist . Eric Bledsoe was right behind him with 13 points , seven assists , five rebounds and a steal . Marcus Morris turned in a 11 - point , four - rebound double - double that also included a block and a pair of steals . Tony Wroten filled out the stat sheet with 13 points , seven assists and five rebounds . Alexey Shved led the second unit with 15 points , three rebounds , five assists and two steals . Philadelphia remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit for a tussle with the Pistons on Thursday .
The Boston Celtics ( 10 - 7 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 5 - 12 ) 112 - 104 on Wednesday . Boston put a basic lid on their six - game losing streak with the win . They remain without several of their key players as Ricky Rubio ( ankle ) , Kevin Martin ( wrist ) and Justise Winslow ( wrist ) are all expected to be out for at least a few more weeks . Hassan Whiteside has solidified himself as a dominant fill - double this season , and he 's put up 25 points and 17 rebounds in 37 minutes against the Magic . Hassan Whiteside played just 37 minutes in his return after missing four games with an ankle injury . He put up 17 points and four rebounds in 32 minutes . Justise Johnson was ejected from the game after forcefully shoving Miami 's Kelly Olynyk in the back of the neck . He had 25 points and 17 rebounds in 37 minutes . The Heat will travel to New York to take on the Knicks on Friday , and the Heat will head to Milwaukee to face the Bucks on Friday . For the Celtics , it was an uphill climb to try to unseat the East 's top team . Isaiah Thomas put together a great performance off the bench , scoring 27 points ( 8 - 15 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) , to go with two rebounds , one assist and one steal in 38 minutes . Hassan Whiteside had 25 points ( 10 - 13 FG , 5 - 10 FT ) , with 17 rebounds , while also adding a block in 37 minutes . Jae Crowder had 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) , four rebounds , three assists and two steals in 32 minutes . Josh Richardson also scored 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 3Pt ) , to go with six rebounds and two assists . Derrick Winslow was the only other Heat starter to reach double - digits , as he scored 17 points ( 6 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3PT , 3 - 3 FT ) . The Heat will travel to Cleveland to take on the Cavaliers on Tuesday night .
The Miami Heat defeated the Golden State Warriors 105 - 102 Monday at AmericanAirlines Arena . After Kevin Durant tied the game at 102 with just over 10 seconds left in the fourth quarter , Dion Waiters held the ball at the top of the key while the clock ticked down . With a little over two seconds on the clock , Waiters launched a shot from behind the arc . The shot hit nothing but net and the Heat pulled off one of the biggest upset victories in the NBA this season . Waiters was not only the hero , but he was also the star , as he finished with a game - high 33 points on 13 - of - 20 shooting from the field and 6 - of - 8 from 3 - point land in 33 minutes . As a team , the Heat were scorching from behind the arc , hitting a ridiculous 43 percent of their shots from long range in the winning effort . The win gives Miami their fourth straight victory as they were perfect over their four - game home stand . Meanwhile , the loss ends the Warriors ' ( 38 - 7 ) seven - game win streak , as it ended up being too little too late in the closing moments for the NBA 's top team . Durant led the way in the scoring column , finishing with 27 points on 12 - of - 23 shooting from the field , but he did shoot just 1 - of - 8 from behind the arc . Additionally , Steph Curry almost put together a triple - double , as he recorded 21 points , 10 rebounds and eight assists in 37 minutes . Klay Thompson added 22 of his own , but JaVale McGee 's 10 points made him the fourth and final Warriors to score in double figures . Up next , the Heat will look to continue their winning ways in Brooklyn on Wednesday , while the Warriors will look to return to form against the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Phoenix Suns ( 16 - 46 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 27 - 34 ) 102 - 84 on Sunday at the US Airways Center in Orlando . The Suns came out strong in this one , out - scoring the Magic 29 - 29 in the first quarter , therefore setting the tone for the rest of the game . The Suns shot the ball well , going 45 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Suns were also able to force the Magic into 14 turnovers , while committing only 18 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Suns were led by Alex Len , who shot 10 - for - 22 from the field and 0 - for - 1 from the three - point line to finish with 31 points , while also adding 15 rebounds . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 29 points and 18 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 16 points and 17 rebounds on the year . Elfrid Payton had a strong showing as well , recording 19 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , two rebounds and 11 assists in 34 minutes . He 's had a nice stretch of four games , averaging 17 points and 5 rebounds over that span . Elfrid Payton nearly recorded a triple - double , as he recorded 19 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , four rebounds and 11 assists . He 's scored 14 points or less in each of his last four games , so it was good to see him get dialed back in and have a strong showing . Elfrid Payton also did his part in the win , recording a double - double with 19 points ( 9 - 17 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) , 2 rebounds and 11 assists . He 's posted two double - doubles in a row , combining for an impressive 54 points and 22 rebounds over that span . Coming off the bench , Ronnie Price added 14 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt ) and four rebounds in 20 minutes . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Houston Rockets ( 6 - 4 ) took down the Philadelphia 76ers ( 1 - 9 ) 115 - 88 at the Toyota Center on Wednesday night . Close , but no cigar for the Philadelphia 76ers . The Sixers were looking to grab their first win of the season , and nearly did so , losing by one to the Rockets . Philadelphia got a big game from Eric Gordon , who scored 33 points ( 12 - 20 FG , 4 - 8 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , to go along with seven rebounds , nine assists , one steal and one block . The Rockets have now cobbled together back - to - back wins , and victories in eight of the past six games , which they 'll attempt to uphold in Sunday 's showdown against the Heat . On the other side , Philadelphia has dropped six of its last seven games as they continue to find ways to win without DeMar DeRozan ( adductor ) in the lineup . Sergio Rodriguez moved into the starting lineup for Sergio Rodriguez , who had just two points ( 1 - 8 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt ) and six assists in 27 minutes . Trevor Ariza led the way for the 76ers , scoring 17 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 5 - 11 3Pt ) , to go with eight rebounds , three assists and one steal in 35 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova also scored 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) to go with six rebounds and one block in 22 minutes . Joel Embiid had 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) , 10 rebounds , two blocks , one assist and one steal in 23 minutes . Joel Embiid was on fire as well , posting 13 points ( 6 - 10 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt ) , 10 rebounds , one assist and one steal in 23 minutes . Ersan Ilyasova contributed 13 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) of his own , along with six rebounds and two steals , in 22 minutes . Philadelphia will get a day off before hosting the Minnesota Timberwolves on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 19 - 14 ) defeated the Charlotte Hornets ( 10 - 24 ) 91 - 87 on Friday . Cleveland is on a three - game win streak . Kevin Love has struggled to find his place the Cavaliers ' offense so far this season , but he was the key cog for them Saturday as he put up 27 points and 5 rebounds in 38 minutes . Anderson Varejao sat out the game with a rib contusion . Tristan Thompson filled in as a spot starter at center and put up a double - double of 14 points and 14 rebounds in 43 minutes . The Cavs stay home and will host the Milwaukee Bucks on Tuesday . Charlotte has won six of their last ten to keep themselves in the playoff conversation while weathering the injuries they 've had early in the season . Lance Stephenson ( pelvic ) has started to do some work in practice but is n't considered too close to returning . Most of Charlotte 's options in the frontcourt right now are underwhelming , but Michael Kidd-Gilchrist showed up well Wednesday with 12 points and 10 rebounds in 29 minutes . They 'll return home to host the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday . Charlotte has lost two straight , and while they have tons of talent on their roster , it looks like the Hornets will be focusing on development this season instead of fighting for a playoff spot . It 's obvious watching the team that they are improving under coach Quin Snyder , so time and experience will be the test to see if the Hornets have the right guys to build a winning team around . Kyrie Irving paced the Hornets ' attack , finishing with 23 points and three three - pointers in 42 minutes . Charlotte will return to action Tuesday in Philadelphia .
The Utah Jazz ( 10 - 10 ) defeated the New York Knicks ( 10 - 13 ) Monday 106 - 85 at the Vivint Smart Home Arena in Salt Lake City . The Jazz maintained control of the game from the very start , opening up a 10 - point lead at the end of the first quarter and never looking back . They were led by Gordon Hayward’s game - high 24 points , and the small forward has now recorded at least 23 points in three straight games . Derrick Favors was also effective , recording 20 points and eight rebounds in 28 minutes . Carmelo Anthony ( 12 ) was the only other New York player to score in double figures , while Sasha Vujacic scored 15 points in 23 minutes off the bench . Up next , the Jazz will travel to Detroit Wednesday to take on the Pistons , while the Knicks will head home Wednesday and play the Heat . The Knicks will look to extend their win streak to three games against the 76ers on Wednesday before traveling to the All-Star Break in 111 . New York has been playing good ball as of late , but losses like this show why . New York was led by Derrick Favors , who tallied 20 points , eight rebounds and four assists in the loss . Carmelo Anthony also had a solid game , recording 12 points and five rebounds in 26 minutes . Up next , the Jazz will travel to Oakland to take on the Warriors on Friday , while the Knicks will travel to Minnesota Friday to play the Timberwolves .
The Atlanta Hawks defeated the host New Orleans Pelicans 121 - 115 at Smoothie King Center on Friday . In a battle between two teams battling for a playoff spot , the more experienced team went on a late run to cap off a big road win . In fact , the Hawks finished the game on a 26 - 8 run to open things up and win comfortably . They actually led for the majority of the game , as New Orleans 's only lead lasted less than two minutes in the second quarter . Shooting was the big difference in the game , with Atlanta hitting 53 percent from the field and 43 percent from three - point range . New Orleans only shot 50 percent from the field and 33 percent from three - point range . The Pelicans were able to shoot over 50 percent from the field , while the Pelicans shot 53 percent . Anthony Davis had one of his best games of the season , as he accumulated 43 points , 10 rebounds and three assists on 14 - of - 23 shooting . Jeff Teague finished second on the team , totaling 19 points , six rebounds and seven assists . Al Horford amassed 14 points , five rebounds , four assists and two blocks . Dennis Schroder led the Pelicans in scoring , as he amassed 15 points , two rebounds and five assists . Al Horford scored just 14 points on 7 - of - 15 shooting , but grabbed five rebounds and handed out four assists . Dennis Schroder was the only other starter with more than 10 points , as he amassed 15 points , two rebounds and five assists . The Hawks will host the Miami Heat on Monday for their next game .
The Utah Jazz defeated the Philadelphia 76ers , 109 - 84 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Saturday . The Jazz ( 5 - 3 ) braced themselves for an offensive void when they lost Gordon Hill to a finger injury in preseason , as he was slated to miss a minimum of six weeks . However , the standout forward beat the recovery timetable by at least two weeks , starting at the three on Sunday for Utah . He looked as if he had n't missed a beat , rattling off a team - high 20 points , along with seven rebounds . While he only found the net on six of his 17 field - goal attempts , he impressively drained all 18 of his shots from the free - throw line . His effort spearheaded a highly productive day for the Jazz offense that saw all five members of the first unit hit double - digit scoring and Utah produce a collective 51 percent success rate from the field . Gordon Hayward spearheaded the offensive attack for Philadelphia with 20 points , while Derrick Favors managed a 16 - point , 14 - rebound double - double . Joel Embiid and Robert Covington turned in a pair of 14 - point efforts , with the former adding nine rebounds and one assist , and the latter registering two boards and one assist . Shelvin Mack led the second unit with eight points , five assists , two rebounds and two steals . The 76ers ( 0 - 6 ) were n't exactly offensive wallflowers themselves , but simply could n't keep up with their visitors ' firepower . They were led by a 16 - point effort from Derrick Favors , who also added 14 boards , an assist , three blocks and a steal . Rodney Hood pitched in with 18 points , two rebounds , an assist , a steal and a block . Robert Covington pitched in with 12 points , eight rebounds and an assist . Jahlil Okafor led the bench with 15 points , four rebounds and an assist . Philadelphia remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Atlantic Division . They head to Detroit for a tussle with the Pistons on Thursday .

It was his second straight double - double and fourth in the last five games , as he continues to be a force this season . The Wizards came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Wizards team . The ball movement was huge as well , with Washington dishing out 29 assists to the 10 turnovers . The Nets came into this game as a huge underdog , but held their own to keep it close throughout . McDaniels led the team with 20 points and six rebounds off the bench . Washington will look to play better on Saturday , when they travel to Philadelphia to face the Sixers .
The Oklahoma City Thunder defeated the New York Knicks 105 - 78 Monday at Madison Square Garden . The Thunder ( 12 - 12 ) managed to get off to a hot start in this one , allowing the Knicks ( 4 - 13 ) to go on a 120 run in the first four and half minutes of the game . Oklahoma City , however , kept their composure and continued to whittle away at the lead from there , ultimately snagging a seven - point lead by halftime . They never lost that lead , as the play of their All-Star backcourt of Russell Westbrook and Amar'e Stoudemire started . Westbrook led the way for Oklahoma City with a double - double of 32 points and eight assists , while Russell Westbrook led the way with 32 points , eight assists and seven rebounds . He also posted three steals and shot 12 - of - 7 from the field . The Knicks were led by Amar'e Stoudemire , who came off the bench with 20 points and nine rebounds in 25 minutes . Jeremy Lamb added 13 points on 3 - of - 5 shooting from the field and 3 - of - 7 shooting from behind the arc , while Steven Adams was the only other Knicks ' player in double figures , recording 6 points and 13 rebounds in 24 minutes . As a team , the Thunder struggled to shoot the ball , hitting just 44 percent of their shots and 42 percent of their shots from the field . Up next , the Thunder will look to extend their win streak to four against the Mavericks in Dallas on Saturday , while Knicks will head to Boston on Wednesday to take on the Celtics .

He 's on a very strong stretch of four games , where he 's averaging an impressive 22 points per game . Wiggins on the other hand finished with 31 points ( 11 - 17 FG , 4 - 5 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and nine rebounds . He 's averaging 14 points and 10 rebounds on the season .
