He 's had a strong stretch of four games where he 's averaged 22 points , nine rebounds and five assists . The only other Nugget to reach double figures was Mo Williams , who recorded 13 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 1 - 7 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and three assists in 36 minutes . The Nuggets ' next game will be at home against the New Orleans Pelicans on Thursday , while the Nuggets will travel to Miami to play the Heat on Wednesday .

This was a game that was expected to be close throughout and these elite teams did n't disappoint in this overtime thriller . In fact , there were 9 ties and 18 lead changes , with neither team leading by more than 12 points . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as LA recorded 33 assists to nine turnovers , while the Cavaliers committed 18 turnovers to just 12 assists . Kyrie Irving led the Cavaliers in scoring , as he tallied 28 points and two assists on 8 - of - 19 shooting . Blake Griffin finished second on the team , totaling 13 points , five rebounds , 11 assists and a steal . DeAndre Jordan recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points , four rebounds and two blocks . Chris Paul accumulated 16 points , six rebounds and nine assists . J.J. Redick was the only other Cavalier with more than 12 points , as he dropped 12 points off the bench . The Cavaliers ( 15 - 4 ) have now won five of their last six games , as they continue to slide down the standings . Blake Griffin led the way for Cleveland , as he tallied 13 points , five rebounds , 11 assists and three blocks . Chris Paul finished second on the team with 16 points , six rebounds and nine assists . Cleveland will host the Denver Nuggets on Saturday for their next game . Kyrie Irving led Cleveland in scoring , as he tallied 28 points , two assists and two steals . Blake Griffin was n't far behind , tallying 13 points , five rebounds and 11 assists . Kevin Love recorded a double - double , totaling 16 points and 4 rebounds .

The Boston Celtics defeated the Charlotte Hornets , 102 - 89 , at TD Garden on Friday . These two teams came into this matchup tied for the most wins in NBA history and the Celtics were able to pull ahead of the Hornets with this victory . The second quarter was the difference in the game , as Boston outscored Charlotte , 27 - 19 . Defense was also key for the Celtics , as they held the Hornets to 36 percent from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . Rim protection killed Charlotte as well , as they failed to record a block in their loss . The assist - to - turnover ratio kept the Celtics hanging around , as they committed 24 turnovers to 19 assists , while the Celtics committed 16 turnovers to their 25 assists . The Celtics ( 16 - 13 ) have been one of the surprises of the season and a comeback road win here just adds to their impressive resume ' . Isaiah Thomas continued his great form , as he tallied 18 points , two rebounds and seven assists in 34 minutes of action . Nicolas Batum was the only other starter in double figures , as he accrued 17 points , two rebounds and three assists . David Lee led the bench with 10 points and seven rebounds . Charlotte will be in action again on Monday in a road matchup against the Philadelphia 76ers . The Celtics ( 15 - 13 ) have been one of the most dysfunctional teams over recent weeks , but wins like this will surely quiet the skeptics for the time being . Isaiah Thomas led the team in scoring , as he tallied 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Avery Bradley was second on the team , with his 18 points and two rebounds . Jared Sullinger was the only other Wizard in double figures , as he totaled 8 points and 10 rebounds . David Lee had a nice game off the bench , totaling 10 points and seven rebounds . The Celtics will look to keep rolling on Monday against the Toronto Raptors .
The Phoenix Suns ( 32 - 30 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 19 - 43 ) 105 - 100 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic got off to a quick start in this game and took an early lead , finishing the first half up 55 - 47 . Despite shooting better from the field , the Suns did n't have as much success from the three - point line , where they went a meager 38 percent compared to the Magic , who went 25 percent . Making up for their poor three - point shooting , the Suns did it on the defensive side of the ball and forced the Magic into 20 turnovers , while committing just 19 of their own , which may have ultimately been the difference in this game . Markieff Morris had his way with the Magic . He went 11 - for - 17 from the field and 1 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 65 points , 10 rebounds and 8 assists , as he 's been a huge reason for the Suns ' success . Eric Bledsoe also had a strong showing . He went 3 - for - 7 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 13 points , while also adding nine rebounds . He 's now averaging 13 points and 4 assists on the season . The other starter to reach double figures in points was Elfrid Payton , who posted 13 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and nine assists in 38 minutes . Coming off the bench , PJ Tucker chipped in with 19 points ( 7 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) and five rebounds as well . Nikola Vucevic had an impressive double - double , scoring 18 points ( 8 - 16 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and grabbing five rebounds . It was his thirteenth double - double of the season and third straight game with at least 11 rebounds . Morris shot 11 - for - 17 from the field and 0 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 23 points . He also had six rebounds and seven assists , coming just shy of a triple - double . Eric Bledsoe chipped in with 13 points ( 3 - 7 FG , 1 - 1 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) and nine assists , while Jarryd Harris went a perfect 5 - for - 8 from the floor and 0 - for - 2 from the three - point line to score 19 points . The Suns ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday .
The Cleveland Cavaliers defeated the Denver Nuggets , 125 - 109 , at Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday . The Cleveland-Golden State matchup is always one of the showcase games of the year and that ended up being the case in this Christmas Day classic . Despite Denver leading for much of the first half , Cleveland took an eight - point lead into the fourth quarter . The assist - to - turnover ratio was the decisive statistic , with Cleveland recording eight more assists than Denver , while committing 11 less turnovers . The Cavaliers were really let down by their shooting , as they went 40 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range . The Nuggets also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 15 more assists than Denver , while committing six less turnovers . The Cavaliers ( 37 - 16 ) have been one of the best teams in the league across the last two months , as this win marks their 10th home win in 18 tries . LeBron James led the way for Cleveland , as he accumulated 27 points , five rebounds and 12 assists . Kyle Korver was second on the team , providing 27 points and five assists . Kevin Love was the only other starter in double figures , as he totaled 16 points and nine rebounds . Jamal Murray was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 12 points on 5 - of - 11 shooting . Will Barton and Will Barton were the only other players in double figures , as they scored 16 points a piece .

The Nets were the superior shooting team in this game , going 51 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line compared to the Nets who finished at 34 percent from the field and just 16 percent from deep . The Bulls also dominated the boards , going 58 percent to 34 percent from the field . The Nets were led by Nikola Mirotic , who scored 16 points ( 6 - 14 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt ) , to go along with 10 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 37 points and 24 rebounds . He 's now pushed his season averages to 14 points and 10 rebounds per game . The Bulls also saw a strong push from their bench , with both Bojan Bogdanovic and Nikola Gibson reaching double figures in points . Bogdanovic finished with 15 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 3 - 4 FT ) and three assists , while Gibson had 13 points ( 7 - 9 FG , 0 - 0 3Pt , 0 - 0 FT ) and 11 rebounds . The Bulls ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Isaiah Canaan and the Nets will be at home against the Portland Trail Blazers on Tuesday after the All-Star break as well .

The Wizards ( 27 - 20 ) learned earlier in the day that Anthony Davis would miss the contest with the hip injury that he suffered after a flagrant foul by the Knicks ' Kyle O'Quinn on Monday . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Boston Celtics ( 0 - 3 ) 103 - 95 on Wednesday at the TD Garden in Boston . The Celtics built a strong lead early in this game , out - scoring the Celtics 31 - 25 in the first quarter alone . Along with the quick start , the Cavaliers were also the superior shooters . They finished at 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from the three - point line , while the Celtics went 44 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from deep . After going on record saying he 'd come out much more agressive in this outing , LeBron James backed those words up , as he finished with a game - high of 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , to go along with 11 rebounds , four assists and two steals . James did n't even hit a three - pointer , but he was still able to get to the hoop and score as he pleased . It was clear he planned on taking over from the start and if he can continue to have this type of impact , the Cavaliers should be very tough defeat , even without Kevin Love . Kyrie Irving had a relatively quiet night . He went 7 - for - 6 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 18 points , while also adding four assists . After taking double - digit shot attempts in all five of his previous playoff games coming into this one , Bradley Irving had just 13 points ( 3 - 11 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and six assists . Over his last three games , he 's averaging 23 points and 10 rebounds , as he 's really stepped up his production with Ibaka sidelined . Like we 've grown accustomed to , LeBron James came just shy of another triple - double . In 42 minutes , he finished with 31 points ( 13 - 26 FG , 1 - 5 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , 11 rebounds and four assists . It was a season - high in points for him and a nice surprise as he 's averaging only 7 points per game on the year . Like Irving , Marcus Smith was dialed in with his shot , going 7 - for - 18 from the field and 3 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score 19 points . It was his second strong showing in a row , a stretch where he 's combined for 31 points and 15 rebounds . Jae Crowder chipped in with 16 points ( 5 - 6 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , seven rebounds and two steals as well . The Celtics ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Celtics will be at home against the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday .

It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 23 rebounds over his last two games . He had shot less than 25 percent in two out of his last three games coming into Saturday , so it was good to see him get things turned around and have a productive showing from the field in this matchup . He had a poor showing in Sunday 's game against the Spurs , so it was good to see him get things turned back around . The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the New York Knicks , 121 - 107 , at Madison Square Garden on Monday night . The Knicks ( 22 - 31 ) have been mired in controversy on and off the court in recent weeks , with rumors swirling about a possible trade of franchise cornerstone Carmelo Anthony and losses in three of their last four games . The Lakers ( 18 - 36 ) are n't in much better shape , however , and came into Monday 's contest with only five road wins in 28 games away from the Staples Center this season . However , a sterling effort from the Los Angeles bench that generated over half of the team 's scoring total helped lead the way to a relatively easy victory . The visitors were sharp from the jump , building a 29 - 19 lead after one and a 61 - 45 advantage by halftime . That edge was 97 - 73 after three quarters , and even with New York showing some signs of life in garbage time , the Lakers still coasted to a double - digit road victory . The Lakers were led by Lou Williams off the bench , who tallied 22 points , four assists , two rebounds and one steal in 26 minutes . Nick Young was next and paced the starters with 17 points , which he complemented with five rebounds and one steal . Brandon Ingram and Julius Randle followed with matching 14 - point efforts , with the former also providing seven boards , two assists and one steal , and the latter offering two rebounds , two assists and one block . Tarik Black posted a modest nine points but hauled in 10 boards and recorded one steal . D'Angelo Russell ( four points , six assists , two rebounds ) was minimally involved , but Justin Holiday ( 14 points ) and emerging rookie Ivica Zubac ( 10 points ) were productive as reserves as well .
The Memphis Grizzlies defeated the Utah Jazz , 102 - 96 , at Vivint Smart Home Arena on Monday . The Grizzlies ( 5 - 5 ) used a late fourth - quarter surge to secure their first road victory on Monday , after dropping their first three away from home to start the season . They did so with yet another great performance from Vince Carter off the bench , as he continues to turn back the clock in his 19th NBA season . Carter had 20 points on 6 - of - 11 shooting in 31 minutes as a reserve - - his third straight game with at least 17 points . Zach Randolph added a great performance off the bench himself , scoring 18 points and grabbing 10 rebounds in just 23 minutes to notch his third double - double of the season . For the starters , it was Marc Gasol and Mike Conley who carried the load , scoring 22 and 18 points respectively . For the Jazz ( 7 - 5 ) , on top of losing Monday 's game , they also lost their starting power forward Derrick Favors , as he left the game with left knee soreness after 21 minutes of playing time . Favors has been bothered with knee issues since before the season even started , and it is possible the team is now extra cautious with their star forward , opening the door for second - year player Trey Lyles to play a bigger role . The power forward out of Kentucky was great in 32 minutes off the bench , scoring 18 points on 6 - of - 12 shooting . Gordon Hayward , who has been unstoppable as of late with five straight games of at least 20 points , struggled mightily , shooting just 4 - of - 14 from the field and 1 - of - 7 from behind the arc en route to just 13 points . With Favors potentially out for an indefinite amount of time , the burden will be on Hayward to regain his scoring mojo and carry the load for a Utah team that is n't very prolific offensively . Up next , the Grizzlies will head to Los Angeles on Wednesday to take on the red - hot Clippers , while the Jazz will have off until Thursday when they take on Chicago at home .

The Cavs ( 28 - 8 ) narrowly escaped Phoenix with the win , as the Suns ( 12 - 26 ) used a strong second half to come within two points , with 3:20 left in the fourth . The Cavs started out with a huge 41 - point first quarter but the Suns retaliated in the third , winning the quarter 37 - 24 , to bring the score to 93 - 90 at the start of the fourth . However , the Cavs were able to hang on to escape with a four - point win . Cleveland 's big three earned their keep in this one , as they combined for 40 points in the first half , and another 40 in the second half , for a huge 80 - point contribution on the night . The Cavs shot 54 percent from the field and 15 - of - 34 from long range , but only tallied 15 assists in the game . The Suns will look to carry on with similar intensity and fight , as they play host to the Mavericks on Saturday .

The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the host New York Knicks , 104 - 93 , at Madison Square Garden on Saturday . These are two teams who will battle to sneak into the playoffs , but the Bucks looked like the far superior team in this game . They nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as the Knicks never led by more than one and failed to tie or recapture the lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover differential was the decisive statistic , as the Bucks recorded 26 assists to eight turnovers , while the Knicks committed 15 turnovers to just 22 assists . The Indiana Pacers defeated the Orlando Magic , 117 - 104 , at Bankers Life Fieldhouse on Sunday . Indiana got out to a hot start in the first quarter and they never looked back after that . In fact , the Pacers took a 27 - 17 lead after the first quarter , as they never trailed after that . The Indiana offense was as efficient as ever , going 50 percent from the field , 41 percent from three - point range and 92 percent from the free - throw line . Defensive rebounding was a huge factor as well , with the Pacers winning that battle , 38 - 32 . Orlando ( 15 - 20 ) have not been able to get a winning - streak going this season , as their defense continues to falter . Serge Ibaka led the starters in scoring , as he totaled 17 points and eight rebounds in the loss . Nikola Vucevic led the team in scoring , as he accrued 18 points and 11 rebounds off the bench . Jeff Green provided 17 points on his own off the bench on 7 - of - 12 shooting . Aaron Gordon went just 4 - of - 10 from the field , to finish with 13 points and six rebounds . On deck for the Magic is a road matchup with the New York Knicks on Monday . Indiana ( 17 - 18 ) needed this win after a poor stretch and they did n't let fans down in this offensive showcase . Myles Turner was the player of the game , as he accumulated 23 points , 12 rebounds and three assists on 7 - of - 13 shooting . Paul George was second on the team , collecting 19 points , five rebounds and three assists . Jeff Teague scored just 12 points , but dished out nine assists in the win . Off the bench , Al Jefferson scored 12 points , while Aaron Brooks dropped 14 of his own . Indiana will look to keep rolling against the Detroit Pistons on Tuesday .

The Toronto Raptors ( 13 - 2 ) defeated the Atlanta 21 ( 21 - 6 ) 126 - 115 on Tuesday at the Air Canada Centre in Toronto . The Raptors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Raptors 34 - 24 right away in the first quarter . The Raptors shot 51 percent from the field and 48 percent from the three - point line , while the Hawks finished at 51 percent from the floor and 42 percent from deep . The Raptors also forced the Hawks into 39 turnovers , while committing just 11 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 8 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 27 points , while also adding three rebounds and two blocked shots . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 50 points and 9 rebounds over his last two games . It was the first time he 's reached double figures in points since the beginning of November , so the added minutes really helped him get things going . The only other Wizard to reach double - digit points was Terrence Ross , who came off the bench for 12 points ( 4 - 7 FG , 2 - 4 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 22 minutes . Greivis Vasquez had a huge game as well , scoring 21 points ( 8 - 12 FG , 3 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 17 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Detroit Pistons on Friday , while the Hawks will be at home against the Indiana Pacers on Friday .

The Los Angeles Lakers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 119 - 108 , at Staples Center on Sunday . The Lakers ( 4 - 3 ) notched their third straight win and remain undefeated at home after another strong performance by their young , talented core . Los Angeles built upon an eight - point first quarter lead in the second period , where a series of scoring runs capped off the first half . The Suns made the game a heated contest in the fourth quarter . Devin Booker buried a 10 - foot jump shot with 6:39 left in the final period and drew a foul , sinking a free throw to pull the game within one point . The Lakers were able to outlast the Phoenix comeback attempt and did not let up their lead , even after it dwindled to just one possession . Nick Young and D'Angelo Russell nailed much needed back - to - back three pointers to put the game out of reach and secure the rest of the victory from the charity stripe . Devin Booker had a standout performance , as his sophomore season continues where he left off from his rookie year . Booker finished with 39 points , seven assists and three rebounds on 13 - of - 29 shooting . T.J. Warren added 22 points , while Eric Bledsoe finished with 19 points , two assists and two boards . Nick Young provided his best game of the young season with 22 points and seven rebounds , in addition to three buckets from behind the arc . Jordan Clarkson and Lou Williams were impressive off the bench , adding a combined 32 points on 13 - of - 28 shooting in 26 minutes and 30 minutes , respectively . Julius Randle had the most well - rounded game for the Lakers on his way to 18 points , five rebounds , four assists and one steal . Both teams play on Tuesday , as the Suns host the Portland Trail Blazers , while the Lakers host the San Antonio Spurs .

The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Phoenix Suns , 120 - 105 , at Wells Fargo Center on Friday evening . The Sixers ( 3 - 10 ) have been mocked for some time for the `` Trust the Process '' slogan that has become associated with their seemingly never - ending string of losing seasons . However , that phrase seems to be carrying a little more weight these days , as Philadelphia , behind emerging star Joel Embiid , is starting to make some noise around the league . The latest team to get an up - close look at their improving squad was the Suns ( 4 - 10 ) , which suffered their eighth road loss of the season while seeing Embiid tally 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two blocks and a steal . Philadelphia still has plenty of room for improvement despite notching their seventh win in 15 games , as they turned the ball over a whopping 15 times . However , they played superb defense , limiting Phoenix to a 42 percent success rate from the field and 29 percent from three - point range . On the defensive end , they were able to contain the prolific Suns to 42 percent and 49 percent success rates from the field and three - point range , respectively . Joel Embiid 's 26 points led the Sixers . He was right behind him with 26 points , seven rebounds , two assists and two blocks . Sergio Rodriguez got the start at point guard and registered eight points , 11 assists , eight rebounds and two steals . The Suns remain in fourth place in the Western Conference 's Northwest Division . They head to Brooklyn to take on the Nets on Tuesday .

This game appeared to be over after the first quarter , as the Lakers ' ( 10 - 14 ) leaky defense had no answered for the Rockets ' ( 15 - 7 ) high - powered offensive attack , as Houston won the quarter 43 - 27 . And while Los Angeles managed to pull closer before halftime , the Rockets absolutely poured it on in the second half . Early MVP-candidate James Harden was not too far behind , scoring 25 points on top of eight rebounds , six assists and four steals . As a team , the Rockets made a living at the 3 - point line , shooting an impressive 27 - of - 36 from long range . Up next , the Rockets will head to Oklahoma City on Friday to take on the Thunder , while the Lakers will head home Friday to play the Suns .

Al Horford and Jae Crowder had matching eight - point efforts , with the former adding eight assists , seven rebounds and a pair of blocks , and the latter providing six rebounds , two assists and a steal . Gerald Green paced the bench with 15 points and three boards , while Kelly Olynyk offered 12 points , four assists and four rebounds in a reserve role as well . The Pelicans continue on their trek through the Northeast with a visit to the New York Knicks on Monday night , while the Celtics tangle with the Toronto Raptors north of the border on Tuesday evening .
The Chicago Bulls ( 35 - 33 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 33 - 36 ) 92 - 85 on Monday . The Bulls came into this game as a double - digit favorite and simply couldn’t hold off a bad Bulls team . The key for Chicago was their shooting , as they shot 49 percent from the field and 32 percent from three - point range against a dominant Bulls defense . The ball movement was huge as well , with Chicago dishing out 24 assists to the Jazz ' 22 . Chicago has been playing some great ball recently , but this was a baffling loss . Jimmy Butler flirted with a triple - double , as he accumulated 13 points , five rebounds and six assists in the victory . Derrick Favors led the team with 24 points , but grabbed six rebounds and dished out three assists in the defeat . Taj Gibson also had a nice game off the bench , as he totaled 15 points and 6 rebounds . Nikola Mirotic was the only other starter with more than 15 points , as he tallied 15 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Jazz have a quick turnaround , as they play the New Orleans Pelicans on Sunday in their next matchup . The Bulls continue to surprise and these sort of wins are a credit to their resiliency and grittiness . The Houston Rockets ( 38 - 17 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 34 ) 128 - 104 on Friday at the Toyota Center in Houston . The Rockets got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 35 - 28 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 49 percent from the field and 42 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 48 percent from the floor and just 24 percent from beyond the arc . The Rockets were able to force the Magic into 16 turnovers , while committing only 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this game . The Rockets were led by Serge Ibaka in this one . Ibaka went 13 - for - 20 from the field and 0 - for - 4 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 28 points , while also adding eight rebounds and a blocked shot . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 29 points , 26 rebounds and 21 assists over those two games . He 's now averaging 10 points and 7 rebounds on the year . Evan Fournier was able to record 21 points ( 7 - 16 FG , 1 - 8 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) of his own , while also adding three rebounds . He 's now averaging 14 points and 5 assists on the season . The Rockets ' next game will be at home against the Charlotte Hornets on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the San Antonio Spurs on Wednesday .

The San Antonio Spurs ( 26 - 16 ) defeated the visiting Utah Jazz ( 14 - 27 ) 89 - 69 , Monday night at AT & T Center . With this win the Spurs have clinched a post - season berth for the 19th season in a row , tying the Boston Celtics franchise ( 1951 - 1969 ) for the fourth longest streak of its kind . This also marks the earliest point in any of the previous 23 seasons that the Spurs have clinched . Meanwhile , the Spurs came in a formidable foe , as winners of four straight , but were held to 39 percent shooting from the field by the renowned Spurs defense . The Spurs have now won six straight and are a remarkable 290 at home this season . Dating back to last season the Spurs have won 23 in a row at home , which ties yet another Celtics record ( 1985 , '86 ) for third most consecutive home victories . San Antonio was led by Rudy Gobert , who had a triple - double with 13 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 3 - 5 FT ) and 18 rebounds , along with four assists , four blocks and one steal , in 29 minutes . Gordon Hayward chipped in 10 points , one rebound , five assists and three steals , in 29 minutes , while Danny Green chipped in 13 points on 5 - of - 7 shooting , in 20 minutes off the bench . The Spurs shot 39 percent from the field but struggled from long range , where they shot only 30 percent ( 6 - 15 ) . The Spurs return home to host the Knicks on Sunday . The San Antonio Spurs ( 27 - 16 ) defeated the Denver Nuggets ( 18 - 24 ) 109 - 99 on Saturday . The New Year 's Eve showdown between the two Central Division rivals was atypical in a number of ways . To begin with , one of the rarest sights in the NBA this season , a Spurs road victory , came to pass , and against a quality opponent to boot . The Nuggets had entered Thursday 's contest sporting an impressive 10 - 2 home record and playing quality basketball overall . Meanwhile , San Antonio had managed a paltry three wins in 13 tries away from the Bradley Center , including consecutive road losses to the Mavericks and Thunder preceding Thursday 's game . They 'd also struggled offensively the majority of the year , often failing to even reach 75 points over the first 26 games of the season . However , the light has seemingly come on for San Antonio , and their side of the scoreboard , over their last two outings . After tallying 123 points in the loss to Oklahoma City on Wednesday , the Spurs roared right back with another outstanding night on offense , shooting a stellar 45 percent from the field and 41 percent from beyond the arc . They also managed 42 of their points off 38 field field goal attempts . The Nuggets were led by Arron Afflalo 's 21 points , which he supplemented with four rebounds , two assists and three steals . Tony Parker tallied 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists . Wilson Chandler was next with a bench - leading 15 points , which he complemented with five rebounds , two assists and two steals . Wilson Chandler filled out the stat sheet with 11 points , five boards and two assists . The Nuggets remain in third place in the Western Conference 's Southwest Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference . They head to Atlanta to take on the Hawks on Saturday .

With this win the Spurs have clinched a post - season berth for the 19th season in a row , tying the Boston Celtics franchise ( 1951 - 1969 ) for the fourth longest streak of their kind . This also marks the earliest point in any of the previous 24 seasons that the Spurs have clinched . The Spurs shot 46 percent from the field and 40 percent from long range , as they cruised to victory . LaMarcus Aldridge added 19 points , while Kristaps Porzingis chipped in 12 points , five rebounds , two assists and one steal . These are two teams who will battle to sneak into the playoffs , but the Bucks looked like the far superior team in this game . They nearly pulled out a wire - to - wire win , as the Knicks never led by more than one and failed to tie or recapture the lead after the first quarter . The assist - to - turnover differential was the decisive statistic , as the Bucks recorded 10 more assists than New York , while committing five less turnovers . The Bucks also dominated down low , winning the rebounding battle , 33 - 42 and the points in the paint differential , 48 - 32 . The Knicks ( 15 - 64 ) have now won three of their last four games , as they continue to climb up the Eastern Conference ladder . Following a pair of Tyus Jones free throws , Jameer Nelson answered for Denver with a driving layup to bring the score within one point . Andrew Wiggins went on to miss one of the free throws on the following possession , but Nelson was unable to hit the 17 - foot jumper and the Timberwolves came away with the win . Wiggins knocked down 10 shots and finished with 24 points , while Kris Dunn added 10 points , nine assists , eight rebounds and three steals across 34 minutes . Shabazz Muhammad contributed 20 points on 9 - of - 14 shooting to lead the Minnesota bench . As for the Nuggets , Gary Harris led the way with 22 points , while Jamal Murray had an efficient outing across 20 minutes , as the rookie posted 17 points , five rebounds and three assists . Phoenix was down 70 - 49 at the half but were able to comeback in the second half and finished the game scoring 23 in the fourth quarter . They were also able to out - rebound the Magic 44 - 32 , giving them just enough of an advantage to coast to the victory . It was a season - high in points for Knight and a nice surprise for the Suns , as he 's averaging only 18 points per game so far this season . He 's had a nice stretch of three games where he 's averaging 21 points , 10 rebounds and five assists over that span . In the two games since returning from the All-Star break , he 's combined for 13 points , 11 rebounds and 15 assists . The Cleveland Cavaliers ( 3 - 0 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 0 - 3 ) 105 - 99 on Tuesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Magic had a strong first half where they out - scored the Magic 53 - 56 , allowing them to coast to a 31 - point victory on the road . The Cavaliers were the superior shooters in this game , going 41 percent from the field and 30 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 45 percent from the floor and 29 percent from beyond the arc . The Cavaliers were also able to force the Magic into 20 turnovers , while committing only nine of their own , helping push their winning streak to ten in a row . Both LeBron James and Evan Fournier did everything they could to keep the Magic in this game . James went 7 - for - 16 from the field and 2 - for - 6 from the three - point line to finish with a team - high of 23 points , while also adding six rebounds and nine assists . After shooting just 23 percent ( 3 - 16 FG ) from the field in Sunday 's game against the Heat , it was good to see him get things turned back around . Coming off the bench , Jeff Smith added 16 points ( 5 - 11 FG , 4 - 10 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and an assist in just 28 minutes . The Cavaliers ' next game will be at home against the Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday , while the Magic will be at home against the Detroit Pistons on Friday .
The San Antonio Spurs defeated the Monta Ellis , 110 - 50 , in Game 3 of the Eastern Conference first - round playoffs Sunday at the Air Canada Centre . Facing a Pacers squad that sported a stellar 32 - 9 record at home during the regular season , and owners of a 26 - 23 road mark themselves , the Spurs pulled off an improbable upset in Indiana . The Pacers shot 46 percent from the field and 47 percent from three - point range , and gave them a solid 49 percent success rate from the field , as well as 45 percent from beyond the arc . Kawhi Leonard led the way for Indiana with a game - high 32 points , which he complemented with six rebounds , three assists and five blocks . Teague was a distant second with 15 points , five assists , five rebounds and a block . Danny Green supplied 12 points , three assists , six rebounds and a block . David Lee paced the bench with 12 points , 11 rebounds and an assist . San Antonio remains in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division , and is currently two games behind the eighth - seeded Chicago Bulls . They head home for a showdown with the Golden State Warriors on Thursday . The Pacers were spearheaded by Paul George , who supplied 27 points , six rebounds and three assists . LaMarcus Aldridge and Jeff Teague followed with matching 19 - point efforts , with the former adding seven rebounds and an assist , and the latter supplying five rebounds and five assists . Rodney Green rounded out a successful night for the starting five with 12 points , six rebounds and three assists . The Pacers remain in third place in the Eastern Conference 's Central Division , and are currently slotted in the seventh seed in the conference as well . They head to Philadelphia to face the Sixers on Saturday .
The Houston Rockets ( 29 - 13 ) defeated the Indiana Pacers ( 15 - 28 ) 110 - 98 on Monday at Bankers Life Fieldhouse in Indianapolis . After winning seven games in a row during the start of March and pushing themselves into the seventh seed in the Eastern Conference standings , the Pacers have now turned completely in the opposite direction and have gone on to lose four straight games . The loss does n't take them out of the playoff race though , as they sit just a game back from the Oklahoma City Thunder for the eighth and final projected playoff seed in the East . The Rockets , on the other hand , have now lost four in a row and currently remain just two and a half games ahead of the Miami Heat for the sixth spot in the Eastern Conference standings . If they do n't get things turned around soon , they could end up getting knocked out of the playoffs by the end of the regular season . C.J . Miles was the high - point man for the Pacers , finishing with 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 4 - 11 3Pt , 1 - 1 FT ) , while also adding six rebounds and five steals . He 's been on fire lately , averaging 24 points and six assists over his last five games . Harden , on the other hand , finished with 45 points ( 12 - 18 FG , 7 - 12 3Pt ) of his own , while also adding one rebound , seven assists and four steals . He 's averaging 34 points , 12 assists and 4 rebounds over his last three games . CJ Miles led the team in scoring , going 9 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 11 from beyond the arc to score 23 points . It was his second double - double in a row and third in his last six games . Starting at point guard , C.J . Miles had 17 points ( 7 - 11 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 3 FT ) and six assists . As for the Spurs , the loss leaves them alone at the very bottom of the Western Conference , but the defeat did n't come without a pair of great performances from their stars in the frontcourt . The Milwaukee Bucks defeated the Chicago Bulls , 95 - 69 , at United Center on Friday . Fresh off a double - digit home victory over the Bulls ( 13 - 13 ) on Thursday night , the Bucks ( 13 - 12 ) bounced back with an even more dominating effort Friday . Chicago 's offense had no answer for a stifling Milwaukee defense that held them to a season - low scoring total , while also limiting them to a 30 percent success rate from the field . Giannis Antetokounmpo once again proved to be a thorn in the side of the visitors , leading the way with a 22 - point , 11 - assist double - double that also included seven boards , three steals and a block . Jabari Parker could n't come close to his 26 - point effort from Thursday , but he managed 12 points , seven rebounds , an assist and a steal . John Henson and Tony Snell posted a pair of 10 - point efforts , supplemented by four rebounds , a steal and a pair of blocks by Henson , to go along with five rebounds and a pair of dimes from Snell . Greg Monroe came off the bench to tally a 14 - point , 12 - rebound double - double over 23 minutes , while Mirza Teletovic compiled 13 points for the second straight night in a reserve role , and also hauled in eight boards . A nightmarish outing for the Bulls saw Dwyane Wade pace them in scoring with a modest 12 points , which he complemented with five boards , an assist and a steal . Taj Gibson and Robin Lopez posted a pair of eight - point efforts on a combined 7 - of - 20 shooting , although they at least managed 11 boards between them . Jimmy Butler and Rajon Rondo had matching seven - point contributions as well , with the former also supplying seven boards , six assists and a steal , and the latter dishing out four dimes and recording four rebounds . Bobby Portis actually served as the second - leading scorer on the team despite coming off the bench , posting 10 points and eight rebounds in 19 minutes . The Bucks are now off until Tuesday night , when the Cleveland Cavaliers will come calling to the Bradley Center . The Bulls are home again Monday night , when the Detroit Pistons come to town .

Both offenses were efficient , with Washington shooting 52 percent to Portland 's 51 percent . Fastbreak points was the only noticeable difference in the stat sheet , with the Wizards winning that battle , 15 - 7 . He 's been on an absolute tear of late , scoring 25 or more points in four of his last five games . The Raptors also received some solid contributions from their bench with both Kyle Lowry and Donatas Motiejunas reaching double figures in points . Lowry recorded 11 points ( 2 - 13 FG , 0 - 7 3Pt , 7 - 10 FT ) and four assists , while Motiejunas had 12 points ( 5 - 12 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . The Rockets ' next game will be on the road against the New Orleans Pelicans on Friday , while the Raptors will be at home against the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday .

While there were only two ties and two lead changes , neither team led by more than nine points for the entirety of the second half . Phoenix were stifled by Atlanta 's defense , as they shot 37 percent from the field , 23 percent from three - point range and 58 percent from the free - throw line . The Hawks took care of the defensive rebounding too , winning that battle , 42 - 34 . Warren led the way for Phoenix , as he tallied 24 points , eight rebounds , three assists , two steals and two blocks . The Hawks ( 38 - 36 ) had lost seven - straight headed into this game , so to say this win was needed would be a drastic understatement . He 's been absolutely on fire of late , averaging 52 points , 5 rebounds and five assists per game over his last three outings . It was a season - high in points for Stephenson and a nice surprise for the Grizzlies , as he 's averaging only 17 points per game so far this season . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Pacers , as it was a double - digit margin for the majority of the second half . Jarrett Jack carried the load , as he tallied 22 points , six rebounds and two assists . Joe Johnson was second on the team , scoring 18 points off the bench . George Hill finished with 20 points , six rebounds , eight assists and two steals . George Hill went just 5 - of - 9 from the field , but finished with 12 points , six rebounds and five assists . C.J . Watson was a nice spark off the bench , scoring 17 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Indiana will look to get out of this slide on Friday against the surging Phoenix Suns .
The Houston Rockets defeated the Los Angeles Clippers , 140 - 116 , at Toyota Center on Saturday . These are two teams going in opposite directions right now , as the Rockets put it to the Clippers in this blowout win . Not only did they score at least 32 points in every quarter , they shot 56 percent from the field against one of the best defenses in the NBA . The Rockets did have a 26 - point lead that was brought down to six in the fourth quarter , but they responded with a 160 run to take control late . Houston took advantage of a happy whistle , as they went 36 - of - 43 from the free - throw line , while Los Angles took just 16 free - throw attempts . The Rockets also won the rebounding ( 45 - 38 ) and assisting ( 29 - 22 ) differential by seven a piece , as they never trailed after the first quarter . The Clippers ( 22 - 13 ) had to play this game without Chris Paul and Blake Griffin , as they were simply outmatched against a hot Rockets bunch . The frustration hit the fan too , as Austin Rivers and Doc Rivers were both ejected in the second quarter . Raymond Felton did all he could to keep them hanging around , as he led the team with 26 points , five rebounds and eight assists off the bench . DeAndre Jordan led the starters in his homecoming game , as he totaled 20 points and 13 rebounds on 9 - of - 11 shooting . Jamal Crawford and J.J. Redick struggled , as they combined for 13 points on 5 - of - 19 shooting . Marreese Speights played well off the bench , accruing 15 points and seven rebounds . Los Angeles will look to play better on Saturday , when they play the Oklahoma City Thunder on the road . The Rockets ( 25 - 9 ) have been dominant on offense all season , but this 140 - spot marked their high of the year . James Harden recorded yet another triple - double , as he accumulated 30 points , 13 rebounds , 10 assists and five steals on 10 - of - 15 shooting . Montrezl Harrell was second on the team , as he dropped a career - high 29 points on 10 - of - 14 shooting off the bench . Trevor Ariza collected 18 points , four rebounds and seven assists , while Patrick Beverley provided 15 points , seven rebounds and three assists of his own . Eric Gordon scored 19 points off the bench on 5 - of - 7 shooting . Houston plays again on Saturday , as they host the New York Knicks for their next game .
The Miami Heat defeated the Sergio Rodriguez , 125 - 0 , at American Airlines Center on Wednesday . Miami was expected to win this game easily , but it took a late run for them to prevail . In fact , the Heat went on a 30 - 21 run in a back - and - wire winning in the second half , as they never trailed after that one . Rebounding was the glaring difference in the game , with Miami winning that battle , 49 - 12 . They also dominated the assist - to - turnover ratio , recording 11 more assists and committing three less turnovers . Ersan Ilyasova led the Sixers in scoring , as he tallied 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Goran Dragic was second on the team , collecting 16 points , eight assists and two steals . Tyler Johnson was huge off the bench , providing 16 points , five rebounds and six assists . Hassan Whiteside was the player of the game , as he collected 30 points , 20 rebounds and three blocks on 14 - of - 17 shooting . Ersan Ilyasova finished second on the team , accruing 21 points , five rebounds and two assists . Gerald Johnson was a nice spark off the bench , providing 16 points , six rebounds and six assists . The Sergio Henderson also played well off the bench , scoring 21 points on 7 - of - 10 shooting . Philadelphia remains in last place in the Eastern Conference 's Southeast Division . They head to Orlando to take on the Magic on Tuesday .
The Atlanta Hawks ( 30 - 21 ) defeated the Orlando Magic ( 20 - 33 ) 113 - 86 on Wednesday at the Amway Center in Orlando . The Hawks got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Magic 35 - 24 in the first quarter alone . They also shot better in this game , going 53 percent from the field and 36 percent from the three - point line , while the Magic went 35 percent from the floor and just 26 percent from beyond the arc . The Hawks were able to force the Magic into 13 turnovers , while committing only 15 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Hawks were led by the duo of Paul Millsap and Dennis Schroder . Hardaway went 8 - for - 14 from the field and 3 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding five rebounds and two steals . He 's been on a roll over his last two games , shooting a combined 15 - for - 12 from the field and 5 - for - 14 from deep to score 35 points . Dwight Howard did everything he could to keep the Magic in this game . He went 5 - for - 6 from the field and 1 - for - 3 from the free throw line to score 11 points , while also grabbing 13 rebounds . It was his second double - double in a row , as he 's combined for 35 points and 31 rebounds over his last two games . Aaron Gordon was the third starter in double figures , as he posted 16 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 1 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 6 FT ) and three assists in 26 minutes . The Hawks ' next game will be on the road against the Miami Heat on Wednesday , while the Magic will travel to Charlotte to play the Hornets on Wednesday .
The Toronto Raptors ( 34 - 16 ) defeated the Portland Trail Blazers ( 24 - 27 ) 110 - 103 on Monday at the Moda Center in Toronto . The Raptors got off to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Trail Blazers 37 - 25 in the first quarter alone . They were superior shooters in this game , going 47 percent from the field , while the Trail Blazers went just 47 percent . The Raptors also out - rebounded the Trail Blazers 45 - 40 , giving them just enough of an advantage to take a victory on the road . The Raptors were led by DeMar DeRozan , who went 11 - for - 25 from the field and 1 - for - 1 from the three - point line to score a game - high of 29 points , while also adding five rebounds and four assists . He 's been extremely consistent all season and it continues to show , as he 's posted three double - doubles in a row , a stretch where he 's averaging 22 points and 14 rebounds per game . He 's now averaging 28 points and 20 rebounds on the season . Damian Lillard also had a solid all - around game . He went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 6 from the three - point line to score 21 points , while also adding 11 assists . It was his second double - double in his last three games , a stretch where he 's averaged 13 points and 6 assists . Notching a double - double of his own , Jonas Valanciunas recorded a double - double with 14 points ( 5 - 10 FG , 4 - 4 FT ) and 11 rebounds . It was his fourth double - double in a row , as he 's averaging 14 points and 20 rebounds over that span of games . Coming off the bench , Allen Crabbe added 17 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 6 - 6 FT ) , three rebounds and two steals in 34 minutes . The Raptors ' next game will be on the road against the Sacramento Kings on Friday , while the Trail Blazers will be at home against the Los Angeles Lakers on Friday .
The Philadelphia 76ers defeated the Detroit Pistons , 97 - 79 , at Palace of Auburn Hills on Sunday . The Sixers ( 6 - 18 ) came in to the contest short - handed , as Joel Embiid was given the night off to tend to elbow inflammation , while starting point guard Sergio Rodriguez sat out with an illness . That opened the door for Jahlil Okafor and T.J. McConnell to enter the starting five , and both parlayed their opportunities into highly productive performances . McConnell came within an assist of a triple - double , tallying 12 points , 10 rebounds and nine assists , while also adding three steals . Meanwhile , Okafor stepped up with 14 points , nine rebounds , an assist , two blocks and a steal . The two players combined to go 12 - of - 18 from the field , and the Sixers shot an outstanding 56 percent from the field overall , keying what was only their second road win of the season . Robert Covington actually led Philadelphia in scoring , posting 16 points , seven rebounds , two assists , two steals and a block . Ersan Ilyasova was right behind with 15 points , eight boards and a pair of steals . Nik Stauskas received some extra run off the bench as a residual effect of Rodriguez 's absence , and he turned in 10 points , four assists , two rebounds and a steal to lead the second unit . Nerlens Noel , making his season debut after recovering from a knee injury , was only able to log 10 minutes off the bench before being held to only eight points on 3 - of - 9 shooting .
The Miami Heat ( 26 - 32 ) defeated the Atlanta Hawks ( 32 - 25 ) 108 - 90 on Friday night . There wasn’t much that was going to stop Miami tonight , as they were clicking on all cylinders . The offense was especially good , as they shot 40 percent from the field and 85 percent from the free - throw line . The Heat won nearly every battle in the stat sheet , as they outassisted the Hawks by 14 and held them to under 82 points in the first half . Atlanta was led by Tyler Johnson , who tallied 23 points , five rebounds and five assists in the loss . Willie Reed had a nice game off the bench , as he double - doubled in a 12 - point , 10 - rebound performance . Atlanta has now lost two - straight and they 'll look to get back on track in their next game on Tuesday against the Toronto Raptors . This was one of Miami 's best games of the season , as they handled an Eastern Conference foe extremely easily . The Heat were clicking on all cylinders , but their defense was the key , as they held the Hawks to 38 percent shooting and forced them to commit 10 turnovers . The assisting margin was huge as well , with Miami recording 30 assists to the Hawks 14 . The Hawks have been playing competitively lately , but this was not one of those games . This sort of win exemplifies which directions these franchises are going right now and we should give more credit to Miami rather than belittling the Hawks . The Hawks will look to build off this win in a tough matchup , when they host the Golden State Warriors on Wednesday in their next game .
The Denver Nuggets blew out the Los Angeles Lakers 129 - 0 at Staples Center on Monday . Denver ( 32 - 35 ) inches closer to a .500 record for the season and more importantly , show cased their ability to blow out the bottom tier teams while also staving off the Portland Trail Blazers for the 8 - seed in the Western Conference playoffs picture . Depth was on display for the Nuggets in the rout , as they went up 67 - 29 at the half and handed over much of the work to the bench , who also flexed their scoring prowess in the win . The Lakers ( 20 - 47 ) were unable to match the shooting efficiency the Nuggets had going , and finished 30 percent from three point range and 43 percent from the field , compared to the lights out 54 percent effort by Denver . Nikola Jokic and Danilo Gallinari each scored 18 points , and combined for 12 rebounds and nine assists . Mason Plumlee scored 15 points and added 10 rebounds across 36 minutes . Jamal Murray and Will Barton each pitched in 22 points and each played 30 minutes , and combined for nine three - pointers . Lakers Ivan Zubac drew the start at center and offered a bright spot in the box score . Zubac scored 25 points , grabbed 11 rebounds and dished out an assist in 30 minutes . Jordan Clarkson added 19 points on 7 - of - 18 shooting , while Brandon Ingram pitched in 14 points , one rebound and two assists . Next up , the Lakers visit the Houston Rockets on Wednesday , while the Nuggets host the 28 - 35 Rockets on Wednesday .
The Minnesota Timberwolves ( 25 - 49 ) defeated the Minnesota Suns ( 25 - 49 ) 121 - 116 on Friday . The recent form of these teams would have indicated a different result , but the Timberwolves put in a great effort to pick up a needed road win . It was the second and third quarters where the Timberwolves really won the game , as they outscored he Suns 56 - 40 . This was a wire - to - wire win for the Timberwolves , as they held a double - digit lead for the final 40 - plus minutes . Phoenix came into this game as a huge favorite and were lucky to escape with a win . Andrew Wiggins and Karl-Anthony Towns were the only two players to come off the bench , as they combined for 38 points , 37 rebounds and 18 assists . Towns led the team with 27 points and 10 rebounds , while Towns tallied 27 points , 10 rebounds and five assists in the victory . The Timberwolves will look to keep up this good form against the Los Angeles Clippers on Monday . This is a downright bad loss for the Suns and they continue to fall deeper and deeper out of the playoffs . Brandon Wiggins led the team in scoring , as he recorded 32 points and five rebounds in the win . Alex Len recorded a double - double , as he amassed 14 points and 13 rebounds in the defeat . The Timberwolves will look to keep up their winning ways against the Orlando Magic on Wednesday , in a matchup where they should be double - digit favorites .
The Portland Trail Blazers defeated the New Orleans Pelicans , 112 - 94 , at Smoothie King Center on Wednesday . The Blazers were expected to win this game easily and they left no doubt with this lopsided result . It was a wire - to - wire win for the Trail Blazers , as they led by 29 after the first quarter and by 14 headed into halftime . The assist - to - turnover ratio was decisive , as Portland recorded 22 more assists than the Pelicans , while committing four less turnovers . The assist - to - turnover ratio was huge as well , with Portland recording 22 assists to 12 turnovers , while New Orleans matched their assists and turnovers at 19 a piece . The Trail Blazers took advantage of the whistle too , going 17 - of - 17 from the free - throw line . CJ McCollum led the Trail Blazers in scoring , as he dropped 37 points on 14 - of - 22 from the field . Anthony Davis was the only Pelicans starter in double figures , as he accrued 25 points , 10 rebounds and three blocks on 10 - of - 17 shooting . Ish Smith was a huge spark off the bench , providing 20 points , two rebounds and three assists . The Pelicans ( 0 - 2 ) have very little aside from Anthony Davis and that showed again here . McCollum scored a game - high 25 points to go along with six rebounds and three steals . Eric Gordon was second on the team , as he accrued 20 points , two rebounds and three assists . Ed Davis finished second on the team , totaling 12 points and 11 rebounds .
The Golden State Warriors ( 25 - 4 ) defeated the Utah Jazz ( 18 - 11 ) 104 - 74 on Monday at Energy Solutions Arena in Salt Lake City . The Warriors got out to a quick start in this one , out - scoring the Jazz 19 - 15 in the first quarter alone . The Jazz were the superior shooters in this game , going 44 percent from the field and 39 percent from the three - point line , while the Jazz went 36 percent from the floor and just 30 percent from beyond the arc . The Warriors were also able to force the Jazz into 23 turnovers , while only committing 10 of their own , which may have been the difference in this one . The Warriors were led by their superstar backcourt of Stephen Curry and Klay Thompson . Curry went 8 - for - 18 from the field and 4 - for - 9 from the three - point line to score 25 points , while also adding four assists . He 's now averaging 23 points per game on the season . Despite struggling with his shot , Klay Thompson had a solid six points ( 2 - 10 FG , 0 - 6 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , five rebounds and two assists . He 's now averaging 15 points and 6 rebounds on the year . Coming off the bench , Joe Johnson had a strong showing . In 22 minutes , he posted 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) , marking a new season - high in points . He 's scored in double figures for three straight games now , after only doing it five times previously in the season . In his return from an ankle injury , Joe Johnson had 14 points ( 5 - 9 FG , 2 - 3 3Pt , 2 - 2 FT ) in 21 minutes . The Warriors ' next game will be on the road against the Denver Nuggets on Wednesday , while the Jazz will travel to Minnesota to play the Timberwolves on Wednesday .
The Memphis Grizzlies ( 23 - 16 ) defeated the host Golden State Warriors ( 31 - 6 ) 128 - 119 , on Friday night at FedEx Forum . The Grizzlies led by as many as 16 in the fourth quarter but the Warriors battled back to make it a one - point game by halftime . The Grizzlies came out of the locker room with a strong third quarter and continued to apply pressure into the fourth , leading by six , with six minutes left in the game . However , Memphis was able to cut Memphis 's lead to eight with under four minutes to go , and eventually pulled away . Kevin Durant led all scorers with 27 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 0 - 5 3PT , 13 - 18 FT ) to go along with 13 rebounds and four assists . Curry went on to finish with 40 points ( 15 - 27 FG , 3 - 13 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , along with three rebounds , six assists and one steal , in 42 minutes . Tony Allen had 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , six rebounds , two assists and one block , in 42 minutes . The Grizzlies shot 49 percent from the field and 39 percent from long range , as they cruised to victory . Mike Conley was the high - point man for Golden State , with 27 points ( 10 - 19 FG , 3 - 9 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) , along with six assists and three rebounds , in 42 minutes . Marc Gasol tallied 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 0 - 2 3Pt , 5 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds , three assists and one block , in 41 minutes . Klay Thompson dropped 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG ) , along with six rebounds and two assists , in 48 minutes off the bench . Klay Thompson tallied 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , six rebounds and two assists , in 48 minutes . Zaza Pachulia was solid in 30 minutes off the bench , finishing with 23 points ( 9 - 18 FG , 5 - 5 FT ) , five rebounds and seven assists , in 41 minutes . The only other player to score in double digits for the Warriors was Zaza Pachulia , who tallied a double - double with 27 points ( 12 - 17 FG , 2 - 2 FT ) and 11 rebounds . Newly acquired guard Klay Thompson had 17 points ( 7 - 17 FG , 2 - 6 3Pt ) , six rebounds and two assists as well . Draymond Green scored 11 points ( 3 - 6 FG , 1 - 3 3Pt , 4 - 5 FT ) with eight rebounds , four assists and three blocks , in 41 minutes . Next the Warriors will wrap up their current three - game road trip in Minnesota on Sunday . The Grizzlies will visit New York to face the Knicks on Sunday .
